1b1: rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya g+han b+hu ha na ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags br
1b2: gyan sdug bo bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
1b3: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la
1b4: mnga' sgyur ba/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can
1b5: rnams las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na/ stobs mnga' ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
1b6: rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor
1b7: dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams
1b8: cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang

2a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs/
2a2: kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2a3: po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
2a4: dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba bye ba snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das
2a5: pa sams dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun bzhi'i spyod yul las yongs su 'das pa/ ye shes dang yid kyi lus su gnas gyur pa/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi
2a6: sprin gyi sa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad mo chen po la 'khod pa
2a7: rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de na mur 'dug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chub med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
2a8: p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyad pa bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs du ma ston pa'i

2b1: ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so/ / bzhengs nas kyang po brang 'ja' dang glog gri 'od can rgyan dang / lbab lbub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang sbyangs
2b2: su gshegs so/ / gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rgyun seng ge'i gdan dmu pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs
2b3: bzhir gzigs te gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyun ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po'i 'od zer stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas sangs rgyas
2b4: zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi brgyan gcig dang 'dra bar yongs su snang bar gyur to/ / mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang
2b5: ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang / gza' dang / zla ba spangs pa ste/ 'dus ma
2b6: byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkha' dang ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b7: de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na/ spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
2b8: kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu phyung ba/ de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la

3a1: gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston
3a2: pa stug po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
3a3: gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas gyur pa'i phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi sna brgyan
3a4: pa/ gseb med pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / 'ja' dang / byi ru dang / ba p+la dang / ljo nga ros dang / mtshal dang / mgo nag gi 'bru dang / king shu ka dang / in rba
3a5: go pa dang / gser dang / tsam pa ka dang / pad mo dang / rung dang / rma ba'i mgul dang / mdongs bu mo leng gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu thob nas sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu
3a6: ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu'i sngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3a7: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs te/ zla ges phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ba sa la gtsugs te/ bcom
3a8: ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

3b1: sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig gcig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
3b2: rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris
3b3: ba lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dkod pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
3b4: sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' shig 'dod pa dang / gzugs
3b5: dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' shig
3b6: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do// rigs kyi bu 'di nas pa
3b7: r ol shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das pa'i steng gi phyogs chan tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
3b8: dang / de bzhin du sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / skar ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

4a1: dang / de na du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol du 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bam
4a2: mang po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
4a3: sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang / rnam par rtog pa
4a4: spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs par ston te/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta
4a5: ba bzhin du ston te/ de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de'i lan du ngas 'di smras
4a6: so/ / rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' shig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan dang byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
4a7: dradri bar sems par ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'di yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi
4a8: sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug tshad med pa la ltad mo lta bar 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya seng nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du rdza

4b1: 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyang
4b2: kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug tshad med pa yang ma mthong ste/ des ma mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug ltar tshad med pa bsam
4b3: gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags
4b4: nas sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes te mngon par bstod nas/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
4b5: stug po nyid du song ste gnas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sa dang po'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa phra ba dang // dmigs su phebs pa dang / rnam par gdon mi za ba'i
4b6: gtam zlos pa stan las la ngas te/ bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
4b7: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i
4b8: slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang

5a1: ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
5a2: dpa' chen po rdo rje'i steng pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba dang / 'tshang rgya bar
5a3: bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa
5a4: dang / gzugs dang / mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang / mur 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang / gces
5a5: pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / don nye bar 'du ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bde
5a6: bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang / mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / de la skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang / gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa
5a7: can dang / rgyu dang / de ma thag pa dang / dbang dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang / yod pa dang / med par smra ba'i rtogs pa can dang / chos 'di ba'i phung po
5a8: dang / gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi yang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ chos kyi dbang po thos par 'gyur gyis bde bar gshegs pa bstan du

5b1: gsol/ / rnam shes lnga'i rgyu la sogs// mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas blo dang shes bya dang // ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing // shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams// thugs su chud pa
5b2: sangs rgyas te/ / chos rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na// mya ngan 'da' dang mnyam gshegs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba/ rnam par
5b3: tog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed pa dge'o// rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang ba/ sangs rgyas dang 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba'
5b4: shig ltar mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgra ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltar mo byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci/
5b5: zhig/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ 'on te gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi'i mnyam
5b6: pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir shes rab dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin
5b7: gyi spyod yul te/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam mo//
5b8: kye rgyal ba'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu de bas na dge bar shin du nyon te/ yid la gyis shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o/

6a1: zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying pe ti de 'dzin la
6a2: dbang po rdo rje'i snying bzung nam ni bzhin gshegs pam/ / phung po las gzhan yang med de/ phung po la gnas pa yang ma yin/ phung po yang gnas ma yin/ skye ba dud 'jig pa yang gnas ma yin/
6a3: shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes pa yang ma yin/ don kyang ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams ni mno
6a4: bsam med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las na ngam phyir yang mi blta'o// gzugs ni skyod pa med cing sems med pa ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i chos can/ mthar 'jig/
6a5: pa/ nA dang shing dang bod rdo dang 'dra ba/ shin du pra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o// tshor ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o// 'du shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang / cod
6a6: pan las sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de yang gnyis las skyes pa'i smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/ dper na dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i
6a7: rlabs lta bur rlab ci nga ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyen cing tshwa tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed do/ / de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/ de'i bdag nyid
6a8: ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes po// dpyod pa rnams kyis brjod pa las legs shig tu mi dmigs pa/ bang bu'i rwa dang /

6b1: mo sham gyi bu brjod pa ltar mingad tsam du zad pa ste/ rmi lam gyis gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o// dper na rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong bas sad pa'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa dang
6b2: bud med bzang mo yang dmigs su med de/ / de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba yang mngon par sangs rgyas na mi dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi
6b3: snying po lta bu ste/ btsa la na lus dang / ngag dang yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid med pa ste/
6b4: sgyu ma byed pa 'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan du rtswa dang / shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang /
6b5: me dang / rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi/ bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang
6b6: rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin du brtags shing shin du rtog ste de yang bdag bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sna mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar dang
6b7: 'dra bar phyir ldog go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug mi 'jig pa ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/ bsgom pa'i rnala'i byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
6b8: pe zhos sgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang / nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom

7a1: ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / mthung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
7a2: chos skyon med pa nyid po 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa ni nyes pa thams
7a3: cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang 'jug go/ / skyon med par 'da' ba ni byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du myos te/ sems
7a4: can la lta ba med par gyur cing / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang
7a5: zhing / snying rje chen po dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / bral bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par byed cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ ting nge
7a6: 'dzin gyi 'dam du glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/ rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing rdzogs par mi/
7a7: byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya zhing ma reg pa dang / nye bar mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas
7a8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi bral la nye bar spyod pa/ sprul pa'i yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i skyo rags brgyad pa/

7b1: las 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod
7b2: yul gyi sar zhugs te/ thams cad du 'gro ba ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa/ ther zug pa/ brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po
7b3: la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul ba'i 'jug pa ston par 'gyur te/ gnas gyur pa/ yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin can/ stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la
7b4: spyod pa/ / rang ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu bo zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i don yod pa/ mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i
7b5: gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
7b6: s ems dpa' chen po nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i
7b7: mthar thug par bsku ba grub pa'i sngags 'chad ltar mi snang zhing khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer dang / 'phrul pas sprul pa la
7b8: spyod cing 'gro'o/ / song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

8a1: gas / / dbang pa zung pa mas pa/ sre dang ma galas kya // gagazugs byas bcangs sa nga// bral dang dbang bar tshulas byung // ramang byang tshigapa pa
8a2: rnams/ / zhags pa sems bskyod de yin no// khro ba me lce mnyam pa ste// zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin// thub spyod rnal 'byor bzad can gyis// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te// phung po rnams
8a3: ni dor ba'i phyir/ / rnal 'byor tsan gyi rnal 'byor spyod// gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te// phung po lhag ma gzugs med pa// ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang // grib la sdod du ma la sogs med/
8a4: mkha' la rlung gzugs ma snang dang // bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni// mkhas pas so so rang rig pa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni// sangs rgyas dngos po mi snang
8a5: ste/ / sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na// de ni bstan du mi nus pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste// yod dang med kyis rnam par snga/
8a6: rdob phye mar btags pa la// gser ni yod par mi snang ste// spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gser ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin// gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag
8a7: ma dang / / khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang // rnam par shes dang dbang po dag/ gcig dang tha dad dngos po yang // rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos por sangs rgyas yod pa min// sangs
8a8: rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te/ / rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong // mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can// gang na sdug bsngal de na bde// de nyid la ni snang ba yin// sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste//

8b1: sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag pa yod// rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can// rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste// 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 'di dag sangs rgyas
8b2: ltar gsungs so/ / sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod// mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste// rnal 'byor can gyi thub pas
8b3: mthong / / khams rnams gsum po 'das pa dang // rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhing // de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing // rgyal sras bzang pos kun du gang // de na thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs//
8b4: mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes// de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes shes byed la// sdug
8b5: po de na rnam par spyod/ / stug po de yi sems can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun// skad cig 'jig par shin du 'das// ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos// dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul ba gang
8b6: rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong / / stug po nas gshegs glang po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sdug na bzhugs// sna tshogs rnam mar gzugs tshul te// sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis//
8b7: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam bzhag pa// chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni// tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stugazhing na// mnyam par bzhag pas/
8b8: rnam par mdzes// thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar// gcig dang tha dad spangs par te// dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni// skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyen// rdul las ma yin dus las min//

9a1: dbang po las min gces las min// rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan par rnams mdzes pa// rgyu yi tshul du sangs rgyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes/
9a2: 'jig rten sku la 'khor bya ste// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang // de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes// bya ba thams cad phyi nang du// gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams// /
9a3: phyir yang phyag gi mthil bkod de// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'dzud pa// sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'// thu ba chen thub pa'i dam pa'o// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa med// sangs rgyas 'phrul
9a4: gyis sprul pa ste/ / 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// rab rib mi shes myos mdongs pa'i// rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag med lta
9a5: ba'i rnams/ / yod dang med pa'i smra bas bcom// 'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang // cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams// 'di la med dam cung zad dam// bdag dang bdag med ga la yod// sangs rgyas
9a6: sna tshogs 'byung kur ra/ / rnal 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong la bya ba rnams// ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na// rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas rnams la smig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin
9a7: 'jig rten sna tshogs dag/ bdag la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rlung ldan sogs pa'i theg pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen gyi mchog/ me la 'khrul 'khor skyong ba ste// rgya mtsho'i skye
9a8: 'dzin pa 'dra/ / / stug po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag ba gcig la gzar

9b1: nas bras mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyang ni phyag 'tsha
9b2: nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa spang ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la
9b3: gzhol pa rnams dang / ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / ba lang dang / dgum pa mgums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur// bcom
9b4: ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal srin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor
9b5: ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan
9b6: btags par 'gyur ro/ / zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo // chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
9b7: rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to/ / 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang /
9b8: nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdug so sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha

10a1: drang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / ye byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga dag
10a2: gam/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gam/ 'phags pa spong ba dag gam/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam/ bskal par gnas pa dag gam// sems can gang la la dkon mtsho gsum la snying ring ba 'am/
10a3: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung ngu na lug bsod pa dag kyang rung / phyag dar ba yang rung // sme sha can yang rung ste/ 'jam dpal
10a4: sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang
10a5: dag par ston pa dang / chung ngu na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste rjod pa dang / su'ang chos de smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang bar langs nas do phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang /
10a6: lag pas reg par byed pa'i// sems can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs
10a7: su 'grol bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs gdan chos smra ba 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ ro 'am/ ro bam pa zhig yod la/ de'i ngo mthong na yang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams byang
10a8: bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i ning na yi dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dgas de bdag gis las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i tshor ba yod do// 'jam/

10b1: dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spyod pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sus mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gror byas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang
10b2: mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de yang mchod par bya ste/ ji ste chos smra ba de mtsham/
10b3: med pa lnga byed na yang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o// chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i robam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos
10b4: kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri dgra dang bya gzhan po de dge thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du
10b5: 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la nem nur dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis mi bya'o// sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sem
10b6: dpa'i sa bon las yongs su ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi mo'i dus na mdo sde rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro/ / thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro//
10b7: mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis so// // mtha' yas yul can shin du phra// bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog/ dbang po 'das pa mngon
10b8: sum pa/ / chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs// bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams// kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin//

11a1: yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med// blo dang shes bya bral ba ste// tshad dang dbang po spangs pa yin// sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin// de ni grol ba
11a2: rnams kyi yul/ / mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste// de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang // dregs can rnams ni dregs med mdzad// mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo med
11a3: min/ / chags med lam la gnas pa ste// lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang // dri za lha min mi'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yod mi g.yo// de la ngo mtshar sred pa med//
11a4: 'gro ba gang na'ang g.yo ba med// sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul ba'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis// mthong yang de dang 'di na med// ji bzhin
11a5: nyi zla de dang 'dra/ / rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni// dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams// gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa// de la de lta'i chos ston to// rnal 'byor
11a6: bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ / rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing // rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub 'tshal dang zhing
11a7: rnams kyi/ / phun sum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnam sa dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung khung rnam dag pa// lha yi lha yi mthu yis nA// phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin// 'byung ba gsum
11a8: gyi thabs rnams gang / / rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis// gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu// de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi// dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang //

11b1: gam ba'i sbyor ba dang // gang mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o// dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig tan gyis// mthang bzung med 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing spyan drang 'brel ba dang // cod pan can du
11b2: lag na gzhur/ / dam pa rnams kyis kun du mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na'ang shin du snang // rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin// ri dgas rnams kyi
11b3: sdig tu 'dra/ / 'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la// ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i// rmi lam bzhin du bus pas mthong // khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor can
11b4: rnams log long bzhin/ / lha yi lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun du// mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang // san na ta dngas nan 'da'// sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne tsa la sogs rnams bsas
11b5: kyang / / de yi yul la rnam par bslang // de dag rnal 'byor gyis mi mthong // thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa// de dag yul na gang yang min// lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs
11b6: ba'i phyir/ / sa dang sar ni rnam dpyod pa'i// rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan// lha yis lhas ni byas pa yi// sug po'i zhing na yod pa yis// 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de// mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan//
11b7: rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag/ dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad pa dag/ bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni// gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste// brtags pa'i dngos po
11b8: yod pa min/ / skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo// kun du phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags// mang me bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnam

12a1: dgos pa grub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de// 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o// 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med// rkyen du bya rnams med par
12a2: yang / / brtags pa'i dngos po gang yang med// rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur// yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang // med pa'ang snang ba yodas
12a3: yin/ / phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags// phung po rdza ma ras la sogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin// rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor bu drug dang bcas// rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis
12a4: 'jug pa dag dang snang ba yin/ / mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba// skye ba med cing 'chi med par// slar sad nas su sems dpa' ni// bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no// ji ltar ri dang de rnams kyis// grib ma
12a5: kun du snang ba bzhin/ / de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang // mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam// ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba zhig/ bud med lhan cig rtse dga' mi// sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang // lha rab btsun mo mnyam
12a6: pa dang / / gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos po de// sad nas rnam par sems pa ni// ci zhig bden na ma rmi lam yin// rmi la ma bud med lhan cig tu// rtses nas phyir ni bdag sad te// 'di brdzun bus pa slu ba yin//
12a7: de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun// rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no// dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang // ma dang phra nu po dag kyang // rmi lam lta bur reg bya ste// rnal 'byor sbyar bar ces mi bya// dka' thub tshal dang
12a8: zhing rnams dang / / ri dang ri'i sman gshong dang // 'o ma 'byung dang ma la ya// lhun po byin dang dbang chen dang // gangs kyi ri dang ke las// char 'bab dag la'ang gang gnas dang // 'dzam bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang //

12b1: gang dag brdud rtsi zab dang // panA d+ha ka ma la mar yang // bdar na gang 'khong dang // ri ra ba nang nag gnas dang // bas ma dpag shing la gang gnas dang // rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / nyan thos
12b2: 'phrul chen po dang / / thams cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di// gang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste// pad mo gnas su brtan bcas te// dkyil mo krung du mnyam ba nag cing // rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis// 'dad dang /
12b3: bdalas rnam par dben// dbang po dbang ba 'don gyi rnams// thams cad las kyang phyir nag cing // sngags las glang po ji bzhin du// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par gyis// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa
12b4: gtan/ / gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge/ 'dod dang dga' ba dben la sogs// yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang // khyad par du'ang gzugs med dang // 'dra shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams// naH
12b5: mkhar rnam shes mtha' yas dang / / 'dra shes yod min mod min rnams// nyi ma dang ni b+hA ba'i dbyibs// pad ma dang ni 'od 'dra zhing // nam mkha' ri mo mi 'dra bar// rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong // 'di dag/
12b6: thams cad spangs nas su// snang ba med par rab tu gnas// gang cha mtshan med rnal 'byor can// rnas par mi ti ga chags med na// sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong // zhing dang zhing namanyam bzhag pa//
12b7: dag phyag gi dbang bskur bar// dam skye bor dbang skur te// sangs rgyas sal bzhugs pa dang // sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung // sna tshogs tshul gyis dngos thob nas// kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur/
12b8: gongs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'brog// gzugs dang thams cad ted nge 'dzin// thams cad kyini'i byung gnas 'gyur// ma banal 'byor skyed pa'i yang // gzugs ni rdul du rna ma gzhigs shing // tsa

13a1: rdul yin cad nyid dben phyir/ / yod las med par 'gyur ba s+ho// bong bu'i bi lang dram thong zhing // cha shas med cing cha shas can// phung po las ni phrang can med// dbas las kyi 'bras gyur pa/
13a2: 'di ni sgyu ma'i 'bras byas bzhin// 'di ni las med 'bras bu med// las kyi grub pa'ang yod pa yin// 'jig rten byed pas ma byas te// byed pa byed pa ma yin no// byed la byed pa yod na ni//
13a3: 'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur// thub med byas pa'i nyes pa yis// thub pa dri ma can du 'gyur// das lam rgyad sna tshogs rnams// chu dang nam mkha'as gnas pa'i// lus can kun la kun gnas te//
13a4: ba bzang po gnas su ste// ris su 'gro ba yod pas na// ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'gro// dbang po so so bya ba yang // ji ltar 'dod par yul 'dzin te// 'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba// zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las//
13a5: de bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig/ las kyis byas par gyur sems na// rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin// brag cha dang ni klog 'dra ba// smig rgyu ri dgas sred pa ltar// dngos po rnal 'byor rnal 'byor can// thog ma
13a6: med nas bsags pa yi/ / mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis// sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang // sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags// dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin// yul rnams rmi lam phyir ldog dang //
13a7: mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med// de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po// lag pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa/ lus dpe med pa/ dpung rgyan
13a8: dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / se mo ngos shin du chas bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ theg pa gsum dang 'jig

13b1: nadang mi 'gal gas pa'i chos la bdag gas sa rang radage 'phags par 'a shes kyis reg pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa/ dza rje snang po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ rna
13b2: 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cong pan can dag la chos ston pa
13b3: yin te/ / de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba btab kyis bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar
13b4: gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig/ des bdag dang cod pan can 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo bde banan tan gyis rab tu
13b5: ba ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu laM dbang sbyar zhing stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal med khang gi gnas gyur te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa
13b6: sbyangs / gatshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gyi nang bri dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ rgyal ba'i tshigs kyi 'khor thams cad dang skrag por phug po na spyod pa rnams la chos snatshogs kon par 'gyur ba//
13b7: rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po spros shig dga'o dga'o// cod pan can la khyad par du// chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa// sdug po'i rkyen ni rab ston pa// sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/
13b8: tog/ spyod yul yin shes na// rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa// 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyis/

14a1: rgyal po ngal de nyon cig/ dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin pa// de'i rnam pa 'gro ba 'di// mtshan bzhin mtshan ma rgyu rnams las// rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog/ blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te/
14a2: rtogs bya de yi khyad gyur pa// gnyen por gyur pa cig med pa// nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems med tsam po'ang yod ma min// tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med// rnam par rtogs pa sems tsam ste//
14a3: rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag/ shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sems tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya sems tsam yin pa ni// rtag tu tsam la shes yod min// sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid// gang zag/
14a4: dag dang g.yo ba rnams// gang tshe sems la rnam rtogs na// rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur// dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te// bcu la sangs rgyas sangs
14a5: rgyas kyis/ / dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste// sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te// mi 'jigs pa/
14a6: yang ma yin zhing // rtag cing zhi ba bde la brtan// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te// stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes// rnam shes 'byung gsupa 'das pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin//
14a7: de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med// sdug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa// ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste// rdul yang mchog phra'i de bzhin du//
14a8: dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la// rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba// byis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya//

14b1: bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa// chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro// stug po'i dbus na
14b2: rnam par mdzes/ / bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // rgud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir// 'jig
14b3: pa med cing 'byung med pas/ / lta ba thams cad zag byed pa// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song // zhing gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas// zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du// lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir// bdag med nyid
14b4: la skyabs su song / / sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni// bdag med pa la bdag med pas// mi rtog tho bas bcom pa dang // rnam par ston pa'i 'das kyang ste// bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du// bdag
14b5: nyid zhir 'gyur de nyid du/ / de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te// bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa// lta ba'i chos la bder gnas kyi// so so rang rig spyod yul la// thog ma med nas nyes dri med//
14b6: 'bags pa rnams kyi sa la gnas// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas// sems kyi sa las rab gyur te// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes// /
14b7: mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa// rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon// gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// sangs rgyas yod min med pa min// phung po'i skye shing //
14b8: rnam bsregs te// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas// shes bya dri med zhi ba la// skyabs su song shig grogs po dag/ rtag dang chad las bral ba ste// blo dang

15a1: rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin/ / stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can// de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so// rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing // zhing mchog bzang po stug pa'o//
15a2: rnal 'byor pa ni mang pos gang // stug po de la skyabs su song // spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmi lam mo sham bu 'byung dang // rmi lam bud
15a3: med bzang mo ltar/ / thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong // dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin// sgra phud mgal pa bskor ba ltar// smig rgyu ri dgas sred mtshungs su// yod dang med pa rnam par spangs// sgyu ma'i
15a4: lus gzugs sna tshogs dang / / 'phrul pa'i sprul pa de dag ni// 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste// sa dad sa la thug pa rnams// bsngor med du ma'i gzugs gyur ba// sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar//
15a5: sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang // thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong // rdza la sogs pa'i bzo bzung ltar// 'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung // yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // ches lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang //
15a6: 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni// bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste// bag chags thog ma med pa yi// sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod// 'ong ba'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni// kun gzhis
15a7: la gnas pa yin/ / rlung gis ji ltar 'ong ba la// phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na// dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med// 'od ba'ang med par mi 'gyur te// snga med bag chags gnas can
15a8: rnams/ / 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag/ sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// rnam par tha dad ma yin te// dus gcig tu yang de dag 'byung // bar bar du ni rim gyis so// thog ma med

15b1: na sA sems 'jug pa/ / skar ma gazla yi dkyil 'khor dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la// rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste// rim gyis kyang ni shes par byos// yang dag/
15b2: ma yin snga ma'i yul// mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin// lus kyis 'jug pa rim gyis kyang // srog la rten cing 'byung ba yin// rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la// tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste/
15b3: mur zhing bca' dang gza' rnams la// tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min// ro dang dri yi rnam pa la// rims kyis tha dad 'byung ba yin// rims kyi kha dog khyad par gyi// sna tshogs la'ang dus gcig tu//
15b4: rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab/ rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste// rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas// yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung // yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te//
15b5: rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang // sa yi khyad par byed pa'o// bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu// sa bon kun pa'i kun gzhi ni// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i// rtag tu rang bzhin 'odadra can gyis/
15b6: de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dge ba yin// rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du// tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su// de bzhin kun gzhis khyab par
15b7: byed/ / sa dang sa la rnam dag cing // gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes// yang dag ji bzhin don ston la// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// mthong zhing thos te shes pas na// sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis//
15b8: spobs pa can la bstan par gyis// khyad par du'o khyad par bdag/ khams phran rnams kyi khams rnams dang // sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na// sa yi rgyal por/

16a1: 'gyur ba yin// 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba yi// 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du// mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur// dbang po'i gnas su dbang
16a2: bor te/ / dbang sder gnas su da bzhin na// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag/ gzugs khams bdag pa'ang de bzhin te// gzugs med 'dra shes me de sems can// bsam gtan bde ba'i
16a3: thar yang / / yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas// yang dag mtha' lam rig par// 'jig med se ge'i sgra sgrogs cing // dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan// bsam gtan dbang gis bde bas ngoms
16a4: de ni stug por smon pa yin/ / khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis// chags med mnyam par bzhag pa ste// mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar//
16a5: chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te/ rten las gzhan du gyur cing bde// rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// chos kyi bdagra po rnam par mdzes// 'jig pa med
16a6: pa mi yi mchog/ mya ngan 'da' ba 'jig pa min// mur 'dug rnams kyis jir brjod bzhin// mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi// rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis// theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste//
16a7: srug po tshol ba'i khyad par yang // rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur// sa dang sa la gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur// 'chi ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// rgyal po
16a8: 'jog pa mthar ma yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku// sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba// des mya ngan 'das 'jig na// mngon gyi mthar yang 'dzag pa dang // sems can 'byung

16b1: bamed par 'gyur/ / sems can khams rnams zad gyur na// rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med// mya ngan 'da' mdu shes bya med// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med// ma mar bsregs pa'i dang
16b2: rnams dang / / sa ban tshig pa'i dpe dag gis// rtog can par la mkhas pa rnams// lus can rnams la mthar bston// maud da de med pa'i rnamathar myos// thar pa'i bde la sa de dag ring // bsam gtan
16b3: gnas pa thams cad de/ / lugs su 'jug dang bzlog pa d+ma// gzugs med 'du shes med pa dang // mngon pas dbang dang stobs rnams dang // mnyams nyams pa med pa dang // chos kyi mtshan la
16b4: mkhas pa rnams/ / sa yi khams la mkhas pa dag/ mi yi dbang po stug por 'gro// yod dang med pa 'jigs pas ni// de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste// phrad pa gsum po 'jig med cing // rgyu dang
16b5: dmigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang / / de ma thag dang dbang yang ste// sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag/ mig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te// phrad pas gang rnams 'jug gyur pa// gzugs rnams mngon
16b6: byed ye shes dang / / de dag thams cad zhig par gyur// phyi dang nang gis rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// yod dang med pa'i lta ba las// de ste grol nas 'jig na ni// sems dang
16b7: dmigs las bral ba'i phyir/ / rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te// mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing // de'i rang bzhin mi gnas la// gang tshe dmigs pa spang ba la// rnam par rtog pa
16b8: mi gnas shing / / gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te// rtog med rtog pa spangs pas na// de tshe sems ni mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba rnam rtog med par mthong // gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// /

17a1: bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas// rten pa las ni gyur pa ste// ye shes gnas ngan len pa spangs// yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste// sa gsum
17a2: rgyal po rab byed cing / / rgyal po stug por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung // mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nad dang phyi yis rnams dang // tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing // so so
17a3: rang rig ye shes mkhas/ / lta ba'i chos la rnam par gnas// rgyal po stug por 'dod pa ni// ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor can// mtshan ma ming dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang // yang
17a4: dag mtha' yi gnas pa yis/ / so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu// rnal 'byor sems pa'i rnal 'byor can// rgyal po stug por 'dod pa na// sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o//
17a5: phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te// bdag gi phyogs la 'phags gyur na// phyogs las nyams pas 'jig pa ni// rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro// ma grub pa dang yang dpe yi// rgyal po 'gal
17a6: bar shin du 'gyur/ / rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i 'tshang // de dag rnams la sngar 'gyur ro// phrad pa gsum po sun 'byin pa// chud zos bud ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa/
17a7: yang dag ma yin rtog pa smra// de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtog pas bslang ba'i mig can la// 'dra chos mi 'dra'i tshes skyon can// nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang // bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo/
17a8: ba rol phyogs la rten pa dang // lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'// rgyal po yod pa ma yin te// kun du chug cing 'khor ba dag/

17b1: 'byung ba dog par chug pa'o// de dang de'i lam rgud du// thugs rje dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs// sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyi// zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor// snga ma'i las dang tshul mthun par//
17b2: pa skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad// rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la// chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te// de ste mya ngan 'da' 'dzag na// rgyal bas yon tan ci zhig rnyes// dbang sgyur gsum po
17b3: rnams dang yang / / rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dang // dran pa mi bzhag stong pa nyid// tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang // 'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang // dmigs pa
17b4: dang ni de ma thag/ rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te// gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang // dbang po stobs rnams bcas pa yang // mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang // rnam par shes dang de rgyu dang //
17b5: 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams dang // byang chub yan lag gang zag dang // rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad// sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang // zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang // ye shes
17b6: mngon du chung pa bcu/ / sdug bsngal chos nyid gos pa darang // sdug bsngal kyi sum song rten/ drug cwam tid kyi u shis/ 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang // 'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang // 'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dag/
17b7: 'gog pa dag la chos shes dang // 'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang // 'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang // lam la chos kyi shes pa dang // lam la so sor rtog pa dang // lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes/
17b8: shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu// brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang // rigs las rigs dang lan cig 'od// bar chad gcig po gang zag dang // bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang // gzhan skyes mya

18a1: ngan 'da' ba dang / / mngon par 'dra byed ma byas dang // steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang // ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs// rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te// tham
18a2: mchog dang bar ma'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du// mchog dang bcas par de la sgom// rang sangs rgyas ni dbu mar te// nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa// lnga gsuM bcwa lnga dag tu yang /
18a3: sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams shin du byed// gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin// sems ni rang bzhin 'od snad can// zag pa gang yin de sems min// sems dang lhan cig gnas
18a4: pa'ang med/ / ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin te// da ltar byung ba gnas pa med// sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par// 'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba med// bsam gtan bzhin sems med de// 'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa med//
18a5: 'byung ba'i chu ni rnam shes te// yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o// rang gi rnam tog mi shes pas// dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin// brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba// thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o// yod dang med/
18a6: las lha rdzas su// gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing // stug po dang ni sdug dkyil du// zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes// de ni mi 'jigs bde bar gnas// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin
18a7: mtshan nyid mkhyen/ / ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur// bsam yas rnal 'byor yul can te// rgyal po zla ba lba bur spyod// rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'od// rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyis// rtag par
18a8: rgyal po de yi phyir/ / khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog/ 'dod nas rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs med shes med sems can du// rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis//

18b1: stug por 'dod pa'ang 'thob par te// bzang po'i srug por smon pa'i phyir// rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams// bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur// chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol sems dang kun
18b2: rdzo ba dang / / sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang // 'gag dang lam las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i shes dang mi skya dang // khong ba zo bsgom pa de bzhin te// sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang // yig shra khwa dang so ma'i
18b3: rigs/ / yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog/ khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags// de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing // zhum pa med par stug por song // lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor can gnas ji
18b4: med du/ / skud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing // 'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste// rnga brug bzhin du lus phyed kyis// 'gro zhing 'od ba byed pa ni// thams cad lus la yid yin te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du gnas// sgyu ma'i
18b5: shing ltar shin du snang / / chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du// smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams// sgyu ra bas rgyal po bzhin du rtse// sems dang sems las byung dang yid// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ chos rnams 'di
18b6: dag dngos po med/ / sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste// kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di// bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang // 'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du// lus can
18b7: rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ / de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin// lu ma'i pad mo lta bur dag/ dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gsal ba'i don mi za ba'i rigs// sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas// mtshan
18b8: ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste/ / mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin// mtshan ma ming dang 'brel pa yin// rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags// mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyi bas dag las// rnam par rtog pa

19a1: shin tu 'thung / / rnam par rtog pa skyes pa yis// spru la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te// sems dang ldan
19a2: cig ldan pa ni/ / khang pa la ni gnas pa yin/ yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni// rnam shes lnga yi rgyu yin te// rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis// 'jig rten rgyal rnam par lta// de ltar byed dang bya ba med/ de bzhin
19a3: nyid 'di rnam gzhan min/ / thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar la// de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong // rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni//
19a4: chos rnams chos nyid de yin te// brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad mi skyes pa// spyong ba ngo bo nyid med de// yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa// sgyu ma rmil ma rnams dpa'adra//
19a5: dri ze grong khyer la bu ste// sgra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin// du ba snyen sdug lta bu ni// mtshan mtshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis// ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi// tshig dang yi ge mang po dang // pid rnams
19a6: mang po la yang ste/ / kun dubatags pa'i rang bzhin yin// gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan// yid don dbang po 'dus pa las// sa byon kun can bag chags dang // tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas//
19a7: rnam par shes pa kun du 'byung // gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang // phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so// so so rang rig shin du pra// mthong ba chos la gnas pa ste// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di/
19a8: phags pa rnams kyi skyed yul lo// 'phags pa'i rang bzhin thug sachud pas// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sas// nga bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni// yang dag mtha' dugazigs pa pa na/

19b1: skye bzad ces rnam par gsung // tshangs pa'i lam yang non ches so// byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med// byin chad 'byung ba med de zhes// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// g.yo ba thams cad shin
19b2: rba byung / / bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na// rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing // bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni/ chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste// sa bon rnams dang bral bas na// sems kyi
19b3: nams mi 'jug go/ / thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i// yid kyi gnas ngan len tog pa'i// spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas// mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin ji sad rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags
19b4: bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med/ / de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang // mi zad bzhin du gsel ba yin// zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su// zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// rgyal ba rnams dang /
19b5: rgyal sras bcas// ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pa// mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing // mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas// rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul// rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam
19b6: par gyis/ / de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas// stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o// de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms// rgyal po
19b7: rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis/ / ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung // mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung // grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par// rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i//
19b8: yul// phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// skye ba la ni rgyu yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste// gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed// 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi//

20a1: ma shin dubya// thung 'dag dang // rnab pa dag dang 'dums pa'i rnams// skad lags pa sul// yang du dang 'du dang/
20a2: pa'i srel// ji skad dag dang me ga dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas// mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes sbal// gang cigasad cig rab tu 'azung // klung zhing phyir yang ldog pas// deni 'gyogs pa pa/
20a3: nga'agro// rnam par shes pa chu las byung // yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas// khab long lta bur shin du 'khor// kha gnyis sprul ni bzhin pa// yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te// sran gzhi nam shes log par bye
20a4: gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung / / yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas// chu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog// bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin du byed// bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed// lus la drod kyang skyes
20a5: 9/ sna tshogs rnam par rab tu stong// zas dang skom dang langs sud dang // gros dang smos sogs rnam spyad dang // tshod pa dag dang drug par yang // baM ye was ni 'dzin pa yin// ga dang gAd mdzo sa
20a6: dang / / yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste// sna tshogs mgal bas bskor ba dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmilam dang // smeg rgya la'ang de bzhin du// rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/ bab pa kun du 'khor ba'i sems//
20a7: bdag sems khong du mi chud pas// lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang // byang mo nyug ltar gnas pa'o// nyam chung snying po med pa ste// rnam par rtog pargya med pa// bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod//
20a8: mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin// rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni// lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste// bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed// 'phags la ma yin sa sa bdag/ rgyal pornam

20b1: shes gsum po yi/ / 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste// 'di rnams dang bral grub pa yi rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no// bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams// shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang // 'phags pa mod gal//
20b2: bu yis kyang // lus dang lus che mdzes pa rnams// de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags// sug po'i zhing na 'os yi bdag/ thams cad zhing na tse mdzes pa// de dag dpe' mchar mi rung // bde ba yod dang mngon dga'
20b3: dang / / 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag/ de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de dag sdug la bstod// sdug ces bya yod mngon mtha' med// rang zung 'phrul pa de yin te// zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas sa//
20b4: 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas// de ni bde ba nyer len med// khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral// ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste// bstan pa stug por 'dus ma byas// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu/
20b5: 'chang rgya 'og min gnas mchog du// sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de// de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas// sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis// rtag tu rnal 'byor/
20b6: mnyam par bzhag/ sprul pa dag dang thabs gcig rol// thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar// gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la de ltar 'byung ba ste// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang // sa bcu
20b7: ba yi mdo mchog dang / / sdong pos brgyan dang dru ma yi// gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo// dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang // rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang // sbrum dpa' las 'gro ba sogs// mdo ste rnam
20b8: pa sna tshogs dag/ stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par 'byung // stug po'i rkyen gyi mdo sde 'di// mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin// rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang // rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas kyis//

21a1: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang // 'du shes med pa de bzhin te// gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang // bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// pad mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med la
21a2: gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na/ / lha rdzas slad kyi ye shes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis// rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs gcig bzhugs// stug po'i
21a3: dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs/ / sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la// de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis// de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pa// gzugs
21a4: rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi/ / thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing // thams cad rnal 'byor can gyis bstan// ba bla
21a5: gser dang zla 'od tsam pa ka/ rma bya'i mgrin pa pad mo 'dra// de yis la bzhugs pa'i lha/ lha yi gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste// de gzugs lha rgyal go pa ka dag glog dang 'ol ma b+hu ru'i
21a6: 'od bzhin du/ / la las bal chung sku dang na gza' lo ma rtswa la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs par// mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin du rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la// thub can la las rnal
21a7: 'byor dbang la sdug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs par mthong / / thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro yi mgo bo glad pa bzhin du ste// la lar gzugs ni rdo rje'i an+da
21a8: rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro/ / la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo mo nya dung bcas par mthong // la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong // lha rdzas

21b1: phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing / / khams gsum chu srid gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin pa lang dmig par shong bar mdzad// sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i
21b2: gtsug gi cod par rnams kyis rab mchod cing / / la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams na mkhas gyur cing // chang pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni//
21b3: grub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin du byed pa rnams la ste// rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis sbyin cing // la las gnas dang lta ba yid dang
21b4: blo rnams shin du gzhan du gyur pa dang / / dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar// la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te//
21b5: 'di dang gzhan med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro// snu ma dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin du mya ngan 'das// la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod
21b6: sbyin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste/ / sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin du mthong // bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni//
21b7: mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste// lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar bzla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor can gyi bdag/ lha rdzas 'od bza dod dang gang yang mi nad rnal
21b8: 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul/ / de dag brgya char mi pod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po dag gis de ba de la// gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing gi mi de dag/ mtha' yas

22a1: 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can/ / rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mo mthub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin
22a2: po che dag yal ga sbyangs pa'i gnas tshal shing / / lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin du rnam par mdzes// gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog pad mo sa de ni
22a3: mchog tu rab tu brgyan/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun mi yang pad mo skyes// thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas skyid la rab tu mos// bdag gi ston pa
22a4: la ni bdag bstan yid can pad mo dag las skye ba ste/ / sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan// dpe byad bzang po bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus
22a5: can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas/ / yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dri med rngub pa dag go/ de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur// sro ma rdul phran shin
22a6: dra phra ba'i sgra yi brgyad cha'i gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur/ / la lA ra bder gsheg pa rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // gang dang gang la sems kyi spong ba rnga bzhin
22a7: de'adra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas tshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs// de skad bshad nas yang sbas pa// sna tshogs gzugs cha rgyal ba
22a8: sram/ / sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // de ltar yang bzhin lus kyang ste// gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkad pa dang // rnam thar tha

22b1: dang 'ad/ reg/ stobs dang 'jigs pa mang pa dang // phung po khams rnams zag med pa// 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thog// rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo // chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang // rnam/
22b2: par shes pa brgyad rnams dang // bdag med gnyis por rab rtogs nas// gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur// yid bzhin las ni bcu po dag/ snyam dpa' bar 'go bas bskor// mi zad smon lam
22b3: bcu po dang / / lam gyi rnams kyis shin du sprul// rmi lam ma long gzugs brnyan nam// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // rnal 'byor lam la thug pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang // rgyal ba pad mo
22b4: gdan bzhugs pa/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa mdun du byas// yod dang med pa phyogs bral ba// rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis// dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang // lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs// ri rabs la
22b5: 'dod rgyu zhing / / nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang // ji ltar snang bar ma gyur pa// de bzhin rgyal sras gces pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan//
22b6: sa dang zhidi rnams bye ba ra// rgyal ba mchod la mngon par mos// smon lam dbang la gnas pa'i rnams// pad mo'i khang par rab tu skye// dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag/ zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'//
22b7: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston// lhun gyis grub par thams cad du// tshur zung zla ba 'dra bar te// nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa// snang ba sems can stong yul du// yang dag mtha' la ma rig par// ting nge 'dzin
22b8: la rab tu ldog/ grul gnas pa'i bung ba dag/ gang chen mtshol 'gro ba bzhin// gang du gru 'gro der chug ste// dpag tshad shin du mang bar yA// thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i lus// sdug bsngal

23a1: can gzigs de bzhin du/ / de dag 'byung ba rab tu stor// phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste// 'jig pa dag kyang rnam mkhyen nas// zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa// gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs
23a2: pa'i rnams/ / gzung dang 'dzin la spyad pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na// mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med// 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams// yang dang yang zhing skye ba'i
23a3: yin/ / bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la// gcig la cig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yod// byed pa grul gnas kyis mthong // 'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par// de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// sbed pas rnam
23a4: par dkrugs pa yi/ / rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams// sa mi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir// rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung // 'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyi chos/
23a5: rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis// // 'phags brgyan stag po// bam po gnyis pa// kun du bzang po mo yi bdag/ gzi brjid chen po ma tshogs gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' sems
23a6: dpa' ches/ / rdo rje snying po la smras pa// 'thun pa dag la dbang byed dang // lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang // rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na// gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i// rgyal sras rnal
23a7: 'byor ldan pa dag/ gang gis sdig ces bya thos te// thos nas non tan byed pa'i rnams// gzhan du gyur la gzhol ba dag/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing // ting 'dzin de yi tshul song ba// skrag
23a8: bor ring por mi thogs 'gro/ / sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos// 'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang // zla ba la sogs

23b1: gzugs dbang rgyal/ / blo gros shin du zhi ba dang // lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig/ du ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chenu dang // rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams// gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas
23b2: chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams/ / stug po'i rgyal la gzhol ba dag/ rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang // khong nas snying rje snying brtse s+ho// rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso// sna tshogs gzugs la
23b3: rab tu smras/ / rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris// 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // bang gyur ba ba bzang por yang // ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas// sna tshogs gzugs can khyod
23b4: kyis smos/ / dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid// 'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung // rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag/ ji ltar chu 'jim thal sbyar las// las su bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'gro ba 'di dag de
23b5: bzhin byas/ / rnga dang bi bang sgra la sogs// las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te// de bzhin 'jig rten 'di'ang ci// bskyod pa'i las las kun 'byung ngam// rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du// dngos po
23b6: gcig la kun du gnas/ / sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du// dngos dang dngos la rab tu gnas// de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ci// dngos po gcig la rab gnas sam// gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang /
23b7: khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas// dga' ldan mche ma rab rnams dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci// mi 'am ci dang du ma dang // gya nom snang bas byas sam ni// 'og min por tshugs can gyis
23b8: sam/ / 'on tam gzugs med rnams kyis byas// lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis// gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam// rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad dam//

24a1: 'on tam rgyal brgyal sras rnams// zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam// rnal 'byor la mkhas rnal 'byor can// sangs rgyas zhing du zhugs rnams kyis// sa rnams thams cad byas sam ci// gang la
24a2: nor ba rab tu gnas/ / gang 'di nor ba snang ba dag/ smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te// rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin// 'gro ba gang gi phyogs la gnas// yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can// yon tan med
24a3: dang yon tan gnas/ / ma yin phan tshun 'brel bas na// yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas// nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du// gang la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam// 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// sa
24a4: rnams la ni gar snang ba/ / 'on tam tshangs pas byung ba 'am// 'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam// khyu mchog gis sam spun zas sam// ser skya yis sam rang gis sam// gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam na// rang bzhin
24a5: kyis sam dbang pos sam/ / dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa 'am// 'on tam ma rig sred pas sam// lha yi drang srong the tshom za// lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te// grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams// sa la gnas pa'i
24a6: rnal 'byor can/ / 'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul lam// 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam// rmi lam yin nam smig rgyu 'am// sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kha gnyis sprul
24a7: bzhin gnas pa 'am/ / 'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam// 'khrul 'khor ra langs bzhin gnas sam// mgal ba bskor ba 'dra ba 'am// 'on tam sgra yi tshogs lta bu'am// byed dang las kyis ma byas shing //
24a8: dbang po ku be ras ma byas// mchod sbyin sbyin bsreg mtshod 'bras sam// sbrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam// chu rnams shin tu bal che bas// nan tan rtag pa ma yin te// 'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min//

24b1: rnams kyi yang ma dag ste// gro tha~M pa nyid kyis thug/ las kyi bag rnags rnams pas / rnas she brgya pa sa pa te// blan kA k+Sha u0f7f // de ga di ga na//
24b2: bzhin du sho// sa pa kram te la mar de bzhin du// lan ma'i ma blo rdo la bar// gzugs la ma rtag nyid rje bzhin// skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas// ji sa ga sreng la sogs las dr-i/ yan tan rnamasel yon tan
24b3: mtshan/ / nyi na gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin// de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin// dgos dang byed pa med pa ste// yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spang ba// gcig dang tha dang med pa ste// pur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs/
24b4: rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med// nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste// grol ba'i so so rang rig pa// sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyi// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// snga med sems dang sems byung gis/
24b5: rnam shes brgyang dang bral ba ste// nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o// de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin// phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dang // 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de yi ldan pa rig pa min// ji ltar thub
24b6: pa'i rnal 'byor dang / / rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong // rnal 'byor 'gro bas gzhan gyis min// de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams// de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gang //
24b7: rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin// des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang // je ltar nor bu phug pa'i rnams// sdud la bcus dang 'khor lo bzhin// las kyi rlung gis skor byed
24b8: pa/ / ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang // lag dang thal sbyar bskor ba yis// kun du bskor cing snod byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs rnam par ldan// de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi// khams kyi gzugs brnyan

25a1: lhan cig tu/ / sa ni rnam par byed pa ste// phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nam mkha' skar tshogs ji bzhin du// gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas// rlung gi rta yis
25a2: shin du bskor/ / ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams kyis// rjes ni snang ba ma yin te// par snang yod pa ma yin na'ang // bya rnams chu ba'i byed pa med// de bzhin rnam par shes pa mi// bdag yod pa yin gzhan med min//
25a3: nam dag par snang 'dra ba dang // rba rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis// mi chags pad mo'i zla bzhin// pad mo lan chu med min// chu la zla gzugs med pa yang // chu song zla
25a4: ba yod pa ste/ / pad mo'i med pa la de bzhin chu// mig la bud med gzhon nu dag/ mig gis mthong ba ji mi 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// las rnams cig car byed pa ste// 'gro ba dag gi lus la ni//
25a5: khyab gnas sa bon kun can no// stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang // sa rnams yog par shin du gnas// tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog/ drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis// sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus
25a6: can gyi/ / rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang ston// rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la// spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o// ba lang sogs pa'i ru mthong zhing // bong bu rwa ni med pa ste// ma mthong bar ni med pa med// ba la da dra yi med pa yang //
25a7: phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med// phyin ci log tu mnar sems la// shin du phra ba'i rdul ga shig na// yod pa de dag med par 'gro// med pa yod pa'i byung las te// meng pa yod ces rtog pa ni// yod pa med las
25a8: bltas pa ste/ / phan tshun ltos pa'i chu las so// blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste// khong du chud pa skye ba med// mgal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min// ji ltar sgra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// driH grong khyer sku ma dag/

25b1: ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin// blo yi 'byung ba rgya bde bar// yod pa ma yin napa rtog pa// rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed// lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te// ming dang 'dra gas 'brel ba dang // rang bzhin/
25b2: gnyis kyi bag chags kyi// mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung // grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o// thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags// gnas ngan len gyi yul las byu // rab tu spros pas bsgom yid las// sems kyi chom
25b3: ni 'bung bar 'gyur/ / gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kun du skye ba mi yi sems// rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs// snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te// 'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas// rtogs bya'i dngos
25b4: po yod pa min/ / blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni// bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rig pa// bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig
25b5: tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ / sngon med bag chags ldan pas na// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can// rgya mtsho 'di ba'i rlabs ji bzhin du// rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar// gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung // rnam par
25b6: rgyun kyang mi 'chad do/ / blo yi 'ong ba de bzhin rtag/ yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis// bdag la bdag gir 'dzin par byed// ji ltar sa la rnam tog med// 'gyur med
25b7: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ / dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni// de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o/ yi ga lag pa yis// rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la// bdag gis sna yis
25b8: chu 'thor dang / / ji ltar shad can la la dag/ bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa// de bzhin tho ni btags don la// don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o// blo yi yul du bya ba 'di// khams gsum rnam par khyab par garba/

26a1: phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang // rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs// sa la ji snyed snang ba dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs// sa la rnam pa snga
26a2: tshogs so/ / chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa// mi sma'i dngos la dga' gyur te// bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi// lha'i bsam gtan mi g.yo ba// sangs rgyas spyod yul
26a3: zhugs pa dang / / stug po nas ni 'odam pa'i gzugs// mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa// thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus// rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med dang /
26a4: 'du shes med po'i gnas rnams kyi// mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste// stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas// gzugs kyi
26a5: rnam pa du ma yi/ / sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas// mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul// su blo ci 'dod pan par ro// stug po yini ming phyung nas// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang // phan tshun gcig la gcig
26a6: bltas te/ / gcig la gcig ni rab smras pa// stug po dri med bsod nams te// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul// yu bum de yi sgra
