26a7: thos te/ / thos nas bdag cag dga' ba'i yid// stug po rnal 'byor can gnas kyi// brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya// 'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can// gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa// zhing
26a8: gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang / / sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang // tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams// de dag thams cad sems dpa' ni// tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi

26b1: 'gro/ / tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can// mun pas de ga ba spang bar gyur// thub pa mi shes thab rigag/ ji ltar gnas na thob par 'gyur// tshangs pas den kun du sa mas// blo yas tshangs pa rag pa' mtshan/
26b2: 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag/ chu ba den med pa ste// nam mkha'i khang pa gnas rnams dang // 'du shes med pa de bzhin te// mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi// rnal 'byor can rnams der ma 'an/
26b3: bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci// bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par 'gyur// bdag 'gro'am btan zhing rtag pa yi// ther zug 'dras ma byas sdug tu// gal te yang na thub pa de// rnal 'byor mnga' ba lta yang lha'i//
26b4: mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi// pho brang stug po der 'gro 'am// thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad smras nas thor tshugs can// mthong ba shin du 'bar ba yi// sangs rgyas lam la bzhugs pa rnams//
26b5: gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i rnams// khyed la ci 'tshal ci gyis shig/ sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol// stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gzugs yul 'di las phyir log shig
26b6: der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams/ / stug po de ni thub can yul// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // 'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste// de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gis// drug gzhan na grags pas
26b7: kyang / / rnal 'byor rig lam skrag mi 'thob// tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos// mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste// de ni de nas phyir log ste// tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo // de yi phyir na der 'gro
26b8: ba/ / tshangs pa yim kyang mi thob pas// gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams// der 'gro yod pa yod ma yin// ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed// stug po'i dkyipa 'khor mthong ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyi

27a1: gnas kyi mchog/ dpyir nga 'char thob par gyur// sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul// rnal 'byor can gnas sdug po de// 'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos// de nas byung bas
27a2: rnam par bsnyad/ / sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni// thub can rdo rje snying po yi// rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis// gzi brjid
27a3: chen po mthogs shig/ mtsho ma rab dang dga' ldan dang // gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// thub pa'i dka' ni ma lus par// smra bar su zhig num pa yod// gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams//
27a4: thub can thub pa bsdams pa dag/ sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// mchog gi gtso bos sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la// su yis ji ltar bstan par nus// mtshem rab dang shugs
27a5: 'dzin dang / / dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag/ gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras// rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dpal dang // byams pa mi 'am ci yi bdag/
27a6: rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de ni// de dag smra ba smos shig sgrogs// nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste// lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang // de nas shin du rnga brdungs pa// gsungs shig gsungs
27a7: shig rgyal ba'i sras/ / de dag de skad smra ba na// thor tshugs can gyi tshangs pa 'or// sa 'khod kun las smras pa ni// stan gyi mchog la 'dug nas de// ngo mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhig/ thub pa rnams kyi
27a8: tshags 'khor na/ / rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang // slob ma mkhas pa de dag kyang // khyu mchog thub la 'dri bar 'dod// rgyal sras rdo rje dbang po la// skabs 'di ji zhig su zhig la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis

27b1: gsungs pa yin/ / ku ru'i bu dang di li ba// 'khor lo 'khor ba man mtha' te// yan yo ba na shwa la// lha rdzas mi yi gtam brjod dam// gnyi bu ig shwa ku la 'am// de bzhin gzhu stong bdog pa la'am// 'on
27b2: tam gnas srung po la'am/ / 'khor lo 'khor ba gzhan dag la'am// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med la'am// 'du shes med gnas gnas pa la'am// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnam shes sam// 'on
27b3: cung zad med pa dag/ thub chen rang sangs rgyas dag la'am// nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras la 'am// sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa yi// rgyal dbang rnams la gtam 'di 'am// 'di ci lha min lha rdzas sam// 'on
27b4: te skar ma'i de bzhin nam/ / ji ltar gyur pa khyod kyis gsungs// bdag cag slob ma phyogs su nyan// bla ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang // rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad dag/ phan tshun shin du dpyod par byed//
27b5: de yi ting 'dzin 'gro song rnams// rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig thos pa// thor tshugs can la mngon du ste// slob ma bcas par nyan 'dod pa// gtsang gnas bdag po nyid kyang yin// thar zla blo gros mi zad
27b6: dang / / nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin// mthu chen spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // rnal 'byor shes pa gzungs kyi dbang // lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang // gtsug na rin chen blo gros shing // lag na rdorje
27b7: zhi ba'i blo/ / lag na rin chen blo chen dang // 'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag kyang // bye ba'i zhing rnams kun nas 'ongs// rdo rje snying po blo can la// de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas// pad mo'i stan la 'khod
27b8: pa'i rnams/ / rgyal ba'i sras la gsol ba 'debs// blo chen rab tu bshad par gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul// da ltar byung ba'i gang tshig kyang // rgyu dang

28a1: dpe yis rab gsal bar/ / khyod kyi zhal nas byung ba rnams// gdon mi za ba'i tshig 'di yang // khyod kyis rgyal ba de zhal nas// thams cad ma lus thos pa ste// skyon med de
28a2: bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen/ / ting 'dzin dbang sgyur rgyal po yis// thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyi// rnal 'byor can la tshig smras pa// rgyal ba'i
28a3: gsasung rab ma lus par/ / smra bar sus kyang nus pa med// de yi byin rlabs ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal te// sangs
28a4: rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang // dbang skur gnas bzang 'khor rnams langa'// ye shes dang bas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs byed
28a5: tshul yin te/ / de las 'di dag thams cad nyon// de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes dge/ rgyal po rnams la gtam 'di min// mi bdag mchog rnams 'das pa'ang // 'di ni sangs
28a6: rgyas rigs kyi gtam/ / sdug dkyil phun sum tshogs rnams kyi// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// sangs rgyas kun gyi phun sum tshogs// de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes pa//
28a7: rtog med rtog pa spangs pa ste// so so rang rig mkhas pa'i yul// brjod pa dang ni rnam par bral// de ni smra bar dad pa med// bdag gis de yi mthus thos pa// lha rdzas kyi ni ye shes dang //
28a8: ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog gis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa ni// sdug pa'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag pas// thams cad phyogs las rnam grol zhing // yod dang med pa'i phyogs

28b1: spangs pa/ / yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral// dbu ma'i lam ni dge ba ste// gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha rdzas tshul// sangs rgyasas la 'jug par byed// dbu ma'i lam po de nyid kyang // mtha' bzhi rnam par
28b2: spangs pa ste/ / rnam par rtog med dmigs med pa// sdug na gnas pas shin du mthong // thub can de nyid lam shes pa// bdag med ye shes mkhas rnams kyis// bla ma'i tshig 'di thob pa dang // rnal
28b3: 'byor can rnams thams cad kyang / / rkang pa gnyis la mnyam btud nas// rdo rje zhes la smras pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams nyan par brtson// skom pa rnams ni chu tshol bzhin// khyod kyi zhal nas
28b4: btud 'dod pa/ / tshig gi sbrang rtsi bur ba bzhin// rnal 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams shin du nyan// rnal 'byor can rnams rnal 'byor blo// ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen
28b5: rnams/ / zhing gi bdag po rgyal chen rnams// rnal 'byor lam la rtogs byed pa// bde gshegs bka' ni nyan par ro// khyod kyi zhal nas rnam byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra// khong
28b6: du chung byed mtshan bzang dang / / tshangs pa'i yang dag gshegs pa dang // dbang po'i don grags khyad par du'o// sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung // sgra yi don la mkhas pa yi// de phyir bdag ni
28b7: sbrang ma mos/ / brtag bya rtog pa rnam par spangs// bar snang ri mo ji bzhin dang // grib ma stong la sogs pas sbyangs// de stes ngan slad du rung // de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// mkha' la bye d+d+has
28b8: bzhin du/ / blta bar shin du dkon pa bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// de ni bstan par mi nus so// sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis// dpe yis kun du rab bstan gyis// dpe dang

29a1: bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ / thub pa'i zhal nas rnam par byung // de yi tshig la dpe med de// rmi lam lta bur bdag la snang // rab rib ma gal ba bskor ba dang // skra yi tshogs dang de bzhin 'dra// ji
29a2: ltar sgyu ma'i grong khyer dang / / rlung ni shin du blta dka' dang // sgyu ma smig sku 'dra ba ste// rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs// 'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs// thub pa'i gsung ni de bzhin te// bdag gis
29a3: rnal 'byor can dbus su/ / bshad par de phyir dad pa med// 'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste// de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa// de phyir smra bar dad pa med//
29a4: 'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de dang bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams// sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'// dpe med sems dang yid las rnam par 'das// ji ltar bung bas
29a5: me tog ro mthungs shing / / lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin// snying kyi thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs te// de yi 'thungs lhag pa dag gis de ring bshad// de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang //
29a6: bstan par nus pa ma yin la// g+ha ye lha yi yul yin te// mkhas rnams dge ba 'phel bar byed// mi yi gzugs su byas nas su// sangs rgyas shes ni mtshan ldan pa// cod pan can dang gzhan la sna /
29a7: gzhal med khang gnas gzhan la yang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // mtshan bzangs rnam pa sna tshogs su// sal sna tshogs snang ba ni// mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel// dus rnams ca
29a8: po thams cad du/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la// stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te// rnam par phye ba rab tu mdzad// bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang // gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang // de dag du'ang

29b1: ci dgos pa/ / sa la lus can rnams kyis te// ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad/ stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste// sug po de ni dri med gnas// sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi// ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol
29b2: mtshams/ / thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas// dri med stug na rnal 'byor ldan// zla ba bzhin du 'gro la sdang // sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyi lha tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni// gang la gang snang gang gis
29b3: kyang / / ji ltar gang la de bde ba// de dag de la thams cad du// de phyir cha yis mig la gnas// shes can yul can thub pa ni// rnal 'byor mkhyen pa shes pas snang // dbang po che gzugs gzhan
29b4: dag dang / / 'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan// ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste// thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa// shes byed shes la yang dag snang // sa nad sa nan da na la// sa nad gzhon nu me
29b5: ngag dang / / skra gcan mi tsi dum bu ru/ a gi shwa kr-i dang zla ba'i rigs// thams cad sa yi rgyal po la// thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste// sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin// la lar mur 'dug
29b6: spyod sprul te/ / ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong // tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par yang // ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing // rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang // zangs dang lhagra tu
29b7: 'byung khung dang / / ro nye zhe nye mu tig dang // pad mar dang a nad rnyil// bai dUr+ya dang shel dag dang // a s+pha gar ba mu sa ra// tshul dang rtag pa thams cad ldan// mkhan po bla ma kun 'a
29b8: dang / / gang gis lus can su su cir// sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin// de la de bde thams cad du// thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung // lha yi bu mos mi spyod do// de bzhin dri za'i

30a1: bud med kyis/ / 'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang // de bzhin klu yi bud med kyis// mi ci lha min bu mo dang // gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no// de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal//
30a2: gzugs can rnams kyi yul de bzhin// nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin te// 'du shes yod mi na ma yin gyi// gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med// kun tshul los
30a3: 'di dag lam/ / rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos// ma zhi mo dge gzhan dag kyang // srog chags rnams kyi sa yod pa// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul// sdug na gnas la stug na med// zhing
30a4: dri med bsod nams te/ / stug po snying po shin tu mdzes// de bzhin thar pa thar shes la// zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste// stug po de ni yun du rtag/ mnga' rnams
30a5: bcu po de dag dang / / stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin// yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus// sangs rgyas dri na rnam par mdzes// sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te// rnam thar bden pa stong pa nyid//
30a6: mtshan ma smon pa med pa dang // pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te// bsgom dang sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thob// yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi/ 'dus ma byas pa
30a7: sangs rgyas sku'o/ / tog med rtog dang bral ba ste/ bdag med yid dang dbang po rnams// shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing // mtshan gyis kun nus shin du bsags// sbyin dang tshul khrims
30a8: la sogs kyi/ / dkar po'i las rnams byas pas na// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog/ stug po'i ris su 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas gnas// nyi zla rnam par spangs

30b1: sa pa byu ba dang / / bdu dang lta sa yang // ma byu ci dal dang // sa ma pa du byu// dam ga pa ga 'a
30b2: nasu daM/ / dus kyi 'bri bden med// rlud rnams gung yang yod pa yin// 'dzin med pa'i gnas yin te// sdug bye na 'ang gi mchog/ thamasaca gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas// dra
30b3: mthong ba'i chos can / / sangs rgyas gang sdug bsod nams te// lha rnams kun kyis smon par bya// na la'i byor can rnams khyad par du// sadangs la gnas padag/ sems can ra ba'i/
30b4: dngos po rnams// gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na// yid dang sems dang kun bzhi'i tshul// rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te// chos la bdag myed rang bzhin dang // gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/
30b5: lus ni shin du gnas gyur pas// thub pa rnams ni der 'dod ste// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ sgeg po zhing rab dam pa ro// stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum mo//
30b6: lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can// 'dus byas rdul phran tshigs yin te// yon tan tshogs kyi rnam sna tshogs// 'thung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te// khwa chu khrag las kun 'byung ba// mngon med
30b7: rnam par 'phel ba ste/ / steng gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med// las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g.yogs// dug gi shing gis sa bzhin du// dpa' dang rdul gyi de bzhin du//
30b8: mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste// lam rgyud dog par shin du 'phyan// dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye// yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni// phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas// klu dang yi dgas sha

31a1: za dang / / 'bar ba lta yi nang du yang // skye'am lha min 'jig rten nam// sngags 'chang rigs su de bzhin te// 'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su// bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skyeb// 'khor
31a2: lo 'khor rigs dam par yang / / bar bar du ni skye bor 'gyur// skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni// gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na// swa yi gang gi gang tshelas// lhan cig skyes par babyur zhing // lhan cig sas /
31a3: las tshul gyis// lam dang lam du rab tu 'jug/ brtag med rtog dang bral ba yI// glang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na// thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste// yi ge yi ge mod byas pa'o// 'byung ba thams cad rno
31a4: tshogs/ / de ni 'od snang mchog yin te// yang dag bla nas blar sbyangs pa// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// bye ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis// sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas// de ste de shes yod na
31a5: ni/ / dag pa'i lam nam 'grol bar 'gyur// de lta'i skyes bu skyes pa na// khyad par shes shes rnam par brjod// lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing // mngal gyi skye ba
31a6: 'byung ba ni/ / byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi// ma rig srid dang las skyes min// nyon mongs las las shin du byung // mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing // mtshan ma med las rab 'das te// yi ge med pa de byung nas//
31a7: spros pa thams cad rababral nang // sug po'i dkyil dub tu gro/ da mags pas sems zhig 'gyur ba ni// rnal 'byor can gyi sgra rmongs pas// rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang // mthongs bud med sbyin rmongs kyis/
31a8: gang tshe thub ca ni ma 'dug pa// de tshe sems ni 'byung ba ste// lam las spyod ces bya ba yi// ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa// gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na// ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye// sems can

31b1: 'dugs mang ma na/ / ting nga 'dzin las bral par 'gyur// nam mtha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi// ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur// rdzas la gang seM ba dbang thug/ tis nga thus pas byu ga nga/
31b2: ni mngon par mi 'byur ngo // de bden de ni rnal 'byor te// bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin// bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya// de ste stag dkyil 'dod na'o// mngal gyi skye ba 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste/
31b3: le'u bzhi'o// // rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems// ma rig 'jig rten rgyu yin te// 'di ni sems dang sems 'byung mthu// gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// de yi mthus kyang 'jug pa ni// rnam shes
31b4: rnams dang dbang po rnams/ / ma rig la sogs rnam pa 'di// rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa// yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang // 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung gnas dang // yul dang dbang po 'jig rten
31b5: dang / / skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no// thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi/ 'gro ba dbang por bcas pa 'di// 'jig rten brtsol bas ma bskyed//
31b6: bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa// nang dang byed// rtag par te// 'gro ba gnas dang g.yo ba dag/ lha yi lha yi yul yin te// sa la sus kyang ma mthong ba// mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste// thub grags
31b7: mtshan ma can gyis so/ / phan tshun bcangs pas bcings pa ni// sred pa sna tshogs rnam pas te// rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na// sems kyi rnam par mi rtogs so// lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi// mchod sbyin rnams
31b8: kyis tshangs pa'i thabs/ / thob nas slar du ldog pa ni// sa ma ya ru rigs sems pa// 'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang // gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang // mer bzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang // gang gzhan mchod

32a1: rdzu dang / / sa pa zlas // pa 'du kun na smra du// / /
32a2: chums bzhin du zhing ba meng // 'di zhes pa rapa mi rnyed pa// sa pa bzhin ga shegs pa'i gnas/ lnga ba rgya s+ho// pa rnas 'byung pa pa/ sa rgyas
32a3: bdag/ rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug btsun par// 'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang // skye zhing 'tshab yod med de// mchod gnag tu med pa na// lus tsani kun gyi rnas pa hwags kyis ni mi gos pa/
32a4: med dras nas byung bas so// yid kyi gnas ngan len bsags pa'i// spros pas kyang do cir mo 'jug/ ji ltar ltar rdzas chu skyes dang // nam mkha' la yang phyag dar dang // sprin gyi dri mas nyi zla la// de bzhin mi gos
32a5: rnal 'byor can/ / ma bshol rab tu brtson par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs// rnal 'byor bde gshegs lha yi rdzas// rnal 'byor can gyi tshul skyed pa// tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te/
32a6: ye shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing // mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang // 'khor ba las ni 'da' bar gyis// 'di la khams rnams gang yang med// phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang // ming dang gzugs dag rgyur
32a7: byas shing / / lus can rnams kyi srid kyang ste// ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis// 'bar ste 'bar bar rtog pa med// de bzhin phung po shing rta stong // ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// ri dgas sred dang dri za yi// gnas dang
32a8: skra tshogs snang ba ru/ / ri dgas bus la la sogs mthong // yang dag ma yin ltas bslang bas// de bzhin yul las byung ba'i sems// khab long lta bur 'khor ba ste// gang yong 'di la dngos med pa// 'byung ba rnams

32b1: dnga'abrang ba/ / sa pa rnapag ga ma pa // sa pa rnams rtag // 'byung bsams kya gas pa na// phy-ing nam kyang gas// dardzas mnagams dang // la na ju ga
32b2: bar nal 'byor ye shes la/ / ma ba shol bas ma gtan ba kyis// thams cadu sgyu ma rmel ma ra// byung ba gsam kun rab tu s+hos// TIkad+hA r+b+ba thas za ni// b+hir nal 'byor 'jug miT+Ta// bzhin rje zla'i grong
32b3: khyer na/ / 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang // de bzhin lus la phung po'i spyod// ni byar rnal 'byor 'jug ma~M d+d+ha// rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs// ji ltar ma la mamabs mthong // de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na/
32b4: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// sa 'dis la sogs pa'i tshogs// 'dus pa rdul gyi phung po yin// 'di sems sems byung tshogs yin par// rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams//
32b5: phan tshun kun nos 'dus pa ste// gdeg pa la sogs ldan pa yin// ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// 'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos// ro ba smras lta bur gnas pa ste// byed pa gang yod yod pa min// ci phyir rnal
32b6: 'byor 'jug mi bya/ / dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun// 'gro ba gnas shing g.yo ba'i rnams// smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su// rdza la sogs pa shin du rtogs// tshor rab chu bur lta bu ste// bde dang mi bder ba rtog pa yin/
32b7: chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams// zhig pa grags pa snying po med// rnam par she bar sgyu ma 'dra// de yi dngos la gnas pa med// rtswa shing gnas pa ji bzhin na// ci bying rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// 'di ni rmi lam
32b8: rnam myos 'di/ / 'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'dring// 'di dag thams cad sdig rgya ste// de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer ro// gang brgyan 'di dag snang ba yi// khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// 'di kun blo yis rtogs bya ba// 'jigs

33a1: med rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ / nyes pa'i rgyun ni rtsa dang bcas// ye shes me yis rab bsregs na// lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro// rnal 'byor can gnas stug par yang // 'jigs mang 'di ni mtshan ma
33a2: med/ / mtshan ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can// mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde// mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo// / sems kyi spyod yul bden pa min// bden pa blo gros spyod yul te// sems ni shes
33a3: rab spyod yul te/ / mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o// kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin// gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste// mtshan ma ming dang yul rnams dang // sgra la sogs pa kun brjod pa'o// dbang po kun
33a4: kyi yul rnams ni/ / lus can rnams kyi 'ching ba'i rgyu// 'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu// gang 'grol gang gis 'grol ba dang // thar dang thar pa'i bde ba dang // mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa dang // bdag med pa ruH
33a5: nyid kyang / / 'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o// de nas mi bdag ron chen gtsug/ blo chen byang chus sems dpa' yis// rnal 'byor can kun dbang la smras// rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la// bye ba'i zhing rnams
33a6: bams cad pa/ rgyal sras khyod ni btsun pa ste/ rgyal ba rnams la khyod cad de/ rgal 'byor can pa nye bar gnas/ rnab 'byor tshim gcod pa 'i// dben ma sa zab par bya ba'i byed/ btag bya nams
33a7: thams cad dag/ sras can rnams kyi las smras pa// tshul ni ses brjod par mdzod// tshig tu brjod par cing mi bci// gan dang byung kyi sa rnam par ma // ma zi nas // bas bzungs dang
33a8: kyis gno mer gyis/ / zang po'i rnarnams gsal bar mdzad/ yang dga'agyur ba med pa dang // dge sams kyang ma 'asabs so// ring ba mi thags par bathob// grang ba'i thun mas dregs nas pa// chos pa/

33b1: chos kyi cha 'brung ste// 'di da nga gzhan du'ang 'thob par 'gyur// shes pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol// sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings// me shes las dang srid pa yis// lus can dz+nyAn du shin du byas/
33b2: gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // rnam shes yul la mngon gyu ra pas// myur phyir khong du mi chud pa// spyod yul du ni sems chu ba'o// yid sngon 'gro ba chos rnams te// lus can kun hU~M de bzhin no// yid 'gro ying
33b3: ni gces pa dag/ yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad// gang dang gang gi rdzas kyis su// mi rnams stug por 'grub pa yi// des ni de yis dngos 'gyur ba// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin// ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs
33b4: gzugs/ / tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes// rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin// de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis// dbang sgyur pho brang dge ba na// thams cad dag na snang ba ni// rgyal ba'i sras kyi
33b5: mdun du byas/ / mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das// sdug po mthar mchog ye shes te// chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang // srag de rnal 'byor can gyi gnas// de ni mtshan gyis mchod de// de ni mes kyang mi
33b6: tshig pa/ / mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa// de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o// de ni chus kyang mi gsher te// rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo// de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang // nan tan byas rjes byung ba min// rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig
33b7: pa/ skye can kun gyi rnam par shes// rgyu yis stan dbyung ma yin pa// 'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi sa// dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang // mtha' mthug pa med par 'gyur// dam bcas pa yi dam bca' dang //
33b8: rgyu yi khyad par rgyu dag ste// de bas de la rgal du med// rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min// rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na// de ni stug po sems spangs pa'o// rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin// de bzhin gshegs

34a1: pa'i pho brang stug/ ma skyes sngon dang tha ma med// spun gyis grub pa'i stobs las byung // rgyu med pa dang las skyes min// dbang po chen pos byas pa'ang mid// gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las
34a2: yang dag 'das te gnas pa yin/ / 'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su// gzugs dang gzugs pa 'du shes med// mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas// stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes// phyogs 'di
34a3: mkha' las grub pa ste/ / rgyunan rnams kyi skad yul med// yang dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral// gcig dang gzhan pa spangs pa'o// gces pa dang ni rang ba'i/ mes/ 'dod rgyal dang yang dbang pa po//
34a4: khA mchog gi yang phyogs ma yin// de bzhin rig can gsum gyi yang // rdul gyi rkyen las byung ma yin// sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med// ngo bo nyid kyis bskyed pa min// 'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed
34a5: do/ / pa rig las dang sred pas pin// mi shes las kyang spros pa min// khur med khur gyi yul yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul// lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen// sa bcu dag tu
34a6: rnam par sbyangs/ / rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs yul// don gyi dam pa ston pa'o// las ci las min gang zhes te// byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur// las dang las min bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor can
34a7: rnams bdar gyur pa/ / sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te// lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis// phyi dang nang dang thams cad du// gzung dang 'dzin pa la bur gnas// sems kyis sems ni mthong
34a8: yang / / khong du mi chud bus pa rnams// kha gnyis sems de lus can gyi// yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa// bdag gi byed pa'ang de bzhin byed// yul lta bur yang rab tu snang // rdza ma la sogs gzugs su

34b1: gnas/ / rdza la sogs pa'ang yod pa min// 'di yi don la thub pa dag/ rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos// rnal 'byor de yang mi rtogs pa// bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas// sems 'di gnyis ka
34b2: bdag nyid de/ / me long zla ba bzhin du gnas// ji ltar rab rib rab rib can// sna tshogs lto shig lto shig kye// phan tshun dag tu ston mod kyi// bdag nyes dbang po zhan byung gi/ 'di na gang yang sgra tshogs med//
34b3: rgyan dang nor bu dag kyang ngo // yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar// dbang po'i nyes pas mthong ba yin// de bzhin rtog can dbang gis 'di// bdag gi blo ni rdza ltar gnas// tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thug par//
34b4: rtog pa med pas rab tu 'dzin// gang 'di mang po sdang ba dag/ sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan// sna tshogs thams cad bdag gi sems// rdza la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan/ nang du gyur pa'i gzug
34b5: rnams dang / / mtho ris gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang // gang 'di phyi nang bya ba rnams// thams cad sems las byung ba'o// rgyan sdug rnal 'byor gang yin pa// de ni gung na yod pa min// rnal 'byor can gyi
34b6: bsod nams kyis/ / zhugs pa 'di la bslab par gyis// dbang sgyur lha rdzas gnas dag dang // yang na gzugs can rnams gnas dang // 'du shes med pa'i gnas su 'am// 'og ma yin pa'i gnas su
34b7: yang / / cung zad med dang rnam shes dang // 'du shes yod pa ma yin dang // sna tshogs kyi ni gnas dag tu// 'dod chags kyi ni phyogs bshig na// khyod ni myur du der gnas pa// stug po rnal 'byor can ga
34b8: su/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas te// stug po der ni 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor de la spyad par gyis// bdag gi gnyen gyis ci zhig bya// bdag gi gnyen ni rtag tu 'ching // 'khor ba'i lam rgyud tu

35a1: yang yin/ / dbang po rnams ni g.yo ba ste// bud med rnams la 'ang blo 'khrul bas// khu tu khrag mnam mi nim pa'i// 'ji bar srin bu skyes gyur pa// dgu'am bcu zhig pa dang yang // khu chu smin nas/
35a2: mngon par skye// dbang po rnams kyis kun yog pa// srin bu g.yo ba ji bzhin te// rim pa de yi tshul gyis na// ji srid sems can gnas par du'o// lus can rnams kyi skye la ltos// tshe tsher de dag byung ba ste//
35a3: pha dang ma ni stong dag dang // bu dang chung ma brgya dag kyang // thams cad gnas su rnyed pa ni// lus can skye la gnas pa'o// rmi lam dag na bu med pa'i// mo sham bu 'byung ji bzhin du// bu rnyed pa ye dga' ba dang /
35a4: rmi lam chi tshe de nyid ldan// de ni shir gyur de nas de// rmi lam shes nas sad pa dang // rmi lam gyi ni bu shi med// gang yang skye ba yod pa min// chu bo rab tshal bu dang ni// grong khyer dag dang ri rnams dang // grong dang tshe
35a5: 'dus byugs ltas dang / / dka' thub tshal bu'i gnas rnams dang // 'gro ba dag gis rgyas pa'i yul// zhing dang ba lang lug gis gang // 'jig rten gyi ni longs spyod kyang // de dang 'di dang gzhan du'ang sna
35a6: ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir rgyug pa/ / rmi lam rgyug pa de bzhin te// gdeg dang bskum la sogs pa yang // de dang 'dir yang snang ba yin// mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba// skye ba med cing 'chi med par//
35a7: slar sad nas su sems pa ni// bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no// ji ltar ri dang de'u rnams kyi// grib ma kun du snang ba bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang // mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam//
35a8: ltar skyes bunyal ba zhig/ bud med lhan cig rtse dga' mi// sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang // lha rab btsun mo mnyam pa dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos pos te// sad nas rnam par sems pa ni/

35b1: ci zhig bden na ma rma lam yin// rmi lam bud med lhan cig du// rtses nas phyir ni bdag sad de// 'di brdzun bus bslu ba yin// de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun// rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no// dman
35b2: bgyos po bu dag dang / / ma dang phu nu po dag kyang // rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste// rnal 'byor sbyar bar jir mi bya// dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang // ri dang ri yi sma na gshong dang // 'o ma 'thung dang ma la ya/
35b3: wu na po bya 'da' dbang chen dang // gangs kyi ri dang ke'i las// char 'bab la yang gang gnas dang // 'dzam bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang // gang dag bdud rtsi zab dang // zan du ka ma bal ba ra ya tra// ko bi dar nar 'ayod
35b4: dang / / ri rab nang na gang gnas dang // dpag bsam shing la gnas pa dang // rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // thams cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di// gang 'byung 'byung ba
35b5: rnams kyi ste/ / pad mo'i gnas su brtan bcas te// dkyil mo dkrung du mnyam bzhag cing // rtag tu rnal 'byor sbar bar gyis// 'dod dang bde las rnam par dben// dbang po dbang po'i don gyi rnams//
35b6: thams cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing // lcags kyus glang po ji bzhin du// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par gyis// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge
35b7: 'dod dang dga' ba dben la sogs/ / yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang // khyad par du'ang gzugs med dang // 'du shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams// nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // 2nga
35b8: shes yod min med min rnams/ / nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs// pad mo dang ni 'od 'dra zhing // nam mkha'i ri mo mi 'dra bar// rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong // 'di dag thams cad spangs nas su/

36a1: snang ba med par rab tu gnas// gang tshe mtshan med rnal 'byor can// rnam par mi rtogs chags med na// sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong // zhing dang zhing na mnyam bzhag pa// de dag
36a2: phyag gi dbang bskur bar/ / de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang // sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung // sna tshogs tshul gyis dngos thob nas// kun mkhyen thams cad rig
36a3: bar 'gyur/ / stobs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'thob// gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin// tha mra cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur// thub pa rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i yid// gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzhigs
36a4: shing / / mchog rdul yan chad nyin dben phyir// yod las med par 'gyur ba ste// bong bu'i ba lang rwa mthong bzhin// cha shes med phyir cha shes can// phung po las ni phung can med// de bas las kyi 'bras gyur pa//
36a5: 'di ni sgyu ma'i bus byas bzhin// 'di ni las med 'bras bu med// las kyi sgrub pa'ang yod pa min// 'jig rten byed pas ma byas te// byed pa byed pa ma yin no// byed la byed pa yod na ni// 'di rnams thug pa med
36a6: par 'gyur/ / thug med byas pa'i nyes pa yis// thub pa dri ma can du gyur// de ste lam rgyud sna tshogs rnams// chu dang nam mkha' sa gnas pa'i// lus can lus la kun gnas te// skye ba bzang po gnas su ste//
36a7: ris su 'gro ba yod pas na// ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'gro// dbang po so so bya ba yang // ji ltar 'dod par yul 'dzin te// 'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba// zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las// de bzhin skye dang
36a8: gnas dang 'jig/ las kyis byas par 'gyur sems na// rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin// brag cha dang ni klog 'dra ba// smig myu ri dgas sred pa ltar// dngos po rnams bsgoms rnal 'byor can// thog ma med nas//

36b1: bsags pa yi// mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis// sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang // sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags// dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin// yul rnams rmi lam 'dra ba ste// byed dang
36b2: las dang bya ba yang / / rnal 'byor sgrub pas mi brtag go// rtog pa nyams pa'i rtog pa can// rnam mos shes pa nyams chung bas// byed par rab tu rtog pa ni// bya bas 'gro bar byas par te// 'jig rten gces
36b3: pas byas ma yin/ / rdul gyi rkyen las byung ba'ang min// rgyu med pas kyang byas ma yin// ngo bo nyid kyis byung ba'ang min// rdo rje lugs dang khab long dang // rin chen 'phreng ba rgyan rnams kyis// ji lta bu yelas shig
36b4: byas/ / nor bu gser du ming brtags pas// bya dang ri dgas khra bo dang // tsher ma rnams kyi rdo dngos dang // 'gro ba sna tshogs ngo mtshar ba// rnam rtog las las ma skyes so// las ci gang las ma yin zhes// rtog
36b5: can bden la myos pa ni/ / bden pa'i dngos po mi shes pa// 'di ni rnam rtog las min du// 'o ma'i nang na yod pa'i dus// rjes su me bde rnam par 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa'ang thams cad du// de bzhin dngos pa
36b6: rnams la 'jug/ dngos po skye ba ma yin te// dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'ang med// rnam rtog sna tshogs de dag ni// rtog pa can gyis mi rig go// 'gro ba'i ris kyi dngos po dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par
36b7: gzhig/ sbyar zhing rnal 'byor de la zhugs// las dang las min ma sems par// ris su 'gro ba'i dngos po yis// zla ba nyi ma rnam mdzes pa// rlung gis shin du bskyod nas kyang // mkha' la rten pa med par
36b8: 'gro/ / shin du phra zhing shes dka'i las// stug por gnas par rab tu mthong // las de ci zhig yod par 'gyur// zhugs brtson rnal 'byor can dag la// ji ltar me ni shing gi ri// thal bar byed pa skad cig sa/

37a1: rnal 'byor can gyi thams cad las// ye shes mes tshig skad cig du// las dang bag chags lhan cig tu// mang po'i dus nas bsags pa dag/ rnal 'byor ye shes bag chags kyis// thams
37a2: cad zhig byed skad cig du/ / ji ltar sgro na mas mun pa'i tshogs// skad cig tu ni gsal byed pa// ye shes sgron mas thub pa de// mi shes rnam par sel bar bya// rgyan stug po theg pa chen po'i mdo las bdag gi
37a3: las kyi bya ba spyad pa zhes bya ba ste/ / // le'u lnga pa'o// // 'phags pa brgyan stug po// bam po gsum pa// // 'jim pa rtswa mig thag pa las// ji ltar gnas pa'i khyim gyi rnams// phan tshun kun
37a4: nas 'dus 'byor cing / / sa yi dbus na snang ba ni// re re la yang khyim med de// rdzas dang dngos la rnam brtags na// rdzas kyi rnam pa 'dus pa la// khyim zhes gdags shing brjod pa ste// sor mo phan tshun kun
37a5: 'dus na/ / ji ltar lag pa'i bu dud du// lag pa gnyis ni bsdus las 'gyur// tha dad pa las mi 'byung ngo // g.yul dang shing rta bsnyems bral khang // grong khyer nags tshal de bzhin te// ri dang sprin dang
37a6: dpa' rlabs kyang / / brag cha glog dang 'dra ba'o// smig sku chu zlabru 'dra ba// snam bu rdza sogs grags pa ste// mkhas la dngos po thams cad kyang // rmi la ma 'dra bar kun du snang // de bzhin lus khyim sna tshogs pa/
37a7: bus pa'i lam chud dog pa na// khams kyis ri bzhin gyur pa ste// khyim ltar rtag tu mi brtan la// 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med// bdag las ma yin gzhan las min// rtag dang chad las rnam par grol// gzung
37a8: dang 'dzin pa yongs su spangs/ / ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer ni// mdog du zad kyang grong ltar snang // / de bzhin rang rtog rnam brtags pa'i// dngos po rnams kyang rab tu 'byung // chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste// yid

37b1: med rnam bral dge ba yin/ / rmi lam sprin ltar snang ba ste// cig dos ri mo'i phrug lta bu'o// zhabo long ba 'dra ba ni// dngos kun gcig gis gcig rgyu ba// rang bzhin rtogs par mi rung ste// rnal 'byor can
37b2: gyis yang dag mthong / / rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang // rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te// rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas// rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod// de phyir blo ni phyir ldog ste// sku
37b3: la sogs pa'i yon tan spangs/ / rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can// de tsheng la gso'i yid du 'gyur// ral gso'i yid ldan rnal 'byor can// bcings pa kun las grol bas na// 'di dang pa
37b4: mi skye ste/ / bsam gtan tshul la mos pa rnams// sna tshogs rin chen snying po yi// gnas na bang can de dag rtse// yon tan dbang byung nyes pa med// rig 'dzin bud med mang po dang // thub pa rnams kyis rab
37b5: mchod cing / / rmi lam bzhin du gnas pa yin// 'di na gnas kyang tshangs pa dang // thub dang thub pa'i bu rnams dang // rig 'dzin tshogs kyis de bzhin te// spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus so// 'di yi thub pa'i
37b6: rnal 'byor yul/ / de bas bsam gtan brtson par gyis/ 'di ni kun gyi yul ma yin// de phyir grogs po bstan par gyis// brtan pas rnams sna tshogs dang // 'od can rnams kyi gnas su yang // 'dod
37b7: chags phyogs dang bcas pa dang / / gti mug zhe sdang de bzhin du// bcom ste stug por rab yangs pa// yid bzhin zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro// de ni 'chi bdag yul ma yin/ rnam shes spyod yul de bzhin
37b8: min/ / mtshan ma med pa'i gnas yin te// rtog pas de bsgrub ma yin no// 'di ni lha rdzas gnas yin te// thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// de bas zhing mchog de 'dod na// thub pas bsam gtan de la gyis//

38a1: 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam bcom ste// nga med nga yi 'gro med du// 'dod chags zhe sdang mi bsam par// bsam gtan mchog la bsgom par gyis// phan tshun yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir// gnyis kyi blo ni rab
38a2: tu 'byung / / yod med rtog pas de bzhin du// rnam shes rnams la kun gzhi'o// bud med ro smad shas rgyas shing // sgra bzang mig kyang mdzes pa dang // sna legs 'phral ba'i dbyibs sdug la// smin ma sdug cing blta
38a3: mdzes pa/ / ji ltar lal der chags pa'i// yid kyis rnam par myos pa'i sems// lta zhing rnam par rtog pa'i tshe// mkhas min de la shin du myos// 'gro 'dug 'greng yang de bzhin te sdom zag nyid kyis log nas //
38a4: 'dod can gzhan du mi sems te// 'dod pa can mo yid la byed// de bzhin khyod blo rnyog pa can// rnam pa kun du yid la gnas// rdzab yul rnyog dang ldan pa yi// bcings pa'i dbang du ma 'gro shig/ ji ltar la
38a5: la rtog pa can/ / blo yi spyod yul rnam 'khrul ba// ma he dag dang bal glang dang // glang po dag dang bse rnams dang // rang gi kri swA sa ra dang // sha ra ba dang su ra dang // sman dang g.yag kyang de bzhin te// mgo kar snang
38a6: khyu mchog gi/ ru chen rnam par mthong ba dang // 'di bden gzhan du mi 'gyur zhes// seng stag bong bu sogs pa yi// rwa rnams la ni med ces te// yod dang med pa'i lta ba yang // mi mkhas rnams la rab tu
38a7: 'byung / / de ltar gzhan gyi rwa mthong zhing // bong bu'i med ces rnam rtog 'byung // ji ste gzhan gyi ma mthong na// bong ru med snyam de mi 'byung // log par dmigs pa'i rgyu yi phyir// 'di na med ces rtog pa
38a8: 'byung / / de la dmigs pa med pas kyang // gdon mi za bar med la rten// rnyog can nga rgyal rtog yul ba// blo gros spyod yul ma rton cig/ ba lang ba men ma he rnams// rtog pas brtags pa ji bzhin te//

38b1: de ltar khyod kyis sems spyod dang // phung po skye mched spyod yul dag/ mngon sum tshad ma dag gis sam// shes rab kyis kyang rnam par ltos// rnam grol mtho ris 'gro ba 'am// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang
38b2: 'gyur/ / tshangs pa'i gnas su tshangs par ram// mtsho ma rab dang gnas dben dang // rin chen sna tshogs gnas su yang // dbang sgyur rnam par mdzes par 'gyur// 'on dung rgyas pa dag tu'am// 'dod 'am//
38b3: bdag po dbang can nam// nyi zla ba dag bdag gnas su 'am// gzhan yang 'od 'bar gzar yang rung // sum bcu rtsa gsum rgyal chen dang // 'phrul la dga' ba'i gnas su yang // tshangs gnas bcu'i
38b4: dang ldan pa yi/ / rnal 'byor can ni rnam par mdzes// gya nom snang dang shin du mthong // 'dod med mi dros de bzhin te// 'og min gnas kyi lha rdzas na// 'og min shin du rnam par mdzes// cung zad med
38b5: mkha' rnam shes dang / / 'du shes yod med ma yin dang // de bzhin 'phrul gyi bde can dang // zhing bzang gzhan du de bzhin te// mkha' la 'gro dang spobs pa bzhin// 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rigs su gnas// grol ba
38b6: rnams kyi grol yul la/ / su gnas de dag rnal 'byor can// 'dod chags stobs las sngon rgyal ba// de dag bzang po'i sa la gnas// 'di lta'i rnal 'byor ldan pas ma// rnal 'byor las ni thub par rtse/
38b7: rdza ma 'jig pa gyo mo yi// ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur ba dang // skad cig 'jig la skad cig ste// mi rtag nyid kyang rtag pa yi// sa bon ji bzhin myu gu la// rgyu rnams de dag 'dra ba yin// myu gu gzhan mi na sa bon
38b8: las/ / sa bon nyid kyang myu gu min// sa snar rnams las rdza snar 'byung // chos dam dmar rur mngon par 'byung// gnag dang sna ra dang 'dres pa dang // gro bo dmar po dag kyang ste// 'dam bu las ni sgog par

39a1: 'gyur/ / rwadra las lan tshwar de bzhin te// mi gtsang sbrang bu dag las kyang // srin bur 'gyur gzhan mi 'dra mar// rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu ni// sa rnams gang na'ang yod pa min// gyur pa'i rgyu las
39a2: 'bras bu 'thung / / rdul phran gang dag rgyur 'gyur ni// dngos po 'jig pa med par te// rnam par rtog la mi rtog cing // rgyu yi bdag dang nang gi bdag/ bdag gi mchog kyang med pa ste// bdag dang dbang po yid dang /
39a3: don// 'dus pa'i rgyun ma yin te// phrad las 'byung dang rnam shes dang // rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin no// shes can shes pas yul rnams la// mkhas pa'i stobs dang ldan pas ni// sde dpung stobs dang bzhon bcas
39a4: pa'i/ / nyon mongs bdud rnams gdul bar bya// sred pa 'jig rten dma' bar byed// sbrang rtsis bad kan mang po bzhin// sred pa bcom zhing thub pa'i rnams// rnam par mang las rnam par grol// sred pas rnam par
39a5: dkrugs pa ni/ / 'khor las rnam par mi 'grol te// sred dang rnam bral 'thar bar 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis// yun ring yod pa'i bag chags ni// sbrul gdug khros pa ji bzhin yang // 'di dang pa
39a6: bIr 'dring ba ni/ / 'khor ba'i lam rgyud dog par ro// 'phags pa rgyan stug po las rnal 'byor rnam par phye ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go// / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnam phye dang // bdag ldan de
39a7: yi byin gyis brlabs/ / rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// bye ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa dang // khams gsum gnas pa thams cad dang // sa gnas rnal 'byor ldan pa dang // bde yid zhing dang stug po ste// rdul
39a8: 'byor can gyi zhing mchog dang / / sangs rgyas pad mo'i dbus bzhugs pa// rdul phran bzhin bzhugs bdag gis mthong // rnal 'byor de las bdag langs nas// sa la rgyal ba de dag ni// stug po'i zhing na

39b1: bdag bzhugs shing / / rgyal sras thabs gcig bzhugs pa dag/ me tog a ta mi 'dra ba'i// mkha' la zla 'dra bzhin bzhugs mthong // mthe bo'i tshogs dang rab 'dra ba// sa rnams dge la rab sbyor ba'i// rnam
39b2: grol snying po bdag gis mthong / / 'di na bu khyod su zhig ces// snying po de ltar sems gyur te// thub pa 'di ni gcig cig snyam// de tshe sku ru zhugs par gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyang bsrung bzhugs na// thub pa pad mo'i snyi
39b3: po yis/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs spyod dang // khams gsum kun nas gnas par yang // gang tshe mthong ba de dus na// khyi ma mtshar ces bsam pa dang // da thub pa lha yi lhas// rnal 'byor yul ni rab bsdus
39b4: tre/ / thub pas sngon bzhin bzhag par gyur// kye ma bsam yas lha rdzas 'di// rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs gzugs// sangs rgyas lha yi yul yin te// bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis mthong // chos kyi sprin gyi
39b5: ting 'dzin dang / / dga' dang mi g.yo de bzhin te// ring song mngon du gyur pa dang // 'od byed pa yi ma lus par// sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs// gzi brjid can yang ma lus par// gzugs rnams kyi yang yul
39b6: yin te/ / 'og min thabs las byung ba'o// de ni yid bzhin 'gyur sku yis// dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams// phra tshogs che ba'i yon tan dang // 'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang // bdag po dbang dang
39b7: ldan pa dang / / ji ltar 'dod par rung ba'i rnams// thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na// rnam par gnas shing rab tu brtse// sprul pa'i lha rdzas stug po nas// phyin pa dge ba de dag kyang // lhun gyis grub pa sa
39b8: rgyas kyi/ / 'phrul pa rnams kyis rab tu 'gyed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras su// thabs gcig bzhugs par kun du snang // de ltar sa 'di sna tshogs te// rang gi gzugs ldan rnams kyang 'dres//

40a1: cha las phyir ldog da ya che// bya ba byas pas sdug pa'i gzhi// shes pas bcad cing mkhas pa'i rnams// thub pa dag gis stug po mthong // gzhal med pad mo 'dra ba na// me ltar rab tu 'bar ba ya//
40a2: thub pa rnal 'byor bde mos pa// rnal 'byor can dang lhan cig gnas// dpal be'u mtshan dang thams cad ldan// pra ba'i lus can rang gi 'od// de dag dbus su thub pa'i dbang // khyod ni gnas par rab tu 'gyur//
40a3: ltos shig lha yi cod pan dang // dru ma mi 'am ci yi bdag/ gzhal med dbye ba mang po yis// zla ba bzhin du rab tu 'bar// thub pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras// dga' ldan la sogs lha yi mchog/ a tas
40a4: yi me tog 'dra/ / shes rab bzang zhing mtshan mngab// phreng bcod pan thogs pa'i rnams// gzhal mad mang pos gnas pa ste// lus ni bkra'abar ba dang // kun mkhyen thams cad mngon gyur pa// dzasa?/
40a5: pa med pa'i spobs pa dang // kun du bzang po stobs chen te// zla ba 'dra ba'i gzhal med kyis// stug po'i gang chen mtsho la gnas// rnam pa du mar thams cad nas// thub pa rnams kyis bstod pa ste/
40a6: chags med tshangs pa'i khyu mchog dang // grub dang dri za tshogs rnams dang // mkhas dang nges par ldan pa yi// skyes bu'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas// rnal 'byor spyod pas/
40a7: khyad par du// gzims pa lta bur mthong ba ni// de dag le lo bral bas te// gnyid dang snyom sogs bsrabs pa yis// sangs rgyas lha yi rjes su 'brang // mur 'dug kun gyis mthong gyur cing // de bzhin
40a8: lha dang tshangs la sogs/ / 'dzam gling ba dang 'og min dang // 'phrul gyis sprul pas thub mthong ba// 'gro bas sna tshogs kun gzugs su// sa la kun nas bzhugs par te// cho 'bral rnam pa mang po yi//

40b1: mgon po shin du rnam par mdzes// la la nyal zhing rab tu 'bar// de bzhin gzhan dag phan tshun 'chag/ la la g.yen spyo brel cing sgom// de bzhin gzhan yang mya ngan 'da'// la la mngal du 'jug pa dang //
40b2: skya dang 'byung dang dka' spyod dang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ro// sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas yul// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// rgyal ba'i sras po 'jigs
40b3: med pa/ / de dag kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te// thub pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar brnyes bzhin grogs po rnams// rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa yis// 'di dag kun la yid ches kyis// yid ches gyur na sangs rgyas
40b4: sam/ / thar par 'gyur ba the tshom med// 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// spobs can khams kyi bdag po dang // tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas su yang // gnas 'gyur 'khor gyi bdag por 'gyur//
40b5: dri med zhing gi pad mo la// thub pa'i dbus su skye bar 'gyur// pad mo'i dbus su skye ba yang // brtson 'grus ldan pa'i sras kyis 'thob// brtson pas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// bag chags 'dod pa'i rgyu las
40b6: kyang / / 'dod bdag bdag po pha ma byas shing // thog pa gcig la rab tu 'jug/ brtson 'grus ldan zhing zhi med pa'i// rigs kyang thub par rab tu ston// sras po yangs pa'i rigs gyur cing // zhing dang zhing du bdag
40b7: bor 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas nyid du sngon sems na// sangs rgyas rigs ni rnam par dag/ rnam dag rigs ni rnam par dag/ rnam dag rigs can sras de ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi lung bstan te// spang
40b8: sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba/ / de bzhin thub pa 'tshang rgya'o// rnam sangs rgyas nas nyer 'tsho ba// tshangs la sogs dang rnal 'byor can// sa ltar rtag pa'i dus su yang // lus can rnams la nye bar gnas// thams

41a1: cad sman gyi rnal 'byor can/ / ji ltar grong dang grong gnas pa// nad rnams rab tu sel ba ltar// rab tu mkhas pa de byed pa// rnam rtog med pa'i yid kyis te// bcad kyang g.yo zhing mgul ba med/
41a2: 'di ni rnam par rig pa tsam// yid ni nang dang phyi yang spyod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste// nor bar mthong zhing mi g.yo'o// yid kyi rnam shes yul can gyi// kun gzhi kun nas gnas pa ste// gcad dang
41a3: gcod par byed pa dang / / de nyid gcod bya gcod pa'ang yin// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi ni// las kyi bag chags rnams kyis yog/ khar ba nor bu nyi ma dag/ ldan las me 'byung ji bzhin te// gtsub ma
41a4: gtsub stan 'dus las min/ / mis kyang byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin sems yid rnam shes dang // dbang po don dang yid dang las// sems rnams rab tu skyer gyur pa// rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ci bzhin no// /
41a5: smig rgyu nam mkha' sgyu ma dang // rmi lam ma yin nor ba'ang min// sbal ba ru sbal spu dag dang // ri bong rwa dang mnyam pa'ang min// me ni shing las skye bar 'gyur// glog ni de bzhin sprin las so// me la skyed pa
41a6: su'ang med/ / rdza sogs rdza mkhan lta bu'o// ji ltar rtsa dang shing dag la// brten cing lhan cig sgra 'byung ba// de bzhin mos la sogs pa kun// sems dang sems byung lhan cig gnas// sems kyi yul na
41a7: bsam du med/ / sdug na gnas pas legs par mthong // lha rdzus sngon med lhan cig skyes// mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' bzhin// so sor ma brtags 'gog pa ltar// / dus gsum rnam par spangs
41a8: pa ste/ / 'od can rtag tu dag pa ni// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi'o// dang po ches pa'i zla mdog ltar// bye ba'i zhing du sdang ba ste// ri rab gnas shing 'khor ba yang // dngos po 'jig pa ma yin no// de bzhin

41b1: yid sems rnam par shes/ / sems can khams na 'khor mod kyi// de la 'phel zhing 'bri med de// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od snang ba'o// ji ltar zla ba skye 'bri bar// mi shes 'gro ba rnam rtog kyang // skye 'bri zla la/
41b2: yod pa yin/ gling dang gling du'ang rab tu sdang // de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes la// byis pa mi shes 'gro rnams kyang // rtag tu skye brir rnam rtog ste// de ni zag med sangs rgyas so// kun gzhi 'di la ji ltar yang // 'byung
41b3: bas tha dad mi 'gyur te/ / 'jug pa'i rnam shes song gnas pa// bag chags kyis ni zla ba bzhin// chu klung dbus kyi shing lta bur// chu bo'i klung dang 'grogs mod kyi// tha dad mtshan du'ang rab tu grub// rgya mtsho chen
41b4: por de bzhin 'gro/ / de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rtag tu bag chags ldan gyur pa// rnam par shes pa bdun po dang // 'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dang // rnam par
41b5: dag pa'i rgyu yang de/ / chos mthong 'phags pa rnams kyi yang // de ni rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pa// byol song mi dang lhar skyes dang // sha za lto 'phye yi dgas dang // lha min dri za 'bar ba yin// lam rgyud
41b6: kun kyang de yi dbang / / sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes la'ang // de nyid rgyur ni gyur pa ste// de rtogs nas ni sangs rgyas dang // rigs dang theg pa gzhan min 'gyur// thams cad lus la rtag tu gnas// /
41b7: spyod 'os yod la rnam par 'dug/ dpal dang ldan la khyad par du// thams cad kun kyang rab tu gnas// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la'ang // 'gro ba dog pa thams cad na// de ni kun du gnas pa
41b8: ste/ / lus can rnams kyi lus la rten// 'bras bu'i bdag dang rgyu yi bdag/ nang gi bdag kyang de nyid la// byis pa rnams kyi 'khor zug brtag/ de yi dbyings la thog ma med// gnas ngan len

42a1: dang las kyis bskyed/ / bag chags thog ma med pas bsags// 'tsho zhing gso bar byed pa ni// rnam par shes pa bdun po ste// yid ni rtag tu rlung dang mnyam// g.yo zhing myur bar rab tu 'jug
42a2: lus can rnams kyi lus gnas shing / / khams kyi gong la gnas pa'o// las kyi rlung gis bskyed pa ni// dbang po rnams la khyab par gnas// rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu// dpa' rlabs bzhin du rgyu ba ste/
42a3: rdul phran dus dang gtso bo dang // de bzhin skyes bu dbang bcas su// kun gni gcig pu dge bdo// rtog pa can gyis ther zug pa rtag/ rtag tu sna tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs// g.yo zhing mur 'byung byed pa ste/
42a4: kun gzhis rnams thams cad du// phyi nang bcas par gnas pa yin// de ni sa yi rgyu yin par// rgyu can rnams kyis brtag pa sde// de yi 'gro ba shin du phra// rtog pa can rnams myos par byed// bdag
42a5: don dbang po yid mos pa'i/ / yang dag ma mthong myos par 'gyur// sngon gyi las kyis spyod pa yi// rnam par shes pa sred pa'i rgyu// sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba dang // mi rnams kyi yang rgyu yin no//
42a6: 'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// kun gzhi dang lugs dge ba ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong thos te// kun gzhi'i mchog tu dge ba ni// thams cad lus la
42a7: zhen pa ste/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba'i// rgyal ba 'khor lo 'khor bar yang // sa rnams la lar 'gro bas mthong // ji ltar zla ba skar tshogs dang /
42a8: lhan cig mkha' la gnas pa ltar// rnam shes rnams dang kun gzhi yang // de bzhin lhan cig lus la gnas// ji ltar dbang gis gyur ba'i lha// lha yi bu mos mdun bdar cing // rin chen dbus na

42b1: rnam mdzes pa/ / de bzhin kun gzhis rnams la// ji ltar chung dbang chu yi lha// chu klung rgya mtsho mching rnams la// ji bzhini skye ldan sa yang ste// de bzhi ni sems ni rnam par mdzes// ji ltar gzhal med
42b2: gnas pa'i gnyi/ / ri rab logs na rnam par mdzes// lha rnams kyis ni phyag kyang bya// de bzhin kun gzhi sangs rgyas sar// so bcu dag la lhan cig tu// spyad pa spyod pa rgyal ba'i sras// theg pa chen pos phyung ba
42b3: ste/ / lus la gnas pa rnam par mdzes// rjod pa'i zhal gyis rtag par yang // rgyal ba rnams ni kun nas bstod// nyan thos rnams dang rang rgyal dang // rgyal ba'i sras rnams khyad par du// sa dang sa la rnam dag
42b4: pa/ / rgyal ba'i sras shes mngon bsgrags dang // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// de dag kun gzhi 'di la brjod// lung ston lung bstan 'gyur ba yi// rgyal sras rgyal ba de bzhin te// kun gzhi dri med bsod
42b5: nams kyis/ / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin// 'di lta bu yi kun gzhi'i yul// sdug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can// thub brtson rnal 'byor spyod pa yis// rab tu mthong gis rnal 'byor gyis// sarba
42b6: rgyas dag dang rang sangs rgyas/ / nyan thos rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan// de nyid rtogs nas mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor 'jigs med rnal 'byor ro// rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul gang // 'di ltar snang ba ci'ang
42b7: rung / / rnam par shes par gyur pa ste// rdza la sogs pas ma yin// 'di ltar nor ba gar snang ba// sna tshogs rdza grags ci'ang rung // de ni kun gzhir gyur pa ste// snang ba nor ba'i mtshan nyid do// kun gzhi
42b8: chu klung de bzhin du/ / sna tshogs snang mngon 'gro bas mthong // bag chags rnams kyis bsgos pa'i sems// gzung dang 'dzin pa rab tu 'khor// dngos po sgyu 'dra ma yin te// sgra yi tshogs dang smig rgyu min//

43a1: skyes dang ma skyes ma yin te// stong dang mi stong rnam par spangs// dngos su gcig med mi 'gyur te// ring dang thur la sogs pa bzhin// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni// gang na ci'ang yod
43a2: ba min/ / de ni rigs sngags sgyu ma ste// skyes bu rnams la rab tu snang // smig sgyu sgra la sogs pa'i tshogs// gnyis la nye bar mngon pa ste// gcig med par ni gnyis po yang // ma byung 'byung bar
43a3: mi 'gyur te/ / sgra la sogs pa rnam brtags pa// 'di ni rnam shes gyur pa'o// sku med sku zhes bya ba yi// dngos po gang dang gang yang med// ci'adapung ste gang yod pa// sgyu mas bya ba'ang yod pa yin//
43a4: myos par byed par 'jig rten na// sems la dbang med rnams la yod// sgyu ma dag gam gyo mo dag/ sna tshogs sgyu mas ma byas te// g.yo ba gang dag ci'ang rung // de ni snang min sus mi mthong // 'di la rnam
43a5: rtog g.yo ba ni/ / khab long dag la lcags bzhin te// sems can med la mi rtog pa'i// shel sgong nor bu ji bzhin no// kun gzhi kun nas sna tshogs pa// byed pa bzhin du snang ba ste// skye zhing 'chi bar
43a6: 'gyur mod kyi/ / 'khor ba po ni gang+gA yang med// rmi lam 'dra bar skye shi dag/ rab tu mthong na rnam par 'grol// thub pa gang tshe gyur pa na// grol ba zhes ni brjod pa ste// rigs dang gzhung gis brtan
43a7: pa ni/ / sangs rgyas khyu mchog de yin no// thams cad chos la mo long bzhin// sred yin de bzhin tshad ma ste// dngos po kun la ston ma bzhin// khab blang ba yi dza ltar gnas// rnal 'byor lam
43a8: gyi mtshan nyid de/ / 'jig pa rnams kyang rnam par bzlog/ bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mchog/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// kun nas nyon mongs zad par byed// lam yang rnam

43b1: bar gyur ba'o/ / dam pa'i don gyi sbyar yul tate// kyul ba bstan pa'o// 'phags brgyan sdug po las lce'u bdun no// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdorje'i snang pos kya
43b2: bcur bltas te/ / gtsug gi rin po che'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang // dbang byed kyi gnas dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i pho brang na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i sras rnams la'ang snang bar
43b3: byas te/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa ston pa la smras pa// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa ston pa khab yod pa'i ngos la ri dgas thams cad gso
43b4: pa zhes bya ba'i ri dgas kyi rigs shig yod de/ / de ni gtsom rgyu brgya stong gis ri dgas mad po nye bar brid cing thabs la ba ba pa'i ri dgas rnams bsad cing za'o// ri dgas drus ma phru gu dang bcas pa ma
43b5: na'aphru gu'i skad du 'bod do/ / ri dgas rwa can mthong na'ang rwa de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o// de nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang / des de dag bag ton par rig nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o//
43b6: rwa mthong na'ang rwa'i gzugs su bstan te// de dag zag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsad cing za ste// ji ltar ri dgas zhe gtum pa'i ngang tshul can de rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dgas gsod pa de bzhin
43b7: du kun gni rnam par shes pa'ang phas kyi rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par zhen pa/ / bdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa/ 'dzin pa de dang de dag gis bcings pa de dang de dag la sa
43b8: l ta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis bdag tu smra ba yongs su rtog cing rdul phra mo yan chad du rab tu shes par byed pa de dag la de'i bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid du gnas pa ni gzhan du rnam par shes pa

44a1: tsam du mi gnas pa'i bar du ste/ bdag yongs su rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis ni yid dang dbang po dang don du ldan pa las shes pa skye ba mthong gi/ bdag dang yid dang dbang po dang / 'od
44a2: 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no/ / dper na me tog dang gos su phrang na gsung gi khyad par du 'gyur gyi// ma phrad par ni gsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba'i
44a3: yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa snod dang ba dang lta bu 'am/ / me mar dang rdza lta bu 'am// smig lo dang i shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de// rgyu dang rkyen
44a4: las sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung zhing bdag med la phra ba dang / / bskyed du mi rung ba dang / cha med pa dang / ngag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang / yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor
44a5: can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs par rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so/ / 'di nyid ni ri dgas kyi gcan zan zhig tum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams
44a6: la yod pa dang / med pa dang / gcig pa dang / mang po dang / thams cad dang / thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste// lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag
44a7: gir skab la mngon par zhen par yang ltung bar byed do/ / mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud pa'i blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pa'i nas rab tu rgyug ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
44a8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba/ rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang tshes ring bar nyams pa'i blo can 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa/ theg pa gsum

44b1: las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par byir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas/ / ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skal pa can rnams kyang stug po 'am/
44b2: stug po'i sgra yang ma thos so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs su snang ba ste/ 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang
44b3: brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'jug pa'i gam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams la skyon cig/ rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste/
44b4: le'u brgyad do// // khab long rdol ji ltar lcags// yongs kyis kun du rab 'khor ba// de bzhin phung po'i shing rta sta// stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor// rtsa dang 'jim pa
44b5: shing smig dang / / thag pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las// khyim du ji ltar snang gyur pa// de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o// lcags dang khab long ro la ngas la// sems can nye bar
44b6: dmigs med kyang / / thams cad sems can lta bur g.yo// de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o// rgyal sras phyag na rin chen gyis// gzungs mang rgyal mchog la sbas pa/
44b7: mnyam bzhag rdo rje'i snying po la// rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byos// rgyal sras 'jigs med mkhas pa'i rnams// kun gyis thos par 'gyur ba ni// brtag bral ba rtag par mi
44b8: nus pa/ / brjod pas rnam par spangs pa ste// ming dang ming can rnam bral ba// 'on kyang 'du ba de bzhin te// sna tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi// rang bzhin ci dang cir gnas pa// de nas

45a1: gzugs mang rgyal po yis/ / rdo rje snying po 'jigs med la// rjes su 'brel ba'i skabs dris pas dngos po don gzhan brtag pa ste// rdo rje'i dbang po'i dngos po grang // la la rab tu brtag bya ba//
45a2: ming dang 'du shes sogs pa'i yul// yod dam rdo rje snying pos smos// ming rnams sus byas ji lta bu// ming ni ci la rab tu gnas// mi mgon tshig ni thos pa dang // rdo rje'i snying pos de la smras// 'di
45a3: dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ / 'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas// brjod las tha dad gyur pa yi// brjod par bya ba yod pa min// phung po bzhi po mang yin te// gzugs kyang tsam nas rnam par brtag
45a4: tsam la ming dra brtags pa ni/ / skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba ste// tsam la mtshan ma zhes bya bar// rgyal ba rgyal sras dag gis gsungs// mtshan ma med par ming du ni// de dag rnam par rtog mi nus// da bas
45a5: man mnyen byas shing / / ming du kun nas brtag pa yin// ji ltar lding dang sa byang dang // bar ma de yang yod pa min// mtshan ma med par ci yang rung // byis pas de la rnams mi btag/ de bzhin
45a6: sa 'disems cad kyang / / mtshan ma med par yod ba min// ci yang mtshan mang mi rtog pa// mtshan ma me na rnam par brgyag/ rdza dang nam tha shing ta dag/ gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod// 'jig
45a7: 'din 'di tsam so/ / gnas sa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur// tsam la ming du brtags pa ste// 'di la yang dag ming ma min// ming med rnam par bral bar yag/ sa rnams thub pas mthong ban// rnam par to/
45a8: pa rab tu 'jug/ rnam rtog med pa mi skye'o// tsher skye med pa gzhan gyur pa// mi zad de la skye bar 'gyur// rgyu med phyir na ming med de// 'du shes tsam la rnam par rtog// de bas rgyal pos rtag par yang //

45b1: shes ma yin 'du shes sgoms// 'di dag thams cad 'di tsam ste// thams cad las ni gzhan med do// tsam na gzugs su shes par bya// de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs// cha lugs ring dang sku
45b2: yangs te/ / mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs gcig/ 'du shes ming dang rnam rtog dang // brjod dang khyad par lhan cig ste// tsam dang mtshan ma 'du shes su// spyod par rab tu gdags pa ste// tsam la gnas//
45b3: de ming rnams kyang // kun rdzob don du rnam par brtags// brjod pa med par dngos po ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rnam shes rnams kyi 'byung ba yang // rtogs bya med par yod pa min// rtogs bya mid
45b4: da tsam po ni/ / sa rnams thams cad de nyid de// dngos po gang la gang ming gis// brtag par bya ba de bzhin med// 'di ni chos rnams chos nyid de// brtags na gnas pa med pa'o// 'di dag thams cad ming tsam
45b5: ste/ / 'du shes can gyi dngos po med// de med des na ming med de// ming med pas na rnam mi brtag/ rnam par mi rtogs zhing 'gyur ba// bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin te// khur tsas ji ltar khur bkur ba//
45b6: de dang tha dad mtshan can te// de bzhin tsam ni ming gi khur// de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyer// sems la tsam zhes rnam par brtags// ming gis tsam du sems tsam gyis// 'di ni skyes bu sdong po zhes//
45b7: yang rung ste ming tsam brtag/ 'byung ba rnams dang 'dus pa dang // tsam yang gzugs la rnam par brtag/ tsam po med par 'byung ba yi// tsam zhes bya ba mi dmigs te// bum pa'i ngos la yon
45b8: tan ltar/ / tsam la ming ni rnam par gnas// bum pa bum pa'i dngos po yi// rnam par dben zhing ming dang bral// bum pa bum pa'i dngos por ram// ming yang ming du gnas pa med// rnal 'byor can gyis

46a1: gang gi tshe/ / ming tsam g.yo ba med pa dang // rnam tog gnyis dang 'brel ba yi// ming tsam yod med mthong ban// ji ltar ma ldan lcags rnams dang // pA Nil dag kyang rgya stegs kyang // chu dang
46a2: mnyam par khu bar 'gyur/ / 'on kyang chu yi yon tan med// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu// rtag tu las su 'jug par byed// rnam par shes pas yun du spangs/
46a3: khab long rdo las rten byas shing // lcags ni sems can bzhin 'khor yang // de dag gnyis kyi byed pa med// sems can gson po bzhin du g.yo// sems ni bdun zhes bgrang ba yin// kun gzhi
46a4: brgyad po de bzhin no/ / bag chags srad bus rgyas pas na// sems can bzhin g.yo sems can med// lus na kun du rgyas par 'dug/ 'gro ba dog par 'khor ba ste// gcig las gcig gis
46a5: mi shes pa/ / byed med lpags dang khab long bzhin// mgo bo dum lce mang po// kha mang lag pa dum dang // lus kyang du mar rab bskur cing // de bzhin gshegal mchod byed pa/ shin du mang ba'i zhing
46a6: mi rnams/ / tshad med stong du 'gro byas shing // de dang der yang mgon po'i rnams// de dag kun la rtag mchod byed// ri rab ri dang mnyam pa yi// me tog na bza' char mang po// sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad
46a7: pas/ / de dag mchod pa rab tu byed// phreng ba phreng phyed cod pan dang // rin chen brgyan pa sna tshogs kyis// thams cad mkhyen dang rgyal sras la// rtag par mchod pa rab tu byed// sprin lta bu yi gzhal med//
46a8: khang// sna tshogs mang po'i gzugs 'gyur ba// mtha' mnam mkha'i mu dang mnyam// gzhan yang rdul phran rdul snyed kyi// sprul mang lha yi bu mo yis// rol mo sil snyan rab spags te/

46b1: gzhal med dag la mngon gnas nas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod par byed// stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob cing // dog pa'i sa nas mnyams pa// chos kyi sprin las 'thon gyur nas// sangs rgyas
46b2: sa la zhugs pa'i rnams/ / sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs// ting nge 'dzin la mnyam bzhag ste// gzungs la mkhas par gyur pa'i rnams// de bzhin gshegs la mchod par byed// sangs rgyas yang dag
46b3: brjod mos rnams/ / mtha' yas zhing du 'gro byas shing // yang dag yon tan ldan pa dag/ sangs rgyas yon tan rab tu rjod// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste// rgyal bdag dang thabs gcig tu// rgyal
46b4: sras so so rang rig pa'i/ / rtogs par bya ba'i ting 'dzin sgom// gnas gzhan gyur pa'i yon tan can// chos la bdag med ston pa'i rnams// spros pa thams cad rgyun bcad cing // dam pa'i don la rnam
46b5: sgom pa/ / chos lnga rnams kyi rang bzhin dang // rnam shes brgyad la'ang de bzhin te// mkhas pa byas par rtag gyur cing // mnyam par gzhag rnams mchod par byed// shin du phra ba'i rdul 'dra dang // de bzhin chen
46b6: po'i lus kyis kyang / / sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod par byed// sa rnams kun ka bdag lus dang // yungs kar 'brur yang rab 'dzud byed// rgya mtsho ba lang rjes su byed// ba lang
46b7: rjes kyang gar chen mchir/ / spu gcig rtse mor brtan g.yo ba'i// 'gro ba rab tu 'dzud byedang / gnod par byed pa ma yin te// 'gro ba dag na rnam par spyod// longs spyod can gyi spyod longs yul// nyi zla sa dang mnyam
46b8: bste/ tshig medas dang 'dra bar yang // rnam pa kun gyis phan 'dogs shing // me dang rlung dga'adra ba ste// rtag tu chu dang sman 'dra ba// rin chen khams kyi 'bring khungs ltar// sems can kun kyang nye bar

47a1: 'tsho/ / skyes pa med cing 'gag pa med// ma chad rtag pa'ang med pa ste// tha dad don min don gcig min// 'gro med 'ong ba med pa'i rnams// rnam par brtags pa'i ming dag dang // kun du brtas
47a2: pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa// ming dang ming med rnam spangs dag/ sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam 'dra// dri za'i grong khyer dpe bzhin te// smig rgyu chu yi zla ba 'dra// rang bzhin kun du brtags
47a3: pa dag/ glog dang sprin dang du ba dang // mgal ba'i 'khor lo smig rgyu 'dra// 'di tshul brtags pa'i chos rnams ni// rang bzhin kun du brtags pa ste// gang dang gang gi ming rnams kyis// chos rnams gang
47a4: dang gang brjod pa/ / de ni de na yod pa min// kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// 'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste// 'gro ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// rjod pa dang ni tha dad pa// brjod par bya ba gang yang med// 'di ni/
47a5: sa yi rang bzhin te// kun du brtags pa rab tu bstan// mig dang gzugs las rten byas shing // gsum las yid de 'byung ba yin// rnga sgra me ni 'du 'phrod las// myu gu sa bon sa las rim// khang pa la sog/
47a6: sna tshogs dang // snam bu rdza la sogs pa dang // lus can rnams dang chos rnams kyi// 'di ni rang bzhin gzhan da do// don rnams dor ba med pa dang // gang yang zag pa med pa'i chos// so so rang rig rgyud rnams dang
47a7: chos la bdag med nyid dang ni/ / thams cad chos kyi grub pa ste// rang bzhin du ni de brtags so// rang bzhin gyis ni chos kyi rnams// tha dad mtshan du bsgrags pa ste// chos rnams thams cad 'dres par
47a8: ni/ / rang bzhin med na rab tu 'gyur// gcig min rdzas rnams 'dus pa las// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos gcig min gzugs// rtogs par sla ba ma yin pa'i// sgyu ma'i ri dgas byas pa bzhin// de ltar/

47b1: dngos po thams cad kyang // rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags// rtogs par mi rung mi gcig gzugs// kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// sna tshogs nor bu 'dra ba yi// ri dgas rdzas kyi rgyu
47b2: tshogs nas/ / sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rnams byas dang // sems can kun gyi gzugs bzhin te// de ltar dngos po 'di dag kun// rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags// rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba ste// /
47b3: kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs// tshen dang phrad na rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sa rnams kun ka ste// rtog pas rnam par brtags byas na// yon tan dngos su mi gnas/
47b4: te// sgyu ma rmi lam sprin dang 'dra// smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ste// kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// ji ltar dri za'i khang pa dag/ khang pa ma yin khang par snang // rgyu med par yang mi snang ste// de bzhin sa rnams
47b5: sna tshogs nyid/ / nyi zla gzhal yas khang rnams dang // tha mal ri dang rin chen ri// du ba sprin gyi gnod pas ni// nams kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las// rtog pas rnam par
47b6: brtag byas na/ / dngos nyid mi 'grub dngos rnams kyi// rang bzhin kun du brtags pa'o// rgyu las dngos po mi 'byung ste// rgyu med las kyang ma yin no// rang bzhin zhes bya rnam rtog ste// dngos dang dngos
47b7: med rnam par brtags/ / mtshan ma la ni ming rten te// gnyis la rnam par rtog pa gnas// yang dag shes dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'o// sems ni mtshan ma 'dra ba ste// mtshan ma
47b8: yid la gnas pa yin/ / yid la sems rnams lnga po ni// dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // sems ni bag chags rgyu ba ste// bag chags rnams la thog ma med// thog ma med pa'i blo yi yul//

48a1: yul ni sems kyi nor pa'o// sems na yul dang 'dra ba ste// sa rnams yul zhes bya ba yin// thams cad sa bon kun gzhi la// rnam par shes pa kun kyang gnas// rnam shes bdun po
48a2: kun gzhi las/ / rab tu 'byung de phan tshun dang // sems kyi rnams dang kun gzhi la// rtag med chad pa'ang med pa ste// sa rnams thams cad kun gzhi yin/ bar snang rnam par gnas pa ste// gsum po
48a3: 'dus pa'i rkyen byung ba/ / bdag dang dbang po dag las byung // lus can rnams kyi rnam shes ni// yul rnams rnyed nas 'byung ba ste// 'di ni rtog pa can gyi tshul// rgyu dang las kyi rgyus byung ba// dbang pos
48a4: rnams thams cad dang / / tshangs la sogs pa phyi rol dang // de dag lha min las kyang min// rdul phran gyis kyang sa ma byas// sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi nyid// lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba yin// rkyen rnams kun gzhi
48a5: ma byas te/ / rkyen gyis kun gzhi byas pa min// 'di dag la ni gsum 'dus med// rnam shes 'on kyang 'khor ba ste// shel 'dra zla ba bzhin du yang // rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu// bag chags
48a6: byung ba'i rnam shes dang / / kun gzhi rtag tu 'grogs pa ni// zla ba spyang gis zin pa bzhin// rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu// bag chags de las langs pa yis// rgyas par byed do yang dang yang // rgyas pa gan/
48a7: yang rgyas byed de// de la'ang gzhan gyis yang dang yang // de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i sems// mthong nas sems de rnam par ldog/ mi brtan yul la kun nas 'brel// khab long rdol lcags bzhin te// kun gyig ni
48a8: la sems yod pa/ / zag bcas zag pa med pa dag/ bag chags dag gis bsgos pa'i rnams// 'jug dang phyir ldog byed pa yin// ji ltar bsregs las me bus shing // gzhan du me yang rab tu bud// de dang /

48b1: gzhan du de bzhin bung // de dag nas kyang spo bzhin dang // de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes dang // gzhan yang de las byung ba rnams// chos la rab tu rgyu ba ni// gtogs dang zag pa med pa dag/ mthong ba'i chos la
48b2: gnas pa yi/ / yul dang yul can de yin te// 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos can gyi// ting nge 'dzin kyang 'di dag yin// 'phags pa de dag de ldan zhing // sgom dang mthong ba ldan pas na// chos kun de bzhin nyid shes pa//
48b3: zhing nas zhing du rab tu 'dod// ji ltar shin du bzang ba'i gser// gser gyi dbyings na mi snang ste// brtsal bas shin du zhi ba btags nas// yongs su sbyangs na snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/
48b4: rnam par shes pa bdun dang bcas// ting nge 'dzin gyis yangs sbyangs pa'i// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ji ltar ma bsrubs zhe la yang // de ni mar yod mi snang ste// bsrubs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bas na//
48b5: mkhas pa rnams kyis de phyir bsrub// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// rnam shes bdun dang ldan pa yang // rnam par bsrubs shing skrag spyod pa'i// thub pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin// ma rig pa ni sdug
48b6: ces bya/ / dkyil 'khor ye shes rnam grangs te// dkyil 'khor 'di la bslabs pa yi// rnal 'byor can rnams stug por 'dod// gzugs med gzugs yod nam mkha' dang // rnam shes 'du shes ma
48b7: yod dag/ rnal 'byor can gyis yul bsgoms sam// de dag stug po'i zhing du 'dod// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od bzhin du// 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal ba'i sras// rnal 'byor can gyi thub ston cing // rnal 'byor spyod
48b8: pa'i lam gnas po/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang skur bas// de ni dbang bskur stug por song // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rjes su mthong // gzhan du gyur nas stug por song // stug na gnas shing sprul pa dang /

49a1: sprul pa'i sprul pa de dag gis// gang nag du chos su 'dod pa// de ni mkha' la 'dug cing stan// sngon med dus kyi gnas ngan len// bag chags kyu yis bsags pa yi// kun gzhinas
49a2: rtog byas pa yis/ / bcings pa kun du rab tu 'byung // ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams// rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung // rnam shes de bzhin kun gzhal// rnam
49a3: shes de ni des byas pa'i/ / bag chags rnams kyis rgyas par 'gyur// 'byung zhing la la phyir ldog ste// chad med rtag pa med pa'o// rang sems khong du ma chud pas// yul la gzhol ba'i rnam shes rnam
49a4: rab tu zhugs kyang phyir ldog pa/ / 'gro ba rang sems mthong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gzhan du gyur pa'i sems// me dang bsreg pa ji bzhin te// kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba yang // gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med//
49a5: zag med 'gros su song ba dang // 'phags pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur// kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba ni// sa rnams khyab par byas shing gnas// yid ni bdag la bdag ces te// der sems rab tu 'jug pa
49a6: yin/ / rnam shes kha dog khyad par dang // kun du gcod pa rab tu byed// sems ni las rnams sogs pa ste// yid ni khong du chud par byed// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ lnga pos snang ba mthong bar
49a7: 'gyur/ / rab rib ldan pa myos pa yis// ji ltar sgra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// gzugs la sogs la gzugs med de// sems ni gzugs ltar gnas pa yin// nyi ma zla ba'i nor bu dag/ yongs su dag pa
49a8: mtshan nyid can/ / nyi zla'i zer gyis phog pa dang // de dag rang gi yon tan 'byin// de bzhin kun ga ni rnam shes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge nying po// zag med lags dang ldan gyur te//

49b1: gnan du 'thung na btu byeg/ 'di sar snang ba gang yang rung // mnan ma gzugs su na pa'i rnams// bgacags lag pa'i blanagags// sanams gnan gzugs sar gnas// ngasar 'am rung /
49b2: yon tan no dang da bar dang // de bzhin kun ga nas shes kya // rnam par gyur nas gzugs la ga nas// ji m+WAr+ya ba bldan pas/ mig gi nyis pas na ma ma nang ba// de ba na
49b3: ldan pa'o/ / dran gas na // ga tu mig ga nang mang pa'o// gzugs kyi byu ba tu 'dra// 'di dag snang ba ni 'ang nga/ b+hUrmA la dpa bzhin// gzugs na ya pa
49b4: skyengs/ / na ga'i rjes su mthong ba'o// mig dang gzugs las nyan byas shing // da ni sgyu ma bzhin du 'byung // rtag tu mig gnang song ba// sdig rgya bzhin du rab tug po// gzugs kyi yon tan ldan
49b5: pa'i gzugs/ / kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas pa ste// byiswA pa ji ltar brtags pa bzhin// gzugs ni grong na yod pa min// byed med sems pa'ang med pa ste// dbu pa'i phung po bzhin du gnas//
49b6: gnyid log ra re dregs pa dang // 'gro 'drug rnam par rgyug pa yi// lus can rnams kyi kun gzhi'o// ji ltar gdung bas gser sa las// gyen du ldang ba'i smig rgyu rnams// dpyir ka'i chu ltar rab tu g.yo//
49b7: ri dgas rnams la slu bar byed// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // gzugs min lta ba'i spyod yul du// gzugs snang ji ltar rtog can gyis// brtags bzhin gzugs 'dra ma yin no// ji ltar kha
49b8: long mthong ba dang / / lcags ni myur bar kun du 'khor// 'on kyang de la sems pa med// sems ldan bzhin du'ang rab tu snang // de bzhin kun gzhi na ma shes kyang // sems med sems can ji bzhin

50a1: dra/ / 'gro dang 'ong bar g.yo ba ste// sa rnams 'bri bar rab tu byed// ji ltar rgya mtsho dza r+ra ni// srog med par yang g.yo mgul te// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa// lus la gnas shing
50a2: g.yo bar gyur/ / glang po glang po'i gzugs brnyan dang // ji ltar 'thab cing tshems nas min// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa// 'jug pa tshems nas mi rgya'o// ji ltar pad mo dri med pa// 'angam
50a3: nang nas byung ba ni/ / mi dang lha dang btsun la'os// lha yul gnas pa kun kyang 'dod// de bzhin kun gzharnam par shes// bag chags 'dam nas byung ba ni// rnam dag gzhan du gnas gyur pa/
50a4: bdag nyid cha rnams 'dod pa yin// ji ltar rin chen rnam par dag/ ri brags mi yis bcags brdungs kyang // rgyal po'i cod pan du'ang 'os// cod pan la yang gdags pa yin// de bzhin kun gan
50a5: rnam par shes/ / bag chags rnams kyi balcags brdungs pa// rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te// sangs rgyas nyid du de bzung ngo // dzA skar rdu ga ting rdo ba dag/ nya lcibs dag gis yongs dpa
50a6: pa/ / de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // bag chags drim can du byas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang // dngos po gnyis kyis rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar la gnyis yod pa'i sbrul/
50a7: du 'dod pa der 'gro ste// deg ni kun gzhi rnam par shes// rim dang gcig nAr rgyu ba yin// rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu// de la rtog pas rnam par btag/ tog can rnam par myos
50a8: 'gyur ba/ / bdag dang bdag gor rnam tog cing // yod dang med kyi rgyu sdod pa'i// sa rnams la yang nam rtog ste// 'gyur ba'i yongs su gyur pa dang // kun gzhi zab pa nyid dag kya/

50b1: zo chung rnams kyis mi rig pas// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du 'khor// rang bzhin gcig min shes par dka' lus can kun la 'dra ba ste// de bzhi kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rtag tu smra ma'i ridags
50b2: sems can gcig min shes par dka'/ / yod dang med par rnam par rtag/ rdul dang gtso bo skyes pa dang // mig gas la tshangs pa'ang de yin te// rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtog can rnams// kun gzhi la ni
50b3: rtag tu tog/ sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la// sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtag/ sal gang gis rtogs gyur pa'i// yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya// dzi lta re ri mo mthun man dang // rnam pA tshags
50b4: sprin gyi gzugs/ / 'ja' dang re dgas sred byed dang // sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin te// rab rib can gyi phreng ba dang // bzang mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du// rmi lam dag ni rnam sna tshogs// dri za'i khang pa
50b5: gnas rten dang / / ro langs chu yi shing rnams dang // brag cha sprin dang du ba dang // me long mig la gzugs brnyan dang // chu la chu yi zla ba dang // rnam rtog 'di dang mang por yang // 'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog/
50b6: gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar// rnam par sna tshogs kun mthong ste// 'gro b.rang sems mthong ba dang // de'i tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/ chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi// bag chags snyoms la sogs pa dang // rtag
