50b7: pas rnyeg pa can du byas/ / gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med// zag med rang lugs rab thob nas// de dag rtag cing brtan par 'gyur// nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam// 'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te// mnyam
50b8: bzhag sems dang ldan pa la/ / mi zag chos rnams skye bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar dang // ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang // mkhas dang stobs dang mngon shes dag// 'bri med mi zad de

51a1: bzhin te/ / nam mkha' zad kyi mtha' snyegs shing // dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang // mthar phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing // yid bzhin shin du brtan pa'i lus// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i
51a2: rnal 'byor can/ / gzhan du gyur nas rab tu 'thob// 'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin// sems can yod man skye ba med/ 'bri med gang ba med par yang // rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro bar bshad// zhing gzhan rnams dang
51a3: zhing 'di yi/ / chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste// skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang // chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor ldan pa grol ba la// rtag med chad pa med pa ste// sems can khams rnams
51a4: zhig gyur na/ / thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo // ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang // 'das dang da ltar byung ba dag/ mnyam pa ma yin thun pa min// shes bya zad nas de dag 'byung // bdud rnams tshar bcad log pa ste/
51a5: brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang // de ste sems can 'jig na ni// sdug bsngal spungs las mi 'grol lo// lcags kyi gar bu bsregs pa las// me las byung ste bsil gyur cing // lcags ni rtag par
51a6: 'dug pa bzhin/ / de ltar rnal 'byor can dag 'khod// phung po'i khyim dang des byung ba'o// bag chags rnams kyang 'gag pa dang // thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams// de dag rtag cing grol ba yin// rnam shes
51a7: rnams ni dpa' rlabs bzhin/ / kun gzhi mtsho las 'byung ba ste// chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis// rab tu bskyod cing shin du rgyu// gnas ngan len gyi spros pa yis// bcom pa gnas med don gyi gzugs
51a8: ba'i yul du rnam par g.yo/ / de ltar shes nas phyir log ste// gzhan gyur mi bzang rtag pa'i rnams// mgon po dag ni stug por 'dod// sdug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin// rtag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par

51b1: mdzes/ / phung po stug pa kun gzhi ste// yid ni de la nye phan no// rnam par shes pa rtogs par byed// gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu// rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni// dbang por bcas shing yul
51b2: gzhol bas/ / sna tshogs yul la 'dzin par byed// kun gzhi yul can ma yin no// chen kun gzhi rnam shes te// yid ni drong dru rab tu gnas// yid kyi rnam shes dan sa// lcags dbang po lngar yang gnas/
51b3: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes// phung po'i dbus na rnam par gnas// bag chags las dang 'brel ba'i rnams// sngon chad byas pa rnams kyis 'byung // 'dod chags sred las byung ba yi// las
51b4: kyis bya ba byed pa ste/ / sngon chad de dag las byas pas// rgyun du las rnams 'byung ba yin// lus las lus ni gzhan la 'gro// 'pho ba srin bu pad ma bzhin// sems dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnam/
51b5: rgyun chags par ni shin du 'dod// yang zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams dang // rnam shes srid pa dog par yang // tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni// las rnams shin du 'byung ba'i phyir// tshe dang drod dang /
51b6: rnam shes 'dis// gang tshe lus ni por gyur pa// de tshe lAs ni dor ba ste// shing bzhin tshor ba med pa'o// sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes// dar sems bdag nyid yid yin no// gang zhig yul la
51b7: 'dzin byed pa/ / de ni rnam par shes shes bya// sems ni las rnams sogs pa ste// yid ni khong du chud par byed// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ lnga pos snang ba rtogs par byed/
51b8: 'phags pa rgyan stug po// bam po bzhi pa ste tham pa// // lus ni sems kyis bzung ba yin// yid ni lam rgyud 'dod pa ste// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ snang ba gcod pa lnga pa'o//

52a1: rgyal dmigs shing rnam shes rnams// skye ste gzhan gyi de rjes 'brang // yid la dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang // mthar chags su ni rab tu 'byung // yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni// dbang gi
52a2: yon tan rnams kyis byas/ / dbang ni lnga dang lhan cig tu// rnam par shes pa rab tu byed// 'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu// ro langs 'gro dang 'dra ba ste// smig rgyu dag gis gzugs dang mnyam// log pa ma
52a3: yin bden pa yin/ / 'di ni bdag med stong pa ste// sred pas kun du 'dra ba yin// 'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/ thams cad du sa yod lhan cig ste// sems byung yid ces bya ba dang // lhan cig/
52a4: rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam shes lnga po de dag dang // yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni// gnas ngan len dang sred bsgoms pa// rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung // lus can kun gyi kun gzhi yang // sem
52a5: dang sems byung ldan pa 'byung / / kun gzhi rnyed nas de dag rgyu// rgyus nas rgyas par byed pa ste// sems rnams lam rgyud thams cad du// rtag par gcig las gcig rgyas 'gyur// sa 'di rnam pa sna
52a6: tshogs pa/ rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung // kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni// rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin no// phan tshun rgyu yi stobs ldan pa// rnam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste//
52a7: kun gzhi mtsho la dba' rlabs bzhin// sa bon dag dang myu gu'am rgyud// chu bo'i rkun kyang mtshams med cing // rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung mod kyi// tha dad bye brag dag kyang snang // de bzhin rnam shes
52a8: spyod pa ste/ / mtshams med de yi rgyun du yang // rgyan mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung // gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang // sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// bag chags bde bas bskyed pa dang // rang

52b1: sems rnam par 'khrul pa yis/ / dpa' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung // chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba dag/ phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te// thub pa'i rnams kyang rnam bsgoms nas// mnyam par gzhag par sdug
52b2: por 'gro/ / rdo rje'i snying po khyod dang yang // rgyal sras 'jigs med gzhan dag kyang // stug por 'jug pa byed pa'i chos// thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams// thabs gcig/
52b3: rab tu rnam dgongs te// chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe med pa// mang du byung ba 'di bstan to// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa// rin chen sna tshogs zla snying gi/ sing ge khril rab 'dug sa// shes rab can pos rnam pasgos
52b4: gyis/ / rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa mdun pad rab// stug po'i rgyan la rnam par bsgoms// rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston// zla dbang rgyal ba des bstan la// bag med par ni pa
52b5: byed cig/ zla ba'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das// sprul par bye ba mang sprul cing // 'dod pa'i khams kyi snyengs bral dang // gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su yang // rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor// lha rnam
52b6: kyis kyang mdun pa da cing / / tshul gyis dam pa ston pa ni// 'jigs med stug po'i rgyan yin no// rnal 'byor can gyis spyod pa'i mchog/ tshul bzang rnal 'byor spyod pa ste// so sor rang rig shes pa yi// ting nge 'dzin/
52b7: dang bde ba'i rnams// yang dag mtha' la mi rig par// rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor bde las mngon langs shing // gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lta// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul dge 'di// gang
52b8: gis shin du mthong bar gyur/ / rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi// stan gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams// kun kyang ngo mtshar rab tu rnyed// bsam byed bsam gtan bsam pa dang // bsam gtan rnams kyis dgongs pa

53a1: dag/ rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas// stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la// lta ba mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// mgo la cod pan thogs pa dag/ ma/
53a2: rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// yan lagazis pa de dag kun// ba'i ning nas 'ongs pa ste// gso ba rnams dang shin du bral// thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes// rnal 'byor pyod pa sobs chen te//
53a3: kA'o rdo rje'i song po la// rnam par rtog dang nam dpyod la// chos la mos pa yang dag tu// bzong // de nas de kun dang // phyogs rnams pan po na/ byas te// 'dzum pasngon du dab btang nas// 'jas ni man
53a4: dbyangs su smras/ / rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// gang la rtog can myos 'gyur ba// de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis// gang bsam gang gis ji lta bur// bas/
53a5: gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben// rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas// dga' ba de dben las skyes par yang // bsam gtan dang po skye ba yin// de lta bu yi rim tshul
53a6: du/ / bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu// mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang // bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed// nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang // rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te// kun kyang rtag tu
53a7: bsam gtan byed/ / chos rnams dang nas dag gi/ rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang // phung po skye mched tshogs kyi rnams// 'di dag thams cad bdag med de// byed pa med cing g.yo ba med// gsum po 'dus
53a8: las rab tu byung / / 'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste// byed pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs// thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed// stong par lta ba'i lta ba can// chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams// chud gson

53b1: mtshan nyid ma yin no/ / phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams// bsam gtan 'di'i dra bsam gtan byed// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/ lha rdzas bsod nams lta spyod pa// rnal 'byor can dang rgyal
53b2: ba'i sras/ / mnyam gzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed// 'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste// mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min// phung po rnams med khams yod min// thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med
53b3: rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang / / de dag de ltar mi gnas so// rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni// dngos po sa dang chu la sogs// dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa// mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog/
53b4: kha dog sdug dang mi sdug dang // kha dog snang gzhan de bzhin te// 'ja' dang in drago ba ltar// kha dog snang mang sprin lta bu'o// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis// thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste// rgyas pa'i skye mched
53b5: ces bya bas/ / 'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te// rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis// lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong // gang la dmigs te mnyam bzhag pa// de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang//
53b6: gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa// de dang de ni dmigs pa yin// rnal 'byor can med rnal 'byor med// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid// kun gnyis rnams thams cad dang // drung
53b7: ba'i rnal 'byor ba de la gnas/ / chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing // mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag/ mnyam bzhag ldan pa rab tu ston// chos kyi rang bzhin rnam phye bas
53b8: rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrug pa/ / blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye// chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur// yid ches lung dang mi ldan par// chos rnams ston par byed pa ni// mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis//

54a1: chung mgan na 9// 5 d+hA da// rnas pa'i phy-ing/ rnam par dang // rang shA gan nas pas// da m+b+ha ha~M// /
54a2: rnam pa dang // lan tshwal sogs rnam par sel// 'khris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa las// rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang // lus can rnams kyi lus yul du// 'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang // rims dag rnam par
54a3: gzhig pa'i phyir/ / ba pas bsdub byas pa ni// khar la sogs yan lagadrug/ shwedango sgrol mkhyab dag/ thang du mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba// was nan rnams kyi rims gan to// rnam shes rnams ni klan
54a4: gzhi la/ / phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te// gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam// mtshan nyid gcig ni yod gyur na// de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la// mtshan nyid mi 'dra med par 'gyur// rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel
54a5: mchum/ / mi yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// sos drang rnam par gsal ba 'di// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong bste// gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste// sgyu ma'i ri rigs bzhin
54a6: yoyor ba/ / rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin// mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste// phung po rnams las phung po can// gzhan med yan lag nyid lag las// yan lag can med yin lag la// 'jig
54a7: rkyen rgyu yis ma byas te/ / 'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med// 'jig rten rdul phran pasags pa med// phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o// de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du// ci 'ang rtsom par mi byed de// dngos
54a8: po yod pa phrad pa'i phyir/ / rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dod// de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa// yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du// 'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste/

54b1: 'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min// chas gsum pas kyang ma byas te// bag chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems// rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas// snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi// lus can
54b2: kun gyi kun gzhi dang / / sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// 'gro bdag gis sna tshogs brtags// 'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin nga gnas// sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las/
54b3: gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste// sa la stong zhes brjod par bya// sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas// rdza la sogs pa'i yul med do// sems 'di rje ma lta bu'o// sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang // lha
54b4: yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang / / rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba// de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin// kun gzhi kun du lag pa ste// kun du kha mig mgo bo yang // gcig char ba dang rim gyis kyang // sa rnams
54b5: yog par rab tu gnas/ / bus pa rnam par myos byed de// gang gi snying la gang gnas pa// de ni de la gnyis tshul du// lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas// stong min dngos po gang yang med// thobs ji ltar
54b6: rje bzhin du/ / dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i// dngos po dngos su yod pa min// de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na// 'jig byed ma yin gzhig par 'gyur// gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang // de ni rnam par rtog pas
54b7: brtags/ / ri rab ri bo tsam 'gyur ba'i// bdag du lta ba mi gnod kyi// stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni// ngargyal mi bden brtags pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid// gnas ma yin par sbyar mi bya// gnas
54b8: min gal te sbyar gyur na/ / bdud rtsi drug du 'gyur ba yi// lha ba ji snyed gar yang rung // lus can rnams la yod pa yi// lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir// stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to// stong pa nyid kyi

55a1: lha thas kyang / / la la'i lta ba ma zhig na// gsor mi rung ba'i lha can te// sman pas btang ba'i nad pa bzhin// ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa'i me// bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so// de bzhin pasreg byas
55a2: tshig na/ / stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur// lta bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang // ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste// nyon mongs thams cad bsreg par byed// nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes//
55a3: thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams// ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ stug po der ni rab tu 'dod// ri bong rwa yis ri bo rnams// mngon par gzhag bya ma
55a4: mthong ste/ / 'di la mo sham bu yis kyang // srog chags gang yang bsad pa med// ri bong rA yi gzhu yis kyang // su yang thab mo mi byed de// mo sham bu la su yang rung // khyim gyi las su mi sko'o// stong pa
55a5: nyid dang mi rtag nyid/ / rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te// yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang // de bzhin gcig pa nyid du gyur// mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang // gzugs rnams gzhig par
55a6: brtson pa ste/ / gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min// gzugs med par yang de med de// khyad par med par 'byung ba ni// ma bsgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin// de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang // lhan
55a7: cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste/ / phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du// de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo// rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las// rnal 'byor can gyi las sgrub bo// lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te// roladra
55a8: 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'dra/ / sred pa'i srad brus bcings byas shing // yul gyi rnams kyi drang ba yin// lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa// lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste// mtha' dag stong pa nyid lta ba//

55b1: rgyal ba rnams kyis lha med bshad// stong nyid lta ba sbyor ba ni// yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir// blo ldan mnyam par gzhag pa yi// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgoms// rtsa dang shing drang gyo mo dag
55b2: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te/ / sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod pa// gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed// gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang // sred dang mig rnams rgyur byas shing // mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma
55b3: bzhin/ / smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o// gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med// yul gzhan dag du'ang 'gro ba min// 'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la// yod dang med par rtag mi bya// sgra yi tshogs dang bong bu'i rwa// mo sham
55b4: bu dang smig rgyu dang / / dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dag/ ming du grag gi yod pa min// stag dang gzig dang dom dag dang // rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang // ga yi dang gsa' dang ru sbal la// rwa ni yod pa ma yin na/ thub pa rtsod par
55b5: brtson pa yis/ / de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing // bong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya// ci go de dag bsgrub nus sam// shes rab can gyis sar bstan pa// de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya// rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba
55b6: ni/ / blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra// sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med// so so rang rig yul yang med// gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la// rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus// stug por gnas pas rnam par rtog/ de la
55b7: brtags shing dge ba 'thob/ / rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor can// de na gnas pa bzhin du snang // lha yul gnas pa'i bsnyengs bral dang // zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang // rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams//
55b8: ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin// de bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun// bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yin// kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can// de la brtag cing rab tu rgyu// ji ltar sa las kun brten cing // sa skye kun

56a1: kyang 'byung ba bzhin/ / sems can kun gyi gnas yin te// 'byung khung kun gyi khyad par du// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te// sems dang sems las byung bar/
56a2: ldan// dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgo rnams// 'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste// gtsug phud can rnams 'dab sgo yis// rma bya mo dang longs rtseb// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang //
56a3: sa bon med can mtsho ltar gnas// thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ji ltar rgya mtsho chu bo yis// nyin gcig bzhin du dgod bya yang // chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad//
56a4: mtsho rtog par yod mi byed// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste// rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig gzhin// bag chags chu bos rab tung gang // ji ltar rin chen ldan pa'i sa// /
56a5: sna tshogs kun du phan 'dogs te// sems can rnams kyang nye bar mtsho// yon tan dngos su rtog pa yin// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang // rnam rtog rnams dang lhan gcig 'byung // de ni 'khor ba 'phel
56a6: byed de/ / gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can// spyod pa legs spyad gtsang ba ste// sa bcu pa las mngon byung ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i sar zhugs nas// yang dag
56a7: mtha' la rab gnas pa/ / sna tshogs sems can rnam sprul par// 'jigs pa med par 'byung ba ni// rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no// sos ka me tog mang po'i gzugs// mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong // de bzhin sna
56a8: tshogs len pa'i sems/ / thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed// ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i sras// 'byung las byung ba ma yin pa// med pa'i blo can de bzhin te// log par smra la brtson pa dag/ chos dang mi 'thun

56b1: bram can/ / lce gnyis log par lta ba dag/ rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos// rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed// ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig/ 'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa// 'bras bu me tog de na med// sngags/
56b2: dang khong bzos zo mdog bde// 'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa// rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras// kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas// bstan pa gzhan la ji snyed du//
56b3: bstan pa byas pa de dag kun// bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// bstan pa stug po'i rgyan la bstan// khams rnams drug dang bcwa brgyad bstan// skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi// yid kyi srad bus bdag
56b4: pa dag/ sems can kun du rab tu 'khor// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs// khams dang skye mched phung po ste// yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing // lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu// 'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu
56b5: ste/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan// lus can kun gyi skyes bu ni// 'gro yang byung ba ma yin te// khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin// skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te// bcwa brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ga//
56b6: dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste// dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa// nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang // dga' ldan la sogs bsnyengs bral dang // mtshe ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad // rdo rje snying po dbang can la/
56b7: rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// dge 'od ge zhes dga' 'bod cing // thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// thub ldan rnal 'byor spyod pa dang // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// zhing dang zhing ni bzhugs//
56b8: pa dad// lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang // rnal 'byor bdag po rnal 'byor can// ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang // dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// thal mo sbyar te gnas par 'gyur// phan tshun

57a1: gcig la gcig lta zhing / / rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni// 'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang // mur 'dug bdag spa spangs pa ste// thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni// thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan// 'das dang du
57a2: ltar byung ba yis/ / sngon byas pa byas thos pa ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o// ji ltar mkha' la bya rjes rnams// rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du// sems tshogs ldan pa'i
57a3: khams kyi rnams/ / gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan// ji ltar shing las me dag gi/ me lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur// sreg pa gzhan pa ma rnyed cing // rlung gis bab na gtan mi 'bar// bya rjes rnam par
57a4: gzhag pa ni/ / mkha' la gnas pa mi snang ste// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yis// 'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin// bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dod ste// de dag sgo yi shugs kyis 'dod// bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni//
57a5: skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstan// las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni// 'khor rnams rtag tu 'khor ba ste// bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa// byas pa'i las ni chud mi za// ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las// 'bras bu med par
57a6: mi 'gyur te/ / don dang ldan pa de dag ni// gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med// lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni// rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston// / lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing // de ni dge ba'i las byed do// 'di dang phyi
57a7: ma'i bde ba dang / / lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing // 'khor los sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur ba'i// bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed// thar dang pha rol phyin rnams dang // sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod
57a8: yul kun/ / 'gro ba'i skyes bu med na ni// kun kyang 'bras bu med par 'gyur// lha yi bde ba thams cad dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang // de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par

57b1: 'gyur/ / las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong // las rnams don med ma yin te// 'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang // mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi// lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin// 'gro ba'i skyes bu
57b2: de yod na/ / srid pa'i 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur// 'khor dang bral na thar pa ste// blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so// 'jug pa'i skyes bu med na ni// mo sham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// bong bu'i rwa yang rno 'gyur te/
57b3: bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung // phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// gang dang gang du 'gro ba dag/ de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin// lha dang lha yibu mo'i tshegs// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i
57b4: sras rnams dang / / dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang // sngags 'chang chung ma'i tsho gas rnams kyang // thub la mchod par 'os pa yi// rdo rje snying po sras bcas la// mchod de gsol ba 'debs par byed// thams cad
57b5: dge'o dge zhes smra/ / nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul// rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa ni// gzhan gyis rgol ba 'joms pa ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// 'gab zungs ltag chod tshar gcod pa//
57b6: bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston// shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag nyan par 'gyur// ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang // lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon// shin du dka' ba'i bsam
57b7: sa r+b+ba/ / brtag 'das rtog dang bral ba yi// chu dang dpe yi me tog ste// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thab dge ba// stug po'i rkyen ni bshad par bya// de ni brab la rnal 'byor ston// stug po'i rgyan de sna tshog
57b8: te/ / sdug na spyod pa'i thub pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o// sa stengs thub pa'i dru ma la// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa// rtag par dru ma ra khyod kyis kyang /

58a1: chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis// dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ci// dngos su stong dam rtag pa zhes// 'di 'dra'i sku dang ldan pa yi// thub pa rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo// chos pa gcig pu rtogs
58a2: pa yis/ / chos par mngon du shes pa ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang // dngos po gcig gis shes par 'gyur// ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho// sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa// de bzhin dngos po
58a3: thams cad kyi/ / rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur/ dngos po ji med stod pa nyid// dngos po dngos por yod pa med// 'di dag kun gzhi rnam pa ste// stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o// 6
58a4: sras dru ma 'jigs med pas/ / rdo rje'i snying po de la spras// lus can rnams kyi khams kyi mi// ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing // 'byung las 'byung ba'i ji lta bu// g.yog she
58a5: cha dang sra ba yi/ / khams rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis// du ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas// mi 'am ci bdag khyod dge ste// khyod ni dge'o yang dge'o// rnal 'byor can
58a6: kyi snying po'i mchog/ yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa// sems kyi skyes bu'i lus can la// khams rnams skye 'gyur ji lta zhes// de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la// de ni dge ba bshad par bya// de bas mi 'am
58a7: ci yi bdag/ bi bar slob dpon bdag las nyon// ji ltar mi 'amo ci yi bdag/ khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa// snyengs bral mang po sna tshogs kyis// nam mkha' las ni rang 'dod zhing // rgyal ba nyan thos
58a8: tshogs 'khor du/ / bi bad sgra dbyangs stan blangs pas// thub pa dru ma ltos shig ces// phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung // stengs bral mang po sna tshogs na// mi 'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing // bi ba

58b1: be dUr+yas sbas pa/ / len cing mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe// pi bang yid 'ong shin du stan// dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyar ba de// mi 'am ci yi bdag po yis// rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe// nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de//
58b2: nyan thos de dag gyur pa de// rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong ba dang // 'od srung rnal 'byor bzang can dang // lha yi cod pan la smras pa// rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi// pi bar sgra ni bsgrag pa yis// 'dod chags
58b3: bral ba ci phyir gar/ / 'od srung khyod kyis nged la ston// rgyal sras stobs chen dam rlung bzhin// ri dgas rnams dang 'dra ba ni/ nyan thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams// bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can// nyon mongs rnam
58b4: rtog byung bas mnar/ / yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas// bag chags dri ma yangs gsal te// bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing // shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na// sems kyi khams las gzhan gyur pa//
58b5: de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur// khyod ni dbang chen phra yul ldan// shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas// dbang po 'jig rten phyal ba yi// gtsug lags tshan la khyod gnas te// mi'am ci yi gtsug
58b6: lag kyang / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dge/ sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas bya la// bslab ste zla ba bzhin gnas pa// mi 'am ci yi dbang po khyod// sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes// khyod ni de ltar
58b7: rnam mdzes zhing / / thub can dbang sgyur tshegs dbus su// khams kyi sems las skyes pa'i mi// kho bo la ni sras kyis dris// mnyam sems mnyam par gzhag pa yis// thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis/
58b8: khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang // sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la// rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi// de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya// chu ni rlan rnams skyed par byed// drod ni me'o sra bas//

59a1: gdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams// rlung gi khams kyis kun nas rtsom// gzugs la sogs pa'i sa mtshams ni// nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed// rnam shes sna tshogs yul can no//
59a2: bag chags rnams kyis rab tu bskyed// srid kyi mtshams dang mig dag gis// skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni// gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te// rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang // nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas/
59a3: dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa// rgyal sras rnams kyis mdun bdar cing // so so'i stan las kun langs te// yang dang yang zhing phyag 'tshal nas// rim 'gror rdo rje'i
59a4: snying po la/ / mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed// rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing // yang dang yang du gsol ba byed// dge'o dge'o yang dge ste// dge ba ldan pa rab gnas zhing // chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas//
59a5: sangs rgyas sa la rab bzhugs te// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan// rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis// de nas yang du mchod byas te// rnal 'byor che can dge'o dge/
59a6: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa// lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// chos de bdag la bstan pas na// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas// bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas// thub ldan 'phags pa sman
59a7: ras gzigs/ / blo gros chen po byams pa dang // blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang // lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag/ shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros dang // gzugs kyi
59a8: dbang po'i rgyal po dang / / rin chen gtsug phud 'phrul chen dang // yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang // mtshe ma'i rab dang 'gro 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor can la sems ston pa

59b1: thub pa thams cad don grub pa/ / thub sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams// 'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste// rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams// so so'i stan las kun langs nas// de dag gcig la gcig
59b2: bltas te/ / rdo rje'i snying po de la smras// chos kyi tshul ni bstan par gyis// khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs// rgyal sras rnams kyis rab tu mchod// sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang // khyod la thams cad shin
59b3: du gnas/ / khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni// rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang // rnal 'byor can dang rnal 'byor ba dag/ sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang //
59b4: 'jig rten rnams kyi ngo mtshar gzhi// mdo sde kun gyi dri med cing // bstan dang klag pa rnam par spangs// stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis// sprul pas
59b5: bshad pa spangs pa ste/ / de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang // zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul// lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde// 'phags pa rnams la de ston
59b6: cig/ phung po lhag ma ma lus par// gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnams// rnam par thar dang dbang rnams dang // yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi//
59b7: lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas dang // mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi brgyan// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phrad dang /
59b8: skra rtse brgya cher phra ba dag/ rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis// bstan dang klag dang rnam par zhing // brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi// stug po'i zhing gi dam pa der// ci nas thub pa 'dod pa'i

60a1: phyir/ / rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar// thub pas de dag kun bltas te// 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// brtags par mi nus brtag bral ba'i// chos tshul rab tu bstun
60a2: bya bar/ / blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na// rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshul// sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas// tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste// ka la bing ka'i sgra skad du// rgya chen lce yis
60a3: rab snyen par/ / rdo rje'i snying pos shin du bshad// se dge ro stong lus 'chang ba// mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// rdo rje'i snying pos shin du bstan// mi dka'i
60a4: sgra la mkhas pas na/ / sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa yis// mdor na de yi nyis gyur tu// rgyal sras de ni shin du ston// sang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs// mthong zhing ri nga ba'i sgra skad dang // gan dA ra dang
60a5: rin ldan par/ / rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan// ri Sha ba dang d+he ba ta// Shardza kau shi lnga po yis// sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// dbyangs kyis thub pa rnam par gsung // rings dang dal ba med pa'i tshig/
60a6: zab cing snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs te// mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la// de bzhin sim par byed pa yi// tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig/ rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni// lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste/
60a7: sprul pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin// thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni// ci yang rjod par mi byed par// thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra// yan lag rnams la mngon par 'byung // spen ma 'phral ba spyi bo dang /
60a8: khrig bsna co byin pa las// chos kyi tshul rnams ba ston cing // dge ba'i blarnams byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snyed pa thub pa y-i/ smon lam legs las byung ba ste// ske ma'i ring pa'i rgyal po bzhin/

60b1: rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus// dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na// thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// dpa' chen rdo rje'i snying po de// rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o// skar ma'i dbang po skar ma de// gza' yi/
60b2: dbus na mdzes pa bzhin// rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can// dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes// ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang // zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med// de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang // rgyal ba rnams su khyad
60b3: par med/ / yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che// rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog/ stan las legs par ldang byas shi/ rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas nas// tshig dge
60b4: rnam par smras pa ni/ / kye ma theg chen theg pa na// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang // rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston// bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang // rgyal sras de dag
60b5: thams cad kyang / / dri med bsam gyis mi khyab chos// dgongs pa phyag bya 'os pa yin// theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni// mchog tu phra zhing dkon pa ste// gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ rtog pa can gyi yul ma
60b6: yin/ / rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul// rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed// bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi// de bzhin khyad par byed pas na// bag chags spros pas 'phangs pa de// yun ring gnas ngan len
60b7: pa dang / / sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing // rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung // lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba dang // gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur// rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas
60b8: rigs su de dag 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs// mur 'dug nyan thos rnams spangs pa// thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog/ stug por de bzhin 'dod par 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di/

61a1: yi yul ni gang // ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// rdo rje'i snying pos gang thob phyir// tshul dge 'di ni ston par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i rkang gnyis la// thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje'i snying /
61a2: 'jigs med kyi// rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod// ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin// ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// gang la gnas shing tshul 'di yang // rgyal sras khyod na bshad pa mdzad// rgyal ba'i
61a3: sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ / dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no// rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyis// 'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang // tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang // rgyal ba'i sras kyi mtha stobs
61a4: dang / / blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang // nus sam mi nus zhes bltas nas// blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang // rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis// thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par byos// gzhan du 'gyur
61a5: ba'i tshul dge ba/ / dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang // thub pa rnams la bshad par bya// theg pa chen po 'od can gyi// ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te// de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams// tshul
61a6: dge rab tu ston par byed/ / bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong // de dag mgon po de bzhin no// rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa rnams// de dag rang gi zhal ston to// dge 'o dge zhes rab tu gsung // 'di ni rnam
61a7: 'byor bzang ldan lam/ / lam 'dis ded rnams thams cad kyang // ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba// thob nas sangs rgyas dri med 'gyur// gang yang sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes// theg pa chen po sang
61a8: ba yi/ / ting 'dzin gyi phra sems pa// de la gnas shing rgyal sras pa// rgyal ba bsam yis spyod yul can// sprul pa bye ba mang po yis// so so rang rig spyod yul gyi// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha/

61b1: ban// shin du phra ba'i rdul snyed do// so so rang gis rig tshul ni// gang la sangs rgyas gnas pa yin// chos 'di mtshan ma med pa ste// sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs// ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa
61b2: yin/ / mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste// rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skye// chos rnams kyi ni de bzhin nyid// de ni yang dag sus mthong ba// de yi ye shes yang dag mtshon// rang bzhin brtags pa mi
61b3: yin te/ / mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung // ming dang mtshan mamed pa na// rang bzhin don dam ma yin te// thams cad lus la kun nas gnas// kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste// bag chags rnams kyi
61b4: ri khrod gnas/ / yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs// yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa yis// yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas// rnam shes lnga po yul can dag/ 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa yin
61b5: rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni/ / sems can bzhin gnas lus can la// kun gzhir grags pa'i chu rlung las// dba'i rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung // rnam shes kun gzhi mtsher gnas
61b6: pa'i/ / bag chags rnams kyis pa rnyogs pa'i rnams// yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pa dag/ rnam par rgyun chad med par rgyu// chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs
61b7: rgyas sras/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste// mngon sangs rgyas shing chos ston to// phung po gang zag bdag med par// rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing // chos kyi dngos yod ma bshig
61b8: bar/ / nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur// bdag med gnyis la mkhas pa nyid// rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed// rnam par bskams shing spong ba ni// tshul bzhin bzhin du yang dag

62a1: mtha'/ / yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing // snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni// sems can dgongs pa'i rgyud bcad pas// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob po// bas ma yas kye ma ye shes 'di// sems can
62a2: rnams kyi bde ba skyed/ / mkhyen cing rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// blo chung rnams la tshul stan to// ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi// dge ba'i mtshan ldan pa mo dag/ thub pa rnams da lta ga / nye ba'i longs spyod du
62a3: yin no/ / de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'byung ba ni// sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing // lha la yid du 'ong ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang // lha yi khrod du khyad par du//
62a4: rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste// 'khor lo can du khyad par du'o// lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang // dri za rnams kyi de bzhin te// theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi// lus can rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob// dedapyir
62a5: rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ / theg pa che la brtson par gyis// mthar gyis bde gshegs gnas rab dang // rgyal po dag du'ang 'gyur bar 'ong// kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang // rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun//
62a6: rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin// spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam// 'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyang // gtso bo rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyis// 'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas// khyad par
62a7: can gyi sgra brjod pa/ / ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// rgyu med rang yang med par 'gyur// bya med byed pa'ang med par 'gyur// rnam par byang dang tha mi dad// kun gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba min// de ste rnam byang tha dad na
62a8: na gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur/ / sngon med 'jig med rtag pa ste// mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ sprul pa ye shes sgrar yang grag/ phan tshun snying po tha mi dad// de ni

62b1: sor gadra ba bzhin du gnas/ / sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste// bde gshegs snying po dge ba'ang // snying po de la kun gzhi sbas// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad// snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang /
62b2: tho' nArnams kyis ma shes so// gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi/ gser las sor gdub byas pa ni// dor mornams la rnam par mdzes// khan tan pa dang mchan yin te/ sar ga du bces kyang brjod mod kyi/
62b3: las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur bas// gser ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas// chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i yul// bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang // 'byung ba las kyang rnam par
62b4: ldog/ 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi// so so rang gis mthong ba dang // spyi dang bdag gis legs 'phags pa// thams cad brjod par mi nus so// ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung // sems dang rnam shes spyod su
62b5: ru/ / sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang // rnam shes yin te yul med do// sems ni mnyam pa nyid dngos su// gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/ rdza phra rnam pa sogs pa yi// yul ni gang yang yod pa min// ji ltar ri rab rten
62b6: byas shing / / nyi zla gza' yi tshogs kyi rnams// bral ba med par rtag tu 'khor// de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi la// rnam dag 'phags po'i spyod yul ni// rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar// kun gzhi snying por
62b7: klags pa'i/ / ga pa sems kyi rnam sa mye// nga zhin rnam par brtags pa dag/ brtags pa dru pam yin dang // yongs su grub de'i rang bzhin yang// ram 'byor rna can ku sa /
62b8: shes yul can ni// bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos// smig rgyu sgra tshogs byung ba ste// 'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs// stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las ci snyed pa'i mdo// rdzog s+ho//

63a1: rba gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ka ru NA pu NaN rI kA tA ma pA hA yAn sU dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po'i padam dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang
63a2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sa la'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bco
63a3: ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa do mod kyi nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ khyod kyis
63a4: shings la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims pal chos shig/ kun dga' bo 'dus byas su btags pa thams cad legs par bcom pa'i shin du yongs su mya
63a5: las 'da' bas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ / kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas// ngas gnas med pa'i chos zhi ba rab tu zhi ba mchog gya nom pa zab pa// mthong bar dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba/
63a6: brtag bi nus pa// ma brtags pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig pa/ phul du phyin par 'phags pa'i bdud rtsi ni bstan// kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi 'khor lo sman med pa dge sbyong ngam/
63a7: bram za'am bdud dmal 'amatshangs pa'am// gzhan gang gis kyang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du sa bskor bral na gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bsor ba ni bskor// ras chos kyi rngabar ni badz+ra /
63a8: dam chos kyi dung chen po ni bus// ngas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgrengs/ ngas chos kyi mar me chen po ni bus// ngas mun pa chen po ni bsal/ ngas stong gsum ni snang bar byas/ ras gru chen po ni bcas/ ngas

63b1: stegs chen po ni btsugs/ / ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/ ngas pha rol tu 'dod pa mang po ni gtags/ ngas thar pa'i lam ni yang dag par bstan// ngas chos kyi char chen po na pab/ ngas lha dang mi rnams ni tshim par byas/
63b2: ngas gdul ba rnams ni btul/ ngas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni sgeg par byas/ ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar ba cad/ ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/ ngas bdud kyi gnas ni g.yo bar byas/
63b3: ngas seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags// ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyur/ ngas sngon gyi yi dam ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis rlabs// ngas nyan thos
63b4: chen po rnams las byed du ni btsud/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/ kun dga' bo mya ngan las
63b5: 'da' ba ma gtogs par phyis bya ba ngal med do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rnam pa de lta bu de thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug
63b6: rngus zug par gyur nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' zhing bde bar gshegs pa rab tu sbar bar bya
63b7: ngan las 'da' ste/ / 'jig rten gyi mig rab tu myur bami snang bar 'gyur/ rab tu myung bar 'jig rten ma gnam mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas
63b8: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo cho ga gi mya nganas byed smre sngags ma 'don cig/ gang gnas pa dang byung ba dang 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa ni

64a1: rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jigs par ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ / kun dga' bo ngas thog ma nyid tu khyed la dga' ba dang sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad tu 'gyur
64a2: shing 'gyes par 'gyur bral bar 'gyur bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma bstan tam/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la byams pa'i lus kyi las phan pa dang bde ba dang gnyis su med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / mi 'thun pa med pas bsnyen
64a3: bkur byas so/ / kun dga' bo gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa la bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par bsnyen bskur byas pa pas gang de bzhin
64a4: gshegs pa la yud tsam zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de de bas 'bras bu shin du ches kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur
64a5: byas pa ni don che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang phan yon che ba dang rgya che ba dang / bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang / bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang / bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
64a6: kun dga' bos mchi ma phyis nas smre sngags 'don cing shing sa la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sa la zung ga la ba
64a7: der gshegs nas shings 'azung gi bang du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal lo/ / gang gi ched de bzhin gshegs pa shings la zung gibar driseng dge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe stang gsum gyi stong
64a8: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na shing dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam po yan cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cadag du de she na gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba de logs su

64b1: gzhol 'dud rab tu 'dud cing mngon par 'dud par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klang ngam 'bab chu'am chu mig gam mtsho'am lteng ka 'am khron pa lam rdzing ngam/ pad ma
64b2: dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang po dang / ri dgas mang
64b3: snga tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus ma 'byin par 'khod cing mi tham chu bar gyur to/ / stang gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyim dang zla ba'i 'od dag ska
64b4: ma'i gzugs sam/ nor bu 'am me 'am srin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste// lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang der ma yin par gyur to//
64b5: stong gsum gyi stestong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/ mi 'bar bar gyur/ mtsha bar gyur/
64b6: mchig par gyur/ yongs su mi gdung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// gang sems can dmyal ba chen pa'i ma de dag thams cad kyang nye bar ni zhing gsil bar gyur
64b7: de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems nad dag thams cad skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to/ / dud 'gro'i ste gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang byams
64b8: pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ / gcig la gcig gnod sems med rnam par 'tshe ba med rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med cing gnod pa byed pa med par gyur to// gshin rje'i 'jig

65a1: l das pa dang rnas pa k+Sha la sa sa
65a2: tshim pa dang sdug bsngam tshun chad pa dang / bde ba dang ming bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa pang ge par klogayas pas mun sum thagasas gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'a//
65a3: rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po dang / btang zung dang btang zung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang /
65a4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg par gyur to// thams cad dang
65a5: ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'di tshe mi ldang bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe skad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang bar gyur te gnyid med/ tshong pa med sgrib pa med/ rtsom pa med cing mi 'dze
65a6: bar kAr te sgra chung ca co chung zhing yi dmi g.yeng bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
65a7: dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur te/
65a8: 'od med gzi brjid med par gyur par shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang glu dang gnod sbyin dang dri zad

65b1: l ha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto bye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi stan dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang rnams la
65b2: dga' bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas par skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po gang dge
65b3: zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba 'di snyam du sems shing bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag byas/ bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag spu bdag cag gis 'jig rten byas/ bdag cag gis
65b4: 'jig rten sprul lo snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/ /
65b5: rang rang gi gnas thams cad dang ldan pa yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur par shes so// de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por
65b6: gyur par shes te rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten skyong ba dang dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma de rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas stong
65b7: gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga ltas yin snyam du sems so/ / de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des stong
65b8: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa la bltas so/ / des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen

66a1: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa po dbang phyug bdag pa dbang sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de de mod mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/
66a2: gang gis bdag rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' ba dang / gang gis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas yin la/
66a3: nide'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/ de mi dga' zhing yid rung zhes byed de spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mur ba myur bar rings par bcom ldan
66a4: 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe stod gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang / ma 'dus pa dang / tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par
66a5: dul bar gyur/ 'phags pa'i chos la gnas par gyur to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'a
66a6: nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba dag la ga' ba stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
66a7: kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa khyod nga ni tshangs pa tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa kun shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur
66a8: ba yin te/ bdag gis sems can rnams byas/ bdag gis sems can rnams sprul/ bdag gis 'jig rten byas/ bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing de skad zer zhe na bdenan/

66b1: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo do/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod sras byas// sus sprul/ de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to// tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang /
66b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du
66b3: rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur bar 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa khyod nyid kyis byas sam/ khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
66b4: tshangs pa gangs chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la brten/ chu yang rlung la brten/ rlung yang nam mkha' la brten te 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong yod cing mi 'jig pa de la ji snyam du sems/ 'di khyod
66b5: kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i bu dag lham
66b6: me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin zhing gzhal med khang rnams stong par 'khod pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis
66b7: brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ gang sos ka dang / dbyar dang ston dang dgun dang dgun smad dang / dpyid kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/
66b8: de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang chu 'am/ me long

67a1: gi dkyil 'khor ram/ 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod dam/ nor bu dang shel rnams kyi nang ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshags snang ba 'di lta ste/ shing
67a2: ljon pa dang nags tshal dang kun dga' bad bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang snang ba 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang grol rdal snang ba 'am/ glang po che dang rta dang rnga mong dang ba lang dang bong bu dang lug dang
67a3: ri dgas dang bya rnams snang ba'am/ ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i tshig nas rna 'am/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ba 'am/ sa dang ri dang krungs
67a4: 'am/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang de las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyi
67a5: brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gsangs dang rang ri'i babachu dang rdzing rnams na drang dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang thug dang ri dgas dang bya
67a6: mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag cha dang / gang de dang 'thun pa'i sgra brnyan 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/
67a7: bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmi lam na gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang / sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang / dri sna tshogs sdom pa dang / ro sna tshogs myong ba dang /
67a8: reg bya sna tshogs reg pa dang / tshes sna tshogs shes pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs myong ba dang / mchi ma byung ba dang du ba dang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ myong ba'am shes/

67b1: pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dzin
67b2: pa dang / mi dga' ba dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang bkres pa dang / sgom pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin napa/
67b3: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi mdzes pa'am/ mi sdug pa 'am/ longs spyod ci bo 'am/ longs spyod chung ba 'am/ dbul ba'am/ bsod nas
67b4: che ba 'am/ tshul khrims bzang ba 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal ba 'am/ shes rab bzang ba 'am/ shes rab 'chal ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
67b5: nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa 'am/ gnod pa'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par tho 'tsham pa 'di lta ste/ mtshan
67b6: tsha dang ma dang chu dang rlung dmar dang dug dang gcan zan khro bo dang dgra dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod
67b7: kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi nang rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
67b8: dang 'dus pa dang dus dang / khams mi mthun pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/ mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus na ba dang / sems can

68a1: rnams kyi yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsa
68a2: pa/ tshangs pa gang mu ge dang chu dang 'brog dang sbrul dang / tsham rkun dang dgon pa dang mtshon cha dang nad dang par gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
68a3: yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa ma dang spun dang sring mo dang grogs dang nye du dang / snag
68a4: gi gnyen mtshams dang bu po dang chung ma dang / bu mo da gang bral ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lakra
68a5: so/ / bka' stsal pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs yang ba'i las la sbyor ba// sgra dang phabs dang rgya skyegs dang 'khor lo 'tsheng ba 'am/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba dang / 'brog dgon par
68a6: 'jug pa nga phyogs sna tshogs su skyes 'jigs pa 'am/ zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa'am/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis
68a7: brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par len pa/ sems can dmyal
68a8: pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / legs par spyad pa

68b1: rnams sam/ gang 'jig rten na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang gnod pa dang / ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ srog
68b2: gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnad sems dang log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs bzod
68b3: kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol babacom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnon byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/ mgo gcad pa dang
68b4: lag pa dang rkang pa dang rna ba dang snga gcad pa'am/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gcad pa'am mer bsregs pa dang / 'bru mar gyis gtor ba dang / srog dang bral ba dang ral gri dang mdung thung dang /
68b5: mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang gsad pa dang bcing ba dang go rar gzhug pa dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis
68b6: brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis ma la log par spyod pa dang / sring mo la log par spyod pa dang /
68b7: tshul khrim dang ldan pa la log par spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin brlabs pa yin na me/ gsol
68b8: pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bkal stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod par byed pa sna tshogs byed dang ro langs dang rigs sngags dang sngags dang sman dang 'byung po dang gdon

69a1: 'babs pa dang gang de las gzhan pa dug sbyor ba dang / gang sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyu ba dang srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang srog chad par 'gyu ba de dag kyang tshangs brtsod byas shing khyod kyis sprul
69a2: pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi
69a3: chos 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang / zad pa'i chos nyid dang 'gyur ba'i chos
69a4: nyid dang / mdza' ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang / med par 'gyur ba dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang bye bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis
69a5: byin gyis bslabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang sgrib pa dang chod pa dang bag
69a6: la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa dang kun du sbyor ba rnams dang de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba dang / sdang bar 'gyur ba
69a7: dang rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'ang byed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/
69a8: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'di sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can

69b1: rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol ba bcom
69b2: ldan 'das ma lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'di 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal chun gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa 'am me dog gi
69b3: shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dang spos shing rnam pa sna tshagasas ma mngar ba dang kha ba dang lan tshwa dang sbyar ba dang tsha ba dang / bska pa'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mngon par
69b4: 'grub pa gang sems can rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa
69b5: bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'gro ba lnga po dag na yongs su 'khor ba skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'thon pa dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'di dag dang / tshangs pa gang sems can
69b6: ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang / sred pa'i kun du sbyor ba dang ldan pa kun du rgyug cing 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang / tshangs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyun mi chad pa gang na lha dang bcas
69b7: pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thabs 'khrugs pa lta bu/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di nas
69b8: 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun du rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'khor ba las byung ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod

70a1: kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'o na tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di
70a2: ltar ngas sems can 'di dag byas ngas sbal ngas byin gyis brlabs ngas 'jig rten byas ngas sprul ngas byin gyis brlabs snyam du sems/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mi 'tshal ba/ rtag tu
70a3: bar gyur pa ma spangs pas phyin ci lag tu gyur pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rtag tu ma thos pas sems can rnams bdag gis bca
70a4: bdag gis sprul 'jig rten bdag gis bgyis/ 'di rten dag gis spu shes bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhwa'o//
70a5: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis// 'jig rten 'di sus sprul/ sems can rnams sus bgyis// sus sprul/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu lags/ sras byin gyis brlabs/ de skad ces
70a6: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa 'jig rten na yis kyis byas las kyis sprul lo// sems can rnams ni las kyis byas las kyi
70a7: las thupa las kyis rab tu phye ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzug
70a8: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen

70b1: gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis na nyi mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ da ltar sdug bsngal
70b2: kyi phrang can 'ang 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ tshangs pa las
70b3: dang chos kyi kun du sbyor ba rnams yod na/ sems can rnams 'byung bar snang ba dang / las dang chos kyi kun du sbyor ba dang bral bas 'byung ba med par snang ba ma gtogs par 'di la byed pa po 'ang /
70b4: bye tu 'jug pa'am/ nye bar 'jog pa po gang yang med do// tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang / nyon mongs bzad pa dang / sdug bsngal zad pa dang / sdug bsngal nya bar zhibs zhi ba dang //
70b5: nges par byung ba dang rnam par zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshangs pa de la las gang yin pa de zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa/
70b6: de rnam par zhi ba dang / nub pa ma gtogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis chos nyid de lta
70b7: bu dga' byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na/ chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa mi 'byung gi/ tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig
70b8: rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba zab pa zab par snang ba chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni

71a1: skye ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sems can rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i bang dag las
71a2: yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad ni migayor lta bu mi rtag pa g.yo ba mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma ni bzad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes tshang
71a3: ba sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de rnam par phye zhing gsal bar mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
71a4: ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na yang 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mig yod lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid byin gyi rlabs yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed
71a5: t hams cad migayor lta bur ma gzigs su zin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang migayod dang brag cha lta bur mi ston pa zhig na
71a6: tshangs pa gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang / mig yod dang brag cha lta bu dang mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mkhyen pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin
71a7: gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yong dang zag cha lta bur ston no/ / de la mkhas pa de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag yod de de'i mtshas mthong nas rgyu de dang rkyen de dang dmigs pa'i mtshan
71a8: mdas 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par khong du chud cing g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes rnam par 'byed de/ / 'du byed thams cad ni 'jig cing 'gyur ro// dus dang tshigs dang dum tshigs

71b1: kyis kyang 'jig go/ / skad cig dkyang cig dang pyod tsam dang yud tsam dang zhag dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo dang lo brgya dang bskal pa dang bskal pa brgya dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// me'i phung po chas
71b2: po yang 'bar nas shi bar 'gyur ro/ / chu'i phung po chen po yang bab nas mi 'bab po// rlung gi phung po chen po yang langs nas mi ldang ngo // sa'i phung po chen po yang byung nas med par 'gyur ro//
71b3: ri'i phung po chen po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang lhun po dang lhun po chen po dang de las gzhan pa ri nag po dag kyang byung nas med par 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor
71b4: dang bcas pa 'di dag kyang byung nas lham mer ma yin lhan ner ma yin lha nger ma yin zhing slar ltung ngo / / lha yul ba'i lha'i gzhal med khang bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// grong dang grong khyer/
71b5: dang / grong rdal 'di dag dang / shing ljon pa dang nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / kun dga' nyams dga' ba 'di dag kyang byung nas 'gag par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang
71b6: 'pho ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag kyang mtshan ma de mthong nas kye ma'o 'du byed 'di thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'jig go// 'du byed 'dithams cad med par 'gro'o//
71b7: 'gyur ro// 'du byed 'di thams cad zad par 'gyungo snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag rgyu de dang rkyen des khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag dad pas khyim n+da
71b8: khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung nas kyang 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag cha lta bur rig ste/ mtshan ma de dang dmigs pa de dang rkyen des byang chub thob par

72a1: 'gyur ro/ / chu'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs snang ba de dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa 'am/ de las gzhan du/
72a2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gdams pa'am/ bdag gi blos btags pas 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bur rtogs nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/
72a3: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bzod
72a4: pa dang po thob pa dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa dag yod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan
72a5: las 'das pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de thos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad
72a6: mchog dang ldan pa dang / theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs su rig par bya ste// tshangs pa gang gis skyes bu mkhas//
72a7: pa dag gis 'du byed 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba/ g.yo ba mi brtan pa/ zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag cha lta bu'o// zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma de mthong nas yang dag par skyo
72a8: bar 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs so/ / sngon spyod cing sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yongs su smin par bya ba dag gis chos kyi sgra 'di

72b1: la bu 'di thos nas 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag ga/ 'du byed rnam gi 'jig pa ste// 'du byed thams cad ni mi lam dang brag cas bu zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pang /
72b2: 'gyur mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa'am/ khyim par gyur pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yongs
72b3: su bzung bar gyur pa de dag kyang rgyud de dang rkyen des 'di ltar 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / 'du byed rnams 'jig pa dang / 'du byed rnams mi lam dang / mig yor dang /
72b4: brag cha la bu'o zhes 'du byed de rnams de lta bu'i tshul du rtogs par 'gyur te/ chu de dang rkyen des dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu bud nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten dum
72b5: zur yang / / / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs nyid dang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsab bskyed pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa
72b6: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par rig par bya'o// tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang
72b7: sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa 'di ni nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med
72b8: grangs med pa rnams kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med grangs med pa bskyed de tshul khrims dang dka' thub dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i dga' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong dag

73a1: gis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / dus dang tshor dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba nye bar bzung stes ngas
73a2: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ngo / / yongs su sbyangs so// ngas sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyad pa dang don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdus
73a3: te/ / de dag nga'i smon lam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes nas ngas chos bstan pa'ang shes so// nga'i chos bstan pas 'dul bar yang 'gyur te brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin tshangs pa rnams kyis yin ni rten myong //
73a4: ba rnams kyi ma yin no// tshangs pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yin gyi/ brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyi ma
73a5: yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu rnams kyi ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'bum phrag bcu'i
73a6: bdag po tshangs pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i tshangs pa rnams skyo zhing yi dbyung bar gyur te tshig 'di skad ces/ de tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa de mtshang
73a7: to/ / ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to zhes na smras so// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
73a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rmad du 'dzin par gyur te/ ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa ngo mtshar to snyam mo

73b1: de nas song gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slob par khas blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa bde bar gags
73b2: pan bdag gi ston pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas pa na bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslab pa rabakyi babadag la ga dum du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la bka' lung yang nod par gyur to//
73b3: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs
73b4: rgyas kyi zhing yin/ 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyod la gtar gyis/ khyod ci nas kyang de'i rjes su 'jug par gyi sa la dge
73b5: ba'i lam 'di dang dge ba'i tshul 'di dang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang / chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gyis shig/ nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o// tshangs pa nga'i bu'i/
73b6: thu bo gzhon nu thugs las skyes pa/ zhal nas skyes pa/ chos las byung ba/ chos kyis sprul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i don 'dod
73b7: pa/ phan pa 'dod pa/ bde ba 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'ang stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji ltar ngas gnas pa bzhin du chos kyis gnas
73b8: par 'gyur gyis de ltar ngal rjes su 'thun par byed pa de bzhin du de la rjes su 'thun par gyis shig/ ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam 'di dang / dge ba'i tshul 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang /

74a1: chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di kun mi 'chad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ji tsam du dge ba'i tshul 'di lta bu'i rgyun mi chad pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang chos
74a2: kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul tshun chad par mi 'gyur/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong dang / lha dang mi'i tshul dang thar pa'i tshul nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi bar du rgyun mched par 'gyu
74a3: ro/ / tshangs pa de lta bas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyod la gtad do// tshangs pa khyod la bka' stsal pa ni 'di yin/ rjes su bstan pa ni
74a4: 'di yin gyis khyod kyis 'dide bzhin du gyis shig/ nga ni 'di'i skyes bra za ma'o// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po de snyed 'khod pa de dag thams
74a5: cad 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dral bar gyur te/ tshangs pa chen po de gcig rdza ni ma gtogs so// tshangs pa chen po stong gi tshangs pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i chos la
74a6: btul zhing bzhag par gyur to/ / tshangs pa'i le'u sa dang po rdzog s+ho// // bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das la dad cing dad pa chen po thob par gyur
74a7: bdes bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal ba dang yi mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur/ skyo zhing yi dbyung
74a8: l a spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas myur ba myur bar rings pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu

74b1: 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das padag gsol ba 'tshal na/ sman par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs
74b2: su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la
74b3: shugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad tu bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ha cang myur du long ba dang mig ma mchis pa dang ston pa ma mchis pa dang 'dren pa mchi
74b4: pa dang dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang rten ma mchis par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la de
74b5: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ded dpon khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can gyis ngal bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol// bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol/
74b6: bcom ldan 'das khyod dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab bo// zhes gsol ba btab nas khyod kyi pa bdud sdig can la ngas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras te/ ded dpon bdud sdig
