267a6: lag pa thob pa'i slad du bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos
267a7: rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan par gyur cig/ don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par
267a8: rig pa thob pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan par gyur cig/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon

267b1: tan rjes su thob pa'i slad du yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pam stobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i slad du mas kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyab tu
267b2: chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du'o//
267b3: kyis brgyan pa dang / byang bar lung ston pa'i slad du kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su ston pa stsol ba'i slad du rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /
267b4: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
267b5: da kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes thob pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing thams cad kyis mi choms
267b6: pa'i slad du dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag la yang bdag
267b7: gis tshig gcig brjod pas dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang dag par bstsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la
267b8: gzhan gyis drir mi 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig/ sbyar du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya

268a1: bar yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i
268a2: sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
268a3: shing du rtse bar slar cigamams can me dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/ rtsub pa/ sdig pa 'tshal ba/ kha khro dang / dmu rgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la yang bdag gi sems
268a4: dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig/ sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyis phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher sten par gyur cig/ de nas sems can
268a5: gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen por gyur pa de dag la yang bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba
268a6: dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ yang de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bar gyur ba 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa lam bskun
268a7: cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis gsum la skabs su mchi ba la 'god par 'gyur zhing / srad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yang sbyar bar gyur byen/
268a8: rnam par 'tshe ba la dga' ba rnams ni srog gcod pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ 'dod pa mi bzad pa zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma byin par len pa spang ba la 'god par gyur cig/ chos ma lags pa/

268b1: la 'dod chags pa rnams ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par grwar cig/ phan tshun brdzun gyi tshig smrab rnams ni brtan du sgrub spong ba la 'gang par gyur cig/ myos par 'gyur bal ma
268b2: pa dga' ba rnams na sa dang bcas pa'i char byas par 'gyur ba ga mad pazung ba la 'gad par thar bag/ sems can gang dganangs pa lnga pa thams cadan med pang ba zung byed dan da a nas pa
268b3: zhing dag bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni bdag gis nyin zhag gcig cam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
268b4: khams la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar
268b5: sbyar bar bgyi zhing / rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba de dag ni bdag
268b6: gis dge ba'i chos rnams la nye bar bsgrubs nas tshangs par sbyor ba thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / kun nas 'dzin pa'i rgyud can gyi
268b7: bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don dang / tshig dang / yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gi tshe 'phrul rnams kyis chos ston par gyur cig/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag mi rtag
268b8: ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag ma mchis pa dang / stong par ston par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / dge ba dang / zhi ba dang / shis pa dang / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer mya ngan las 'das pa

269a1: la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag 'khor ba'i po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la chos ston par gyur cig/ gang dag rtsod pachags par 'gyur
269a2: ba de dag la bdag gis chos kyi sa brtsod pa'i bstan bcos rab tu ston par gyur cig/ gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag la bdag gis zhal ta bgyid pa'i las ston par gyur cig/
269a3: kha ton la mngon par dga' ba rnams la ni stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi cha gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i lam ston par gyur cig/ sems can re ri'i don gyi slad du yang bdag dpag tshad 'bum thag
269a4: mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don dang tshig dang / yi ge dang / thabs dang / cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gis skyo ba ma mchis shing spro bar bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan la
269a5: 'das pa'i bar la 'god par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bdag gi tshe'i 'du byed ji tsam pa'i lnga cha 'dor bar gyur cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe na rang gi tshe na rang gi
269a6: sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams la snying rje'i slad du bdag ni slad kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig/ bdag yongs
269a7: su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur cig/ yang lo lnga brgyar ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bdag yongs su
269a8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams las rin po che rnams dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa bgyid par spro ba ste bar 'gyur ba dang / tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang / phyag

269b1: gcigan pa dang / bkor ba gcig tsam dang / thal mo stor ba gcig tsam dang / me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa dza// ba bzhin du zab pa gang
269b2: po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la than bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ ji skad bstar pa bzhinadu
269b3: yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag kun chub par bgyid dam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang ston par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis thos nas
269b4: sems rab tu dang par 'gyur zhing / tha na dam pa'i chos smra ba la me tog gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam gyis mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa
269b5: gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ ji tsam na dam pa'i chos nub ste/ chos kyi sgron ma ni gum/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni 'gyel bar gyur pa na bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gsar
269b6: kyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i dogs la lhags par 'gyur zhing / ga gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na rin po ches phongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ de dag nor bu bai dUr+ya tog gi blo glos shes bgyi
269b7: bar gyur te zhugs ltar gda' zhing kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ de yang de nas mngon par 'phags te/ gong du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas me tog sna tshogs kyi char
269b8: rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur zhing / me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / ba ri ya tra ka dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ma

270a1: na brna dang / zla ba dri med dang / 'dab brgya pa dang / 'dab stong pa dang / kun tu 'ang dang / kun tu dri ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / rtag tu 'bras bu d+has dang / snying dang mig min par dag 'dag pa dang
270a2: skar mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / dri mtha' yas dang / me tog de lta bu dag gi me tog gi char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag
270a3: 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / dge snyen gyi sdom pa'i sgra dang / 'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / rab tu
270a4: byung ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / tshangs par spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang / zhal ta bgyid pa'i sgra dang / klog pa'i
270a5: sgra dang / nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i sgra dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang / mi sdug pa'i sgra dang / dbugs rgyu ba dang / rngub pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sgra dang / ci yang
270a6: med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / zad par gyi skye mched kyi sgra dang / zhi gnas
270a7: dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra dang / nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang
270a8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs na spyod

270b1: ba'i lha thams cad kyis thos par gyur nas/ rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing / sems can chen po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par
270b2: gyur nas/ de dag de nas babs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams
270b3: cad kyis kyang thos par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang sred pa'i kun du sbyor ba dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / yid bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/
270b4: de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing / de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad
270b5: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang / nam mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/
270b6: dngul dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rdul can dang / sa le sbram dang / rdo'i snying po dang / g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / de lta bu'i
270b7: rin po che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad na thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed
270b8: ba dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / tshig rtsub cing bslang ba dang / dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams ca

271a1: drab ba dang / nadam mchis pa dang / thab pa dang / 'thab dang / tsu pa dang / 'ang ba dag sa mdzes pa dang / lo lags pa dag kun tu gnas par gyur / sems can gang dag dpan
271a2: dag mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / longs spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gi slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ sku gdung de dag kyang slar
271a3: gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ / bam po bcu gcig pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mo'i dus kyi tshen yang
271a4: dag nor bu rin po che an ta til dag du kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang
271a5: pa ri ya tra ka dang / me tog 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/
271a6: sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dga'abyung bar gyur cig/ yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i
271a7: bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas ma
271a8: tog gi char gyi bar du sngar spros pa bzhin du gyur cig/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan

271b1: las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / 'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/
271b2: bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag zung gi bar du yang / bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog
271b3: pa la 'god par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
271b4: pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal cing / rab tu bkod pa rnams dang / bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe
271b5: b skal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas
271b6: bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i
271b7: sems can rnams dang / gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub
271b8: s ems dpa' de dag kyang slad kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis

272a1: g rangs ma mchis bdag te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung
272a2: bar gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po de la bab pa na rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
272a3: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/ / bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na/
272a4: des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na de'i phyir bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing / rnam pa thams cad du chos
272a5: dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing / 'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho risi dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no// zhes
272a6: bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang brjod par gyur cig/ gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gi
272a7: bsngags pa dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa thos par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs
272a8: de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur ces yongs su zhu bar gyu

272b1: cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
272b2: bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di yang ston par gyur cig/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rgya chen po
272b3: la mos par gyur cig/ de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyur zhing / de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su stegs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bde pa'i sangs rgyas
272b4: kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272b5: de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin byang chub don du gnyer
272b6: ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272b7: gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid gcig na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur
272b8: bde yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rnam bska

273a1: tshogs dag mdzad de/ de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas/ nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par
273a2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon
273a3: gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i
273a4: spyan sngar lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to//
273a5: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dras na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / thab mo dang / snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten
273a6: ldongs shing bden pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos pa lta bu'i
273a7: bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thog pa lta na byang chub
273a8: kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi nges pa legs so// yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang

273b1: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yang mi 'tshal/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 'tshal/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i lnga'i yon tan gyi long
273b2: spyod kyang mi 'tshal/ ltar skye ba yang mi 'tshal/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding du skye ba yang mi 'tshal la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar yang mi byed
273b3: de/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin par ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ bsgoms pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ro// /
273b4: zhes kyang gsungs la/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa bcom
273b5: ldan 'das gang bdag gis kyang sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / thos pa las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/ gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar
273b6: btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltan/ de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal
273b7: nyams su myong ba'i sems can dmyal la ba'i sems can rnams kyi slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang ba bzlar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir me 'thab pa thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs
273b8: pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba sgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na

274a1: yang de'i slad du bdag dgum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang me rtsol bdag 'byung bar
274a2: gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshe rab dag yang dag
274a3: par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal pa ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa grub pa mi zad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga
274a4: rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du myong bar gyur cig/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pas bgyid pa dang / mnar med pa'i bar dag
274a5: la gzhol ba'i las yang dag par stsogs par 'gyur ba rnams dang / sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs
274a6: rgyas kyi zhing gardul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba 'am/ kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal
274a7: bachen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom
274a8: ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal

274b1: b.las yongs su thar bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang / 'ja
274b2: pa dang / myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / dra 'bong dang / bsdus gzhom dang / thig nag dang / yang sos kyi bar
274b3: dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin
274b4: dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du grul bum dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhar lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
274b5: kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag du sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang / long ba dang /
274b6: lde ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar
274b7: te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ka re ba de lta bu yongs su
274b8: rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar

275a1: sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de
275a2: ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig/ ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
275a3: 'das rnams bdag gi dbang du gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos
275a4: kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
275a5: ngag sgrub par rngo thog cing bdag bskal pa bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs
275a6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba ltan bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas de'i mad la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan
275a7: ba'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras
275a8: ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa thob pa dang / sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so legs so// lhag pa'i bsam pa

275b1: des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing tshad med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no
275b2: ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so// sems can rnams
275b3: sdug bsngal las rab tu thar par bya ba'i smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
275b4: bstan par yang gyur cig/ rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/ e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po// khyod ni bde la mi gnas te// khyod mi sems
275b5: can snying rje ldan/ / khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin// de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags// dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang
275b6: rta thul/ / dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de// gzugs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du 'gyur// de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams// dge ba'i don
275b7: du kun nas 'dus pa dag/ mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi// khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang //
275b8: mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog/ phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis// de'i phyir khyod la mchod par 'os// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/ snying rje chen pos sems can la// de ltar

276a1: byed kyis sbyin pa sngon/ / khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang // mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar rnam pa/
276a2: rgya che ba// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la// byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma
276a3: gtogs par/ / sems can la brtse gzhan med de// gang byer shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog/ khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan// spos kyi seng ges smras pa/ khyod nim 'das dras na ni// bzang la nyon
276a4: mongs bdud kyi tshe/ / sems can sdug bsngal grol byed cing // khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing // log sbrus shin tu nyam
276a5: rab/ / sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur// mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing // nyon mongs 'dam du bying gyur la// mtshams med pa dag byed pa po// sems
276a6: rmad tshig rnams bzang bar gyur/ / spos kyi glang pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba// ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin// dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i// sems chud tshig rnams bzung bar
276a7: gyur/ / rin po che tog gis smras pa// ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags la skur ba 'debs byed pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur// 'jigs dang gdung
276a8: bral gyis sbas pa/ khyod kyi ngan song gsum lam du// sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba// chad pa stong 'drar gnas gyur pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur// lag na ud pa las smras pa// khyod/

276b1: kyi snying rje ye shes dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom// sna dang 'chibs gzir gyur pa// sems rgyud chag rnams bzung bar gyur// ye shes grags pas smras pa// nadabang dag gis nyen pa dang/ 6
276b2: yongs rlung gis ded ba dag/ ye shes chu yis zhi byas te// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom// gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa// ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin// nyon mongs dra bas rab btsam te// nyan mangs
276b3: shad cing rnam thar pa'i/ / brtson 'grus brtan pa deng la med// ud bal zla bas kyang smras pa// ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas// brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos// srid pa'i 'ching bas rab
276b4: bsdams pa/ / khams gsum po dag grol bar byed// dri med dbang pos smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi// snying rje chen po dag brtan pa/ snying rje'i rjes las byung ba po// khyod la bdag cag phyag
276b5: 'tshal lo/ / stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/ nyon mongs ldan pa'i cod dus tshe// byang chub gang dag khyod la brten// khyod kyis nyon mongs brtsad nas bcad// smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur//
276b6: skad pa skyong gis kyang smras pa// ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba// dri med smon lam btab pa yis// byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi// sman dang brten du khyod 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
276b7: dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa dra zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ / kye ma shes ston sems can rnams// nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom// khyad na
276b8: 'bar snying rje can/ / sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan ga lngas phyag byas nas

277a1: thal mo kya / don dang cig snga tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs sra sa bdag gis mngon par bstod nas 'ad do// rigs kyi na gang gi sa zab pan pa 'i dul gyis de bzhin gshegs pan pa 'i rna
277a2: spyan sngar bus mo g.yas pa'i ljangs la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod las cher g.yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul tharabs kyi rdul snyed dag gis yang g.yos/
277a3: rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
277a4: kyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can
277a5: rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag du yang sngas chen pos byung bar gyur cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi
277a6: me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems
277a7: d pa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing
277a8: me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab par bru ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus so// yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

277b1: gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che btsugs bden bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
277b2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg
277b3: pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag nyes mi de bzhin gshes
277b4: pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing me tog gi char
277b5: chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zabs bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
277b6: kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog den de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs
277b7: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' yul yang dag par ston pa'i sngon lam bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgra bkod pa'i chos kyi
277b8: ram zangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zag pang po dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lur ston to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnyeng rje chen po dang na

278a1: pa gcig pa cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
278a2: lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang
278a3: yongs su bzung ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang rjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing
278a4: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
278a5: gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs/
278a6: parin po che'i snying po de spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems
278a7: can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ / gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar bus mo g.yas
278a8: pa'i lha ngas la gzugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon/

278b1: par rab tu bab par gyur par de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
278b2: dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges pa bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang /
278b3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i tshe 'phrul dag
278b4: bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de nye ces yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ba'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang /
278b5: 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems
278b6: can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid
278b7: cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni nga gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
278b8: tu sems dang po bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po che la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bskar bkur bya/

279a1: pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag tog der dang la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dag/
279a2: ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di yang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
279a3: kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sgras gang bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams
279a4: cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no/ / skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la yang stong rje chen po brjod pa'i smon
279a5: lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'jugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig
279a6: rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra ba kyi rdul snyed dag du yang yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro/ / gang khyod kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla
279a7: n a med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par
279a8: gyur te/ de la khwa cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin

279b1: d u bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gzhan dag tu
279b2: sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smros shig/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
279b3: drang byung phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la bas
279b4: dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing me tog zlab mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di srur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad
279b5: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che
279b6: snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rin po rgya'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thab las mngon
279b7: zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs te byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bstsags pa nas 'phags nas/ 'di lta ste dper na glog bzhin
279b8: du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bstsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas de bzhin

280a1: gshegs par na po cha'i snying po ga la ba der dang ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa snga
280a2: t shogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngan bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong
280a3: ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag skur ba'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa blta snyam mo//
280a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyir phyogs te/ bram ze me tog phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog
280a5: mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu
280a6: med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang / bram ze la me tog bskur ba dang /
280a7: yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun
280a8: 'das pa zhe na 'jig rten gyi khams pa gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis bsgyings pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

280b1: seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig ga chas stan to/ /
280b2: 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ gcig gos ni seng ge rdo rje'i tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin
280b3: gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags
280b4: shes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ / de bzhin du gyur te ste phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu mad grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag ci/
280b5: 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
280b6: rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i
280b7: stan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
280b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan las cher g.yos shing

281a1: me tog gi char chen po bab pa ji las gyur ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ / yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
281a2: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
281a3: bar zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni
281a4: mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing me tog gi char
281a5: chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
281a6: kyi zhing khrag khrig ga gubacu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te
281a7: 'tshe zhing / / zhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ gcig shos ni rnam par snang
281a8: byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ / yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das ba de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas

281b1: pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas shes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes
281b2: la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par
281b3: 'brug pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag pa rab tu dga' ba rnams 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sngang mdzad me tog rabargyas
281b4: la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me
281b5: tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/
281b6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod
281b7: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ston to// de na byang chub sems
281b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

282a1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
282a2: gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnon cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi
282a3: zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang
282a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de ba'i
282a5: g shegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par
282a6: byed do/ / sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngan bdug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas
282a7: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bza'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos
282a8: kun tu rab tu g.yos shing 'gul pa dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

282b1: de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sapas
282b2: rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
282b3: payang bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de snga bu'i tshe 'brul bstan to/ / // bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems
282b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bur gnyis kyis yongs su zhus
282b5: pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bde zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge
282b6: 'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des
282b7: yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
282b8: bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

283a1: rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi
283a2: k hams yang dag rtog der deng la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa
283a3: khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyog
283a4: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cig snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no/ / skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir na khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang
283a5: d ag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par
283a6: 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
283a7: rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag
283a8: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod

283b1: par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan 'akod pa dag yongs su bzung ba dag dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu
283b2: bkab par gyur to/ / gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang byis
283b3: b skal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos
283b4: dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po desan skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smos shig/ yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
283b5: bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang phyag bkyi
283b6: ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyis ba spring zhing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i
283b7: slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog dar mchi lags so/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng
283b8: la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par

284a1: 2/ / 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i da gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdza ma tag ba rgyas
284a2: de las me tog zab mdog mdzes drim med pa dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang / lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
284a3: 'di'i 'ang mabu'i' tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo // yang de chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtag zag pa
284a4: chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang / snying po ldanams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur/
284a5: 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa
284a6: chen po'i rigs kyi tha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag/
284a7: 'tshal te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngan bram zel thams cad dang ldan
284a8: pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la

284b1: me tog zlab mdog mdzes rngam med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan
284b2: ci drang nas phyi daphyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zlab mdog mdzes drim med pa de dag bral nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzadas tog rab rgyas kyis khyod la me tog zlab mdo/
284b3: mangs dris med pa 'di 'brang zhing bras bu dam pa khyod lags so gas tsun te/ yan lag gsum thos legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang dris dkyang smras pa bzhin no// martag gang min pa dgas r
284b4: gyas pa'ang song bdag tu chang bzhin du rabacu 'bab pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgrarnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/ 'dis ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sna dang / dge
284b5: 'dun gyi sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa
284b6: med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa bon thob pa'i sgra dang / theg
284b7: pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi sgra ste/ me tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i sgra de dag de lnga bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
284b8: 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dgags sla

285a1: thos nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam gyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa
285a2: lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
285a3: s ems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas
285a4: ji lta bu thob par 'khod do/ / rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te/
285a5: gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin klog gi sgron ma zhes bya
285a6: ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna bdun gyis rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang / shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtsa dang / shing dang /
285a7: sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhi nang kun tu snang ngo // sems can gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/
285a8: kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig ni bcod kha/ kha cig ni dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni me lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lta bur/ kha cig/

285b1: nA sreg ni smig rgya sa bud/ kha cig ni chu lba bAr/ kha cig ni ri lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur// kha cig ni me tog lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lding sa bur/ kha cig ni se ge lta bur/ kha cig ni
285b2: ma lta brar/ kha cig nitheb lta par/ kha tsag nas ram la bur/ kha cig ni byi rgod sapa dang / bcig ni sas bya dag tu kun tu snang ste/ chom mnan pa'i phyir dan 'khod pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i phyogs dris na yid larje
285b3: de lta bu'i lus su kun tu snang ngo / / rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi
285b4: ba mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rini po che bdun gyi pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de na sems
285b5: can gang dag sa dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang 'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang de ltar mthong ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngan 'dug ste/
285b6: thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag cig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
285b7: de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te legs
285b8: so legs so/ / bram ze 'di lta ste dper na me tog gi shing phun sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa sna tshogs dang / 'dab ma sna tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / rtsa ba sna tshogs dang /

286a1: sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do// de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad bcur/ khacig gis de pag tshad nyis brgyar/ kha cig ni dpag tshad sum brgyar ljang de ldan ner byed cing de bzhin
286a2: du sbyar te/ de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge nyan ner byed la/ de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par
286a3: 'gyur/ 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dganang bzhi brgyartsa
286a4: bzhi po dag gis bcos par gyur pa de dag gis dri bsnams na ni nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag smos pa dang brgyal ba dang smos pa dang ngas pa dang sems rmugs pa dang sems
286a5: rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad ma dkar po mkhrang bsra ba rdo rje las grub
286a6: pa'ajam pa sdong bu ni bai dUr+ya/ 'dab ma ni gser ze 'bru ni rdo'i snying po/ za ba ni mu tig dmar po/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong / brgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad ma dkar
286a7: po de'i kha dog dang dri phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing ljang de ldan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
286a8: kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag na sems can gyi gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyen pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / gnyid log pa dang /

286b1: dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
286b2: zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi rol pad ma dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis pog gam/ dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing yang
286b3: phyis langs te mdza' bshes dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba
286b4: dang / gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang de nas shi 'phos nas
286b5: kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// ji ltar nyi ma 'tshar ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag
286b6: kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas ltang de ldan ne/ shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/ kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de
286b7: ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no/ / ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha bye zhing lham me ltung de lta na ner gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis
286b8: nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du

287a1: sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
287a2: chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas ngal phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs
287a3: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung / kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa
287a4: gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa/ gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na
287a5: de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no// de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa
287a6: ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
287a7: dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no/ / gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod
287a8: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no// gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur par

287b1: bud med rnam par spangs pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
287b2: par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gis chos stong par
287b3: b+har cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang che ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnabs la chos ston par gyur cig
287b4: ces smon lam des pa 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang / bsam pa la
287b5: mkhas par gyur pa yang ma yin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga las 'od zer
287b6: khadog sna tshogs/ kha dog dum/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu skye'o// 'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/
287b7: de na 'jig rten gyi 'ams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can den mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa/ me sdug pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun ni mthe bo la
287b8: bden de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ldan yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams

288a1: kyi khru gang dang / mthe bo tsam gyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang / sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po
288a2: ngag gis chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / ma de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
288a3: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
288a4: rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po bla na med pa
288a5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do/ / sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar
288a6: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyis zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs
288a7: su bzung ngo / / de na sems can chen po des nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas nas/ der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
288a8: g dugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar

288b1: smon lam btab bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas ngabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
288b2: b a'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shin du bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams
288b3: med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud cig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig
288b4: rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nya btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par
288b5: snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so/ / nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ban par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par sna dbyed zhi ba de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
288b6: mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyis khru gsum gyi tshad
288b7: tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ des dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs nas
288b8: bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo / / des dang po

289a1: gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su
289a2: dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro/ / bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dad ba dag na sems can tshe ring ba/ bsam pa yongs su
289a3: dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid
289a4: thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag mar mdzad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma
289a5: spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul
289a6: pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing smon lam khyad par can btab pas na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems
289a7: can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam
289a8: bdag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yong su dag pa'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa

289b1: byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no/ / bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas
289b2: kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi
289b3: ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des ni byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams shes bya'i//
289b4: pad ma dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ bram ze 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi
289b5: zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa'
289b6: rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams
289b7: la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas che ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung ba
289b8: zhig par mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dkar po/

290a1: rnams shes bya'o// me tog lta bu rnams shes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin
290a2: gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad ma dkar po lta bar skyes pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas
290a3: mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
290a4: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags
290a5: so/ / 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'dra
290a6: nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa'i sangs
290a7: rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa/ 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skar
290a8: ba 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs

290b1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang sgyur ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
290b2: med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim
